faith.2pp.uk.text: Respect others - even if they have a different opinion to you.

famick.social.text: Respectful Communication: Treat all members with respect and kindness. Engage in conversations that promote understanding and positive interactions. Disagreements are normal, but keep discussions civil and avoid personal attacks.

No Shaming or Negativity: We encourage a supportive environment. Avoid shaming, blaming, or any form of negativity towards fellow members. Constructive feedback is welcome, but it should be provided in a constructive and empathetic manner.

No Political Discussions: To maintain a focus on family connections, we kindly ask that political discussions be avoided. We respect that members may have diverse opinions, but our platform is not the place for political debates.

Friendly Language: Use language that is inclusive and friendly. Refrain from using offensive, discriminatory, or derogatory language. Keep in mind that families are diverse, and we want everyone to feel comfortable here.

Keep Content Family-Friendly: Share content that is appropriate for all age groups. Avoid explicit content, offensive images, or any material that could be considered inappropriate for a family-oriented environment.

Privacy and Consent: Respect the privacy of other members. Do not share personal information without consent. Ensure that any multimedia content shared respects the privacy and consent of those featured.
Stay On Topic: While we encourage open communication, please keep discussions relevant to family life and connections. Off-topic or unrelated discussions might be better suited for other platforms.

Report Concerns: If you encounter any behavior that violates these rules or makes you uncomfortable, please report it to the moderators or administrators. We are committed to maintaining a safe and positive space for all.
No Spam or Advertising: Avoid spamming the platform with irrelevant or promotional content. Advertising products or services is not allowed unless explicitly permitted by the administrators.
Follow Administrators' Guidance: Listen to the guidance of the administrators and moderators. They are here to ensure a smooth and enjoyable experience for all.

famichiki.jp.text: Be considerate. No discrimination based on race, religion, sexual orientation, gender identity, nationality, or any other characteristic.
No trolling. Do not engage in non-constructive behavior designed to upset members of the community.
Sexually explicit content must be behind a CW, and your bio (profile picture, banner etc) must be completely safe.
No inciting violence or promoting violent ideologies.
Donâ€™t go overboard with media uploads. Treating Famichiki as free personal file storage is inappropriate and disrespectful to our contributors.
No big corporate advertising or crypto. However, if you are active in the community and also have a project or small business to share, self-promotion is encouraged.

Bots are allowed, within reason. Spamming the local timeline with repetitive/nearly-identical content is not permitted: either set your bot posts to â€˜unlistedâ€™ or try botsin.space instead. Ask us if youâ€™re unsure!
Donâ€™t post or use this server for illegal content. We are aware of Japanâ€™s questionable laws regarding the protection of minors: â€˜illegalâ€™ here also covers all CSEM/CSAM.
Not your wank bank. Accounts with zero community interaction that only follow porn accounts will be banned. All accounts following CSAM (including art) will also be banned.

fairmove.net.text: Auf unseren Plattformen ist kein Platz fÃ¼r Rassismus, Sexismus oder Aufrufen zu Gewalt, Verleugnung gut abgesicherter wissenschatlicher Erkenntnisse oder Heilsversprechen durch simplifizierte LÃ¶sungen.

famille.social.text: Server moderated with kindness, you are free to speach unless you broke the french law or your speach needs high moderation reviews.

No porn, some nudity accepted.
We don't want to spend time moderating porn so no is allowed.

fandom.garden.text: Do not make hateful, discriminatory or bigoted statements, use abusive slurs or spread hate speech towards oppressed groups.
Do not engage in harassment of any kind.
Use content warnings, especially when talking about sensitive topics or if you are spoiling recent news in your fandom â€“ see more information in the Recommendation section above.
You can post nudity, as long as it is protected by the adequate content warnings. Pornography is restricted to followers-only posts from 18+ accounts. Pedopornography is forbidden.
Do not publish private conversations without explicit consent of all parties involved, except to the moderation team if you need to report them.
Do not crosspost (from another social network) on the public timelines.
Avoid "reposting", which is actually stealing art. Boost the original toot or, if the art is not from Mastodon, credit and link to the artist, and ideally also ask for their permission.

Do not create any sort of corporate account for advertising purposes. Artists are of course allowed (and encouraged!) to promote their own shops and commissions. Websites or podcasts relating to fandoms are encouraged as well.
Use of bots on this instance is submitted to admin authorization, including follow bots.
Boosting is held to the same standards as direct posting; only boost toots that respect these rules.

fandomonium.space.text: Be respectful to each other. Everyone is entitled to their own opinions, but please remember that we are showing appreciation to fan works here. You don't have to be a fan of everyone, but you also don't have to spread negativity. Such behavior is uncalled for, and may result in a ban.

This server aims to be as inclusive as possible. Fandom has many aspects to it, some of which can be controversial. Just because you may not agree with it does not mean that it should be outright banned. Mastodon offers filters for removing unwanted content.

Use hashtags where appropriate. Hashtags will be required if the content falls into one of the following categories:  -- Graphic depictions of violence (#violence)  -- Rape/non-con (#non-con)  -- Underage (#underage)  -- Adult material (#nsfw)

Also, tag any ships with the primary tag used in the fandom (I.E. #inukag for Inuyasha/Kagome from Inuyasha content). This will better help the content reach the desired audience and keep it away from those who do not want to see it.

NSFW content is allowed. However, it MUST be tagged (#nsfw) and be given a content warning. If the content is a photo, video, or some other form of visual content, all characters MUST be of legal age (18 or older).
Be kind and supportive of artists. Try your best to get approval from the artist before sharing their work and at the very least link to where you originally found it.

fandom.ink.text: All users must be 18 or over.

All users must use tools provided by the platform (e.g. blocking, muting, reporting) to curate their own experience. Users must not expect other users to do this work for them (e.g. via "DNIs", etc.).
Behaviors considered illegal, harassing, inappropriate, derogatory or harmful to marginalized persons, or otherwise against the Terms of Service or Code of Conduct, are never tolerated.
Bots must be marked as such, and must not make posts to public timelines more frequently than once per hour.
Accounts auto-crossposted from Twitter or other services may be suspended or limited, without warning, at the administrator's sole discretion.
Adult and erotic content must only be posted in conformance to the "Adult and erotic content" section of the Code of Conduct.
Inactive accounts (i.e. those that have not been accessed for a period of six months or more) may be deleted, without warning, at the administrator's sole discretion.

Be courteous to others. Posting obvious flame-bait to public timelines (e.g. shipwars, nuclear-level takes on the discourse du jour, etc.) may result in content or your account being limited or removed, without warning, at the administrator's sole discretion.
Users caught encouraging or teaching others to circumvent instance rules, the code of conduct, or the terms of service will be penalized as if they themselves had performed the violation in question.
The reposting of unmodified content from the users of other platforms (e.g. cross-posted retweets, reposted art, etc.) is prohibited. Please link to the original content, instead!

fanfou.social.text: Be respectful. All users are expected to treat each other with respect and kindness. Harassment, hate speech, and discrimination will not be tolerated.
No NSFW content. Users are prohibited from posting any sexually explicit or graphic content.
No spam. Users may not post repetitive or unsolicited content.
No illegal activities. Any content or behavior that is illegal or violates the Terms of Service will result in immediate account suspension.
No impersonation. Users may not impersonate other users or individuals.
No doxxing. Users may not post or share personal information of others without their consent.
Report violations. If you witness any violations of these rules, please report them to the moderators immediately.

fckmsk.social.text: Be Respectful: Treat others with kindness and respect. Disagreements are fine, but personal attacks, hate speech, and discriminatory language will not be tolerated.

Stay on Topic: Keep discussions related to tech, science, friendship, future, climate, and future-oriented subjects. Off-topic posts may be removed (normally not, but it can, if it violences other rules).
No Spam or Self-Promotion: Avoid excessive self-promotion and refrain from spamming. If you want to share your work or content, make sure it's relevant to the community.
Mindful Content Warning Usage: When posting sensitive or potentially triggering content, use content warnings (CWs) appropriately to ensure everyone can enjoy the platform comfortably.

Encourage Open-Mindedness: Embrace diversity of thought. Be open to different perspectives and engage in constructive discussions. Remember, learning from one another is a key aspect of our community.
Privacy Matters: Respect the privacy of others. Do not share personal information without consent, and be mindful of the digital footprint you leave behind.

No Hate Speech or Harassment: Hate speech, harassment, and any form of bullying will not be tolerated. This includes, but is not limited to, attacks based on race, ethnicity, gender, sexual orientation, religion, or disability.
Environmental Awareness: Recognize the importance of climate and sustainability. Discussions related to environmental issues should be approached with a positive and solution-oriented mindset.
Fact-Driven Discussions: Promote evidence-based discussions. When sharing information, cite sources where possible, and be willing to engage in discussions grounded in facts.
Community Building: Foster a sense of community and friendship. Reach out to others, share your knowledge, and participate in creating a positive and inclusive atmosphere.
Reporting and Moderation: If you come across content that violates these rules, report it to the moderators. Moderators will take appropriate action to ensure the community's well-being.

fed.sbcloud.cc.text: NO RACISM, SEXISM, OR OTHER DISCRIMINATION. PERIOD.

federate.blogpocket.com.text: Las publicaciones son moderadas. El Fediverso depende de instancias confiables, obedeciendo las jurisdicciones locales y prohibiendo el daÃ±o y el abuso.
El lenguaje y las conductas daÃ±inas y abusivas estÃ¡n estrictamente prohibidas.

En esta instancia se realiza una moderaciÃ³n activa contra cualquier comportamiento que atente contra las normas fundamentales de convivencia, especialmente aquellas relacionadas con el odio y la intolerancia.

federate.social.text: Posts are moderated. Our federation depends on being a trustworthy instance, obeying local jurisdictions, and prohibiting harm and abuse.
Harmful and abusive speech and behaviors include the language and tactics of the white supremacy movement and its affiliations are strictly prohibited and enforced.

Accounts and servers will be permanently banned for engaging in Sexual content involving minors, including artistic depictions, Gore and graphic violence, National Socialism, Nazism, Holocaust denial, Racism, Alt right, Gender-critical, Sex and gender discrimination, Transphobia, Misogyny
No crypto. Our federation depends on inhibiting the infiltration of capitalism into the processes of re-decentralizing the internet.

federated.press.text: Sexually explicit or violent media must be marked as sensitive when posting
No racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, xenophobia, or casteism
No incitement of violence or promotion of violent ideologies
No harassment, dogpiling or doxxing of other users
No content illegal in the United States
No spam, including commercial advertising/promotion and SEO
By joining federated.press, you agree to adhere to our Code of Ethics

federatedfandom.net.text: Don't be a dick. If you are, mods reserve the right to talk to you, suspend you temporarily, or suspend you permanently, in that order.
Self-promotion is fine but you should be fannish or friends with folks on this server. Do not join to promote commercial content.

Sexual content depicting characters who are not sexually mature is banned. "Underage" is a fungible category, we know this, do not post any content that could be described as shota/lolicon/etc. Prior to performing any account limiting activities, mods will contact you to discuss.

If you don't like what you are seeing, block or mute, report if it violates the rules, move on. Do not harass users about ship preferences in any way. NOTE: discussion of racism, homophobia, etc in fandom does not constitute harassment.
This is a server for the girls & the gays & seeks to provide a trans-inclusive, anti-racist space. We are not a space for right-wing fans.
By joining this server you are asserting that you are legally an adult in your country of residence.

Please use your best judgement when posting NSFW or other sensitive content such as posts about political violence, screenshots of right-wingers, etc. NSFW images must be marked as sensitive and a CW should be used.

Username format: Usernames can be alphanumeric and have underscores but dashes and other special characters are not allowed. This is enforced at the Mastodon software level so it's not a "rule" but we want you to know before you try to sign up. Thanks!

federation.p1k3.com.text: This instance runs on masto.host, and is thus bound by masto.host's ToS, which bar instances dedicated to racism, Nazi shit, transphobia, misogyny, incitement to violence, and the rest of the usual litany of horrors.

federated.glacier.dog.text: stay respectful to those around you, generally just bein' chill with others will let others be chill with us
dont post straight up nsfw, i could care less if you follow it but i am likely liable for the stuff you post and i don't really wanna deal with that

try and kinda sorta follow fediverse etiquette? put stuff that might set someone off behind a CW, n' try not to spam the timelines too much (if you need to post a huge thread, set the replies to unlisted!)

fediver.de.text: We do not tolerate discriminatory behaviour and content promoting or advocating the oppression of members of marginalised groups.
We do not tolerate threatening behaviour, stalking, and doxxing.
We do not tolerate harassment, including brigading, dogpiling, or any other form of contact with a user who has stated that they do not wish to be contacted.

Do not share intentionally false or misleading information. Verify your information is from a reliable source.
Expect anything you post on this server to be public, including direct messages, that way you can never be surprised or embarrassed.
No harassment or doxxing of other users.

Please use your account. Don't sign up and leave the poor thing quivering in the dark, hoping that you will use it to post something meaningful, inciteful, educational, funny, thoughtful, or prolific. If you don't log in after two months, you will receive a reminder to use your account.

fintech.eco.text: Must be part of the payments, banking, or fintech industry. If you do not work in one of the industries, please look to one of the many other servers that exist. There are HUNDREDS you can find: https://joinmastodon.org/servers or https://instances.social/.

Posts should primarily be focused on payments, banking, and fintech industry. It is okay to post on other topics of personal interest, but the goal here is a robust local feed about the industry and not politics, sports, pop culture, etc.

Only post links to articles if you are the author, mentioned in it, or in the Mastodon post you are adding your own commentary about the article. Simply posting news articles to generate content may be considered spam on FinTech.eco which could result in moderation actions including removal.

flokinet.social.text: FlokiNET reserves the right to suspend an account at any time if necessary

We do not tolerate harassment, including brigading, dogpiling, or any other form of contact with a user who has stated that they do not wish to be contacted.

fluff.land.text: Be respectful to identity and situations. The following behaviors will not be allowed: transphobia/homophobia/sexism/racism/etc, using slurs, hate speech, invalidating or gatekeeping somebody's identity, posting memes that violate any of the above

Respect others' privacy. The following behaviors will not be allowed: sharing or saving personal information without permission, dead-naming an individual or demanding information about dead-names, suggesting doxing or posting information with the intent to dox
Use content warnings for any triggering or content sensitive information and do what you can to contain content that is sensitive to those threads.
NSFW content should be appropriately marked. This includes: text or images depicting sex or sexual acts, general nudity, drug discussion, sex work discussion
This instance is 18+ only, but please specify in your bio that you do not want minors to follow you if you are posting directly NSFW content

Be respectful of othersâ€™ triggers. Discussion of triggering content is not banned here, however please use liberal use of content warnings if you believe something might trigger others. When in doubt, use spoilers and content warnings.
Be considerate of others' sensory issues. If a GIF or emoji you're posting could reasonably have some kind of seizure warning, please specify in the content warning tags.

The rules above are not all encompassing. If the mod team agrees on a ban due to behaviour that is destructive or against the spirit of the rules- even if it doesn't directly break a rule, a ban will still occur.

fosstodon.org.text: Do not use slurs or racist, sexist, homophobic, transphobic, ableist or otherwise discriminatory or hateful jokes or language or promote white supremacy, anti-Semitism, transphobia or other hateful ideologies.

Do not harass anyone, participate in group harassment of anyone, or otherwise engage in personal attacks. Posting or threatening to post other peopleâ€™s personally identifying information (â€œdoxingâ€) constitutes harassment.
Do not be intentionally antagonistic. A post or reply designed to provoke a confrontation is not acceptable.
Do not post adult content, including pictures containing nudity, or unwelcome sexual attention (including sexualized comments or jokes).

Do not post spam. Toots that are nothing other than a link and/or contain an inordinate number of hashtags are spam, as does any overly commercial self-promotion. (It is fine to toot about your own projects and share what you are excited to be working on â€” just keep the toot itself interesting).

Do not use automated tools to toot without participating in the community. It is fine to post with an automated tool so long as you are an active member of the Fosstodon community and respond to replies you receive here. Unmonitored accounts that post automatically are not acceptable.
Do not â€œshitpostâ€ - while humorous posts are allowed, and actually encouraged, there is no place for â€œshitpostingâ€ on Fosstodon.
Do not post about inflammatory, controversial subjects without a Content Warning.
Do not engage in name calling, ad hominem attacks, or any other uncivil behaviour; criticize ideas, never people.

Do not tone police. Toots may violate the standards of civility we set on Fosstodon, but you should not criticize users for their tone. Report them or feel free to block them. In neither case should you criticize their tone.

forum.virctuary.com.text: No promotion of violence, death, or anything else that can cause physical or mental harm. (Taking a side in an existing violent dynamic such as a war, or encouraging self defense, is excluded from this rule.)

ActivityPub means you do not have to be here to participate. If you're felt to be detrimental to the operation of our server, we may ask you to pick another server or create your own.

I do not want to have to judge whether characters in an image you've posted are inappropriate, or underage, etc. Do not put me in that position. Even if there's nothing wrong in my opinion with whatever you've drawn, copied, screenshotted, etc, I will ban you.

Use content warnings liberally, especially when covering topics involving real acts of violence and other harmful behavior.

Los idiomas romances escritos son fÃ¡cilmente inteligibles (con un poco de voluntad) y el inglÃ©s, nos guste o no, es idioma universal. Otros, como el euskera... bueno, para algo existen los traductores.

Se permite contenido ajeno a las temÃ¡ticas de la instancia, pero se espera que una buena parte estÃ© relacionado. Los temas potencialmente polÃ©micos se deben conducir con educaciÃ³n y respeto. Para estos temas se pide etiquetar con CW y con un hashtag para dar la opciÃ³n de filtrar el contenido.

El contenido sexual explÃ­cito no es temÃ¡tica de la instancia. Seamos responsables en marcar imÃ¡genes o ilustraciones con CW y #NSFW (no es lo mismo una estatua que un fanart subido de tono). El contenido que muestre o sugiera actividad sexual o desnudos de menores estÃ¡ absolutamente prohibido.

Las decisiones sobre moderaciÃ³n, normas y funcionamiento de la instancia se tomarÃ¡n de manera colectiva, mediante los procedimientos que se establezcan en cada momento, entre quienes estÃ©n colaborando en su mantenimiento.

No se bloquearÃ¡n instancias enteras, salvo que promuevan discriminaciÃ³n o acoso o en otros casos excepcionales (contenido sexual de menores...). Se silenciarÃ¡n si no hay moderaciÃ³n activa (se podrÃ¡n seguir cuentas, pero no saldrÃ¡n en los timelines publicos) y se bloquearÃ¡n las cuentas reportadas.

Para ayudar a la sostenibilidad de la instancia las cuentas inactivas podrÃ¡n ser dadas de baja despues de avisar al propietario y las cachÃ©s de recursos grÃ¡ficos se borrarÃ¡n periÃ³dicamente. Las nuevas altas que no sigan a nadie ni publiquen contenido en siete dÃ­as se consideran inactivas.
Solo se permiten cuentas bot si el perfil estÃ¡ claramente identificado y si se ha consultado previamente con los administradores de la instancia.

Las nuevas altas serÃ¡n por solicitud de registro o por invitaciÃ³n. En las solicitudes se exige que el campo "motivaciÃ³n" tenga un contenido mÃ­nimamente razonado (mÃ¡s de 2 palabras). Para poder distinguir bots, por favor usad la palabra "friki" o el hashtag "#nosoyunbot".

Media showing anything that is generally considered objectionable, particularly adult content, should be marked as sensitive and include a CW (content warning) explaining why it's marked sensitive.

furry.energy.text: Sexually explicit or violent media must be marked as sensitive when posting. Content warn (CW) anything you wouldn't see in general media and be kind with spoilers.
No racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, xenophobia, or casteism
No incitement of violence or promotion of violent ideologies
No harassment, spamming, dogpiling or doxxing of other users
Only share content that is legal in the United Kingdom AND your own country of origin.
Do not share intentionally false or misleading information
No ban evasion, NFT, AI Artwork, impersonation, hate or gore-centric accounts. Parody is ok if clearly labelled.
You must be 18+ to join this server. Read the House Rules & Extended Code of Conduct (https://furry.energy/about & https://furry.energy/privacypolicy)

furry.engineer.text: Rule #1 â€“ No illegal content or conduct. Content or conduct that is illegal in the United States is strictly prohibited.
Rule #2 â€“ Racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, and other discrimination is prohibited. Users who engage in such conduct are not welcome on our platform.
Rule #3 â€“ Donâ€™t stalk or harass other users. Respect other users of our service and other federated instances.

Rule #4 â€“ Misinformation and deceptive content is prohibited. Misinformation, scams, Ponzi schemes, and other deceptive tactics have become rampant on other platforms and we donâ€™t want to see a resurgence of it in the Fediverse.
Rule #5 â€“ Content warnings (CW) are required for NSFW content, political discussion and debate, religious promotion and debate, and drug mentions.
Rule #5.2 â€“ Don't put polarizing, graphic, or sensitive content in the content warning (CW) description.
Rule #6 â€“ Respect the service. Spam and advertising is not acceptable, but friendly automated bots are welcome.
Rule #7 â€“ Use the report system. If a user or instance is breaking the rules, we recommend just reporting the content and not engaging.

Rule #8.1 â€“ Account / post language identification. We require that all posts are properly marked with the language used, which can be done at the account level through the account preferences page, or per-post by clicking the language button next to â€œCWâ€ (Content Warning).

Rule #8.2 â€“ Misleading or deceptive impersonation. You may not impersonate an individual, group, or organization with the intent to deceive, confuse, and exploit other users. Parody accounts should tag themselves clearly in their profile description.

Rule #8.3 â€“ Bot accounts must mark themselves as a bot and must post using â€œUnlistedâ€, â€œFollowers onlyâ€, or â€œMentioned people onlyâ€, so we can keep the local and federated timelines clear and focused on users.

Rule #8.4 â€“ No brand or government-affiliated account may be registered on Pawb.Social services without prior written and publicly recorded approval, except furry fandom-operated brands and events covered by the exception in our full rules.
Rule #8.5 â€“ If you have been suspended from any Pawb.Social instance, you may not create another account on any of our services.
Rule #8.6 â€“ All avatars and header images must not contain any content that is prohibited by any other rule in the Code of Conduct, especially content that requires a Content Warning (CW).
The full Code of Conduct can be found at https://docs.google.com/document/d/1jXkulJKMWEmv-cb_jaYkG2L0sTcZeHKdcqwImNkf6Ko â€“ Some rules and wording listed here have been summarized for brevity.

furry.horse.text: ğŸ” No members under the age of 18.
Personal accounts only, no businesses or organisations.  Exceptions for directly furry businesses/organisations, eg artists, fursuit makers, conventions.
No advertising, sponsored content, or spamming.  Exceptions for first-party directly furry advertising, e.g. art, but don't spam.
No raffles that require boosting/following to enter.

furry.pet.text: Sexually explicit or violent media must be marked as sensitive and have a short content warning when posting.
No racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, xenophobia, or casteism
No incitement of violence or promotion of violent ideologies
No harassment, dogpiling or doxxing of other users
Do not share intentionally false or misleading information
Users registering on this instance must be at least 18 years old
You may not use an avatar if it has explicit content that would require a Content Warning
Don't repost artworks without crediting the artist. If you have a link to their gallery, perfect, if only their name, better than nothing. Claiming other's art as your own may lead to suspension.
Trying to be clever and skirting around the spirit of the rules will likely result in admin action

furs.town.text: by creating an account on this instance, you affirm that you are over 18 years old and/or legally adult.
please don't post or interact withâ€”i.e., replying, boosting, or favoringâ€”anything illegal in the laws of the United States; use your common sense.

we don't tolerate any content discriminating any individual on the grounds ofâ€”including, but not limited toâ€”race, ethnicity, national origin, religion, caste, sexual orientation, sex, gender, gender identity, serious diseases or disability, or immigration status.

any content targeting any individualâ€”whether they are on this instance or on other federated instancesâ€”with malicious intent is not allowed; this includes, but not limited to, harassment, gaslighting, spamming, or stalking. please be good to others.
adult (nsfw) contentâ€”excluding those listed under rule #6â€”is allowed, as long as it's masked under 'content warning' with a brief description; e.g., cw: blood.
absolutely forbidden: any content depicting or suggesting sexual exploitation of any MINOR, whether they be in-real-life human child or fictitious "cub."
always credit the rightful creator of the artwork, including a link to their profile is the best. or at least listing the creator name alone helps tremendously!

no impersonation of anyone, including one against any legal entities (a.k.a. businesses) unless you have a representing power of such entity. the only allowed exception shall be 'parody accounts' where the account is required to clearly specify in bio that the one is a parody account.

fusionpros.social.text: Don't be a dick. If you're about to do or say something you know will upset others - stop.

fursuit.me.text:
Be Furry be happy :)
Be it Fuzzy or scaly or squeaky

Respect others, their beliefs or orientations. 
No insults or flame wars.
Make sure to post nsfw and other content types that need it behind CW (Content Filters)

furs.social.text: No harassment or discrimination. This includes hate speech, cyberbullying, or any other behavior that targets or discriminates against someone based on their race, ethnicity, religion, gender, sexual orientation, or any other personal characteristic.

Keep it legal. Do not post illegal or copyrighted material, or engage in any illegal activity on the platform.

(This server is managed in the United States and hosted in Japan)

AI art is not allowed on this instance. This includes any art or media created using artificial intelligence or machine learning algorithms. Posts containing AI art will be removed and may result in the user being banned from the instance.
No impersonation or deceptive behavior. Do not pretend to be someone else, or use the platform to mislead or deceive others.
Mark all NSFW content with a content warning.

future-generation.social.text:
Be respectful, No harassment, bullying, discrimination, sexualization, spamming etc.
Whoever violates this will be kicked.

futuregadgetlab.cc.text: - Boosting will be treated the same as posting that content. Only boost stuff that is not against the rules.
- When interacting with other instances, you must follow our rules as well as the other instances rules.
- We won't support hateful speech or harassment on this instance, therefore it is forbidden.
- We support freedom of expression for everybody. Don't be disrespectful, regardless of your political views. However, freedom of expression has limits.
- Discrimination is not allowed. It does not matter whether you discriminate a majority or a minority or a single person.
Don't upload anything illegal / you haven't got rights on it, if anything illegal came from here, contact a member of staff or use the report button.

- Before clicking the report button, keep in mind that we can't fully take action when it comes to posts from outside of the instance, however your report can be sent anonymously to the original instance.
You must not upload anything illegal or material that you don't have the licence/copyright for.
With illegal, we mean: Content that is against any laws of Germany or the European Union.
You must not upload any form of pornography.
Always credit the artists of the art you post.
Other NSFW (that is not pornographic) material must be posted hidden using the spoiler button.

fwoof.space.text: Be considerate. Respect others and their viewpoints.
No drama! This is a drama free zone. We're all adults here.
No spamming. Sending a large amount of posts within a short period of time is not necessary and should be avoided if possible.
Be lawful. No posts about anything that is illegal or would have the FBI knocking at our doors, etc.
Use content warnings. On posts with common trigger warnings, E.G. Sexual, potentially violent, etc, try to use content warnings. This is a pretty loose rule, just be mindful.

gainer.cloud.text: Respect everyone: we actively moderate against racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia... Any kind of discrimination.
Any content that is illegal in UK, Ireland and EU is prohibited.
Do not gather information about our users by means of web scrapers or other software alike.
Dont Spam, occasional promotions are allowed but do not post constantly about them.
Adult content server: you are allowed to post sexually explicit content on here, as long as it will be accompanied by a content warning.
No minors are allowed on this server. Any participant is required to have a profile on grommr, chasabl, biggercity or another mastodon instance to be elligible to join.

No Saving pictures - All pictures on this site remain the sole owner of the people who take and publish them, anyone discovered saving any pictures without the owners permission will be permanently banned.
By Signing up to gainer.cloud you confirm that you are over 18, if you are not over 18 then please use another instance of mastodon.
No Nudity in profile pictures, topless is fine if you want but no genitals.

galbo.io.text: Mark sensitive content with a content warning.
Illegal content such as child pornography, unsurprisingly, is not permitted
Spam is not permitted, this includes creating spam accounts that only serve to provide profile links or advertise products and services.

Hate speech and abusive or threatening behavior is not permitted, specifically that which directed at any gender, nationality, religion, race, age, pizza topping preference, or sexual identity. One can hate on SBF all day long here tho.
You may not impersonate a person or brand without a clear indication the account is unofficial and/or a parody. Parody accounts are permitted, as are legitimate brand accounts.
Violating one or more of these rules may result in an immediate, permanent ban without notice or warning.

galaxy.quest.text: No discrimination, including (but not limited to) racism, sexism, homophobia or transphobia.
No explicit (NSFW) content without content warnings and/or sensitive media markers. Explicit content must not be used in user avatars or header images.
No harassment of other users on this or other servers.
No content illegal in the following locations: United Kingdom, European Union
No incitement of violence or promotion of violent ideologies.
No disinformation regarding public health issues or political/military campaigns.
No spam. This includes commercial advertising, promotional campaigns, and SEO.
No impersonation of other individuals, public figures or organisations, unless clearly marked as a parody.

gamedev.berlin.text: Treat everyone with dignity and respect, regardless of their background, identity or circumstances. This is a positive and supportive place - Please interact in a way that reflects these values.
Mark NSFW content as sensitive and keep avatars and header images SFW.

Report any inappropriate behavior to the server administrator.
The administrator can and will remove user accounts if abuse or malicious behavior is seen.
The primary languages allowed on the server are German and English.

Only post content that is legal within the EU.

Distribution of copyrighted material is prohibited - no uploads, no links.
Do not spread false or misleading information intentionally.

Uphold quality. No Spamming of any kind .
No automated posts by bots, unless approved by the server admin.

*WHY?* Due to how Mastodon works under the hood, boosting (retweeting) posts from other servers will cause their media attachments to be cached on this server. Storage is limited.

gamedev.lgbt.text: Be friendly and respectful to all members - No personal attacks, antagonizing, or harassment of any kind.
This is a positive and supportive place - Please interact in a way that reflects these values.
General statement - Black lives matter, trans rights are human rights, and if either of these make you uncomfortable, this is not the community for you. Hopefully one day it will be.
You must be part of or directly adjacent to the games industry

gamepad.club.text: Racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, and other forms of discrimination are not acceptable on this server, and we have a zero-tolerance policy against it.
Nudity and pornographic content is not permitted, including fan art and video game content. Posts that include this content will be removed.
Repeated, targeted harassment against an individual or group is unacceptable behaviour, and may lead to a temporary or permanent suspension
Spam, advertising and bot accounts are not permitted and will be removed.
Content that is illegal in the United Kingdom, Germany, or the United States is strictly prohibited.

Include why you want to join in your application so that we can tell you're a human and approve you!

(Make sure to check your spam folder for any approval email)

gamemaking.social.text: There is no tolerance for harassment or discrimination of any kind, directly or indirectly. For example: racism, ableism, homophobia, transphobia and TERF shit, fascism, general channer garbage, and so on.

We're here to encourage and support each other, and hopefully make pals (and make videogames less bad)!
I will remove accounts that: Are inactive for a year, haven't posted anything within two months of their creation, or are just here for promotion (it probably won't help FYI).
You must use content warnings following the usual Mastodon etiquette; for example for politics, 'adult'/lewd content, eye contact, food, mental health â€¦ if in doubt ask first please!

Content must be relevant to retro gaming topics

games.ngo.text: No NSFW content without properly tagging it as such.

gaminginthe.cloud.text: Posting content should generally not exceed a PG-13 threshold.  Please use NSFW for things you wouldn't want kids or your boss to see.  Do not block moderators to avoid being moderated.
No racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, xenophobia, or casteism.
No incitement of violence or promotion of violent ideologies.
No harassment, dogpiling or doxxing of other users.
Do not share false or misleading information that may lead to physical harm.
Agree to the Terms of Service and Code of Conduct.

Avoid boosting content from other servers that violates our rules, even if it doesn't violate the source server's rules. Reports for off-server content that violates our rules will result in those users being set to limited, and in extreme cases, defederation with that server.

gardenstate.social.text: No discrimination, including (but not limited to) racism, sexism, antisemitism, homophobia or transphobia.
No spam. Including ads for gambling.

gay.camera.text: You must be at least 18 years old.
Sharing / uploading illegal content means instant and permanent suspension of the account

Use sensitive media flag *and* content warning (CW) for NSFW media. No full-on nudity in avatars.

gaybdsm.group.text: You must be at least 18 years of age to use this server.

giesing.space.text: Respectful Communication: Encourage users to engage in respectful, constructive dialogue. No hate speech, harassment, or discrimination based on race, gender, sexual orientation, religion, etc.
No Spam: Prohibit spamming and unsolicited advertising. This includes repetitive posting, off-topic commercial posts, and disruptive behavior.

Content Guidelines: Set clear guidelines on content. This may include rules about NSFW (Not Safe For Work) content, graphic violence, or illegal activities. Clearly label and use content warnings where appropriate.
Privacy and Safety: Emphasize the importance of privacy. Do not allow doxxing (sharing private information without consent) or any form of threatening behavior.
Intellectual Property: Remind users to respect copyright laws and not to post content they do not have the rights to.

Moderation and Reporting: Inform users about the moderation process and how to report rule violations. Make it clear that rules are enforced and what actions (warnings, suspensions, bans) are taken against violators.
Be Responsible: Encourage users to take responsibility for their posts and interactions. Remind them that their posts are public and can have a real-world impact.
Local Laws and Regulations: Users must comply with local laws and regulations. Illegal activities are strictly prohibited.
No Impersonation: Prohibit users from impersonating others in a misleading or deceptive manner.
Community-Specific Rules: Include any additional rules specific to the nature and ethos of your community.

gluck.cc.text: Use empathy and respect. Remember that your words can have consequences and don't say anything here if you wouldn't say it to a friend. The culture here is different from Twitter or Facebook. Observe how people interact and try to behave as well or better than everybody else.

Stressful or triggering content should be marked with a content warning (CW). Mark any toxic posts with a descriptive CW to allow other members of the Fediverse to engage with it or not. Use the CW like the subject for a email to a large audience that some may not want to read.

Do NOT engage the trolls. Click "Report" on any posts that appear to include content which is illegal in USA, malware, pedophilia, child pornography, piracy, misogyny, hate speech, anti-LGBTQIA+, fascism, harassment, racism, or ableism. Otherwise, mute or block anybody who offends or annoys you.

Expect pruning of old data. Data entered into this server is stored temporarily and I do not plan to provide a long-term archive. Retention is currently set to store content for 90 days but Iâ€™ll adjust retention depending on costs.

Mind your gigabytes. Upload your videos to another platform like YouTube or PeerTube and post links instead of uploading video here. Donâ€™t upload more than ~60 photos per month until we understand the storage costs. Thanks.
Cite sources, credit others. Images and media should be annotated. Where the material is not yours, source attribution should be provided, preferably with a link to the original.

We recommend using descriptions for images and video (ALT tag) to be inclusive of those with vision issues.
Challenging the community with critical ideas and good thought partnering is welcome, ass holes are not - be respectful during dialogue or debate.
No hate or targeted harassment of any other user, regardless of what side of an issue you reside on.
Accounts for and/or promoting proprietary products are prohibited. You may make accounts for and/or to promote Free Software products, whether commercial or otherwise.
We respect the individual freedom of the community member in deciding whether reposts are endorsements or otherwise, and whether the content they post should contain a warning.

grandma.space.text: If someone asks you to stop, STOP. Ignoring such a request, especially from a mod, will result at minimum in a timeout.
If there is an issue, use the reporting tools so moderators and admins can handle it.

No bigotry or harassment. grandma.space has a ZERO TOLERANCE policy for the instigation or perpetuation of hateful speech and ideology, disrespect of its members or staff, incendiary behavior, or other such inappropriate conduct.
Provide appropriate content warnings on potentially sensitive posts and use nsfw tags liberally on adult images, spoilers, and other content that not everyone may want to see.
Current event discussion is permitted but you are highly encouraged to use a current event or politics content-warning.

graz.social.text: Keine rassistische, sexistische, homophobe, transphobe, beeintrÃ¤chtigtenfeindliche und anderweitig diskriminierende oder hasserfÃ¼llte Sprache. "Starke Sprache" muss mit einer Inhaltswarnung versehen werden.
Kein BelÃ¤stigung einzelner Personen durch ungewÃ¼nschte Kontaktaufnahme, Stalking oder Doxing.
Keine BeitrÃ¤ge, die in der Republik Ã–sterreich oder in der EuropÃ¤ischen Union gegen geltendes Recht verstoÃŸen.

Nicht jugendfreie BeitrÃ¤ge mÃ¼ssen als solche gekennzeichnet werden.

graphics.social.text: No advocating violence. Do not engage in harassment, including but not limited to bullying, stalking, and unwanted sexual advances.
No bigotry of any kind. Including but not limited to: racism, homophobia, transphobia, ableism, ageism, fascism, nationalism, colonialism, white supremacy, or religious extremism.
No hacking. Do not engage in unauthorized access or abuse of the server's systems or data.
No pornography. It's just not that kind of instance, find another home on the fediverse.

No deceptive content. Do not post deceptive or misleading content, including but not limited to impersonation, phishing, misinformation and explicitly: cryptocurrency, multilevel marketing scams, NFTs and anti-vax misinformation.

No illegal content. Do not post illegal content, including but not limited to child pornography, non-consensual pornography, threats of violence, incitement to commit violent acts, and any content that violates the DMCA.
No doxxing. Do not share personal information about others without their consent.
Be kind, don't be a jerk. It's what all these other more specific rules are trying to define.

No scraping the contents of this site for machine learning training. That includes using any text, image, video or audio posted for training, testing, or general use with artificial intelligence, including but not limited to large language models like GPT and neural networks.

Don't send any sensitive, personal, or private information, even via DM, you are not comfortable posting publicly.

greenmushroomnetwork.masto.host.text: Respect and Reciprocity. Don't be a dick. No hate speech. No bullying. No generally disruptive unpleasantness! No tolerance.

Seriously, no bullshit. If you feel confused about what behavior is acceptable, please feel free to ask. We want to have a fun, open, and safe community, so we won't be shy about banning people who creep us out!
The Green Mushroom Network is an 18+ instance. Please do not join if you are under 18 years of age. Additionally, please do not post photos of individuals under 18 years of age. No exceptions.

Feel free to share about your practice, your art projects, and other stuff you're excited about (even if it's not directly related to network). Part of the goal of the project is to help people access occult technology and to build community.
If a CW or ALT is requested on a post, be civil and perform request.  If you don't know how, ask.

growers.social.text: Sexually explicit or violent media should not be posted, there are other options better suited for this.
No racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, xenophobia, or casteism.
No incitement of violence or promotion of violent ideologies.
No harassment, dogpiling, or doxxing of other people.
Use a content warning when sharing news items or politically related media. We're here to be social and respectful, politics can be an unwieldy beast and we'd really appreciate not dealing with it.

When creating an account here note the service is still small and self-funded. I'm don't soliciting payments for this service and intend to keep this running as best as I can. Service interruptions can happen and in this case, I will try my best to bring everything back online as soon as possible.

gruene.social.text: Achte die WÃ¼rde deiner Mitmenschen und Mitnutzer*innen
Beachte die geltenden Gesetze, insbesondere das Urheberrecht, das PersÃ¶nlichkeitsrecht und den Datenschutz.

Solltest du Inhalte, insbesondere Ton, Video und Bild, verÃ¶ffentlichen, die andere verstÃ¶ren kÃ¶nnten, beispielsweise durch Darstellung von Gewalt, verwende bitte die Inhaltswarnung-Funktion ("Als heikle Medien markieren")

grumble.social.text: No bigotry. Any form of bigotry is grounds for account termination. Since I vet everyone the chance of this happening is exceedingly low, but I want it to be explicit. Also: TERFs and nazis fuck off.
Don't be a dick. There's no value to it. It just makes you a dick.
Post in good faith. If you assume someone is posting in bad faith... well, your reply will probably also be in bad faith. So just don't.
Don't dog-pile. There's no value in it, it doesn't make the world a better place. No one wants to see it, and it's a waste of your own time.
Vet your content. Looking at you metal folk. No one wants to see known white supremacists boosted, so if you get called out for it, that's on you.

Unfollow/mute/block and move on. While I encourage using CWs for trauma triggers, there is no expectation of CWs for topical content. If someone is posting content you don't want to see, remove them and move on.
Don't post anything illegal in the EU, because that's where this site is hosted and doing so risks me simply taking the server entirely offline to avoid any legal issues.

guild.combinehonnete.com.text: Be civil. Even if you disagree with someone.

Harassment, bullying, and antagonization will result in an immediate ban.
If using an artist's work in your post, always give credit to said artist.

Accounts that post sexual depictions of minors (this includes loli), content such as holocaust denial or Nazi symbolism, and conduct promoting the ideology of National Socialism will be immediately banned.

hellinger.wtf.text: Respect for All: We are committed to maintaining a community where everyone, regardless of their gender identity, sexual orientation, race, religion, or background, is treated with respect and dignity.

Harassment-Free Zone: Harassment in any form, including but not limited to, bullying, stalking, and unwanted advances, is strictly prohibited. We strive to create a safe space where everyone can communicate freely without fear of harassment.

No Political Extremes: While respectful political discussions are welcome, this is not a space for extreme political views, hate speech, or promoting divisive ideologies. Let's keep our conversations constructive and inclusive.

Report Violations: If you witness or experience any violations of these rules, please report them to the moderators. We rely on the community to help us keep this space safe and welcoming for everyone.

Moderation and Enforcement: Moderators are here to enforce these rules and ensure a positive environment. Violations can result in warnings, temporary suspensions, or permanent bans, depending on the severity.

hive.institute.text: No discrimination based on race, gender, sexual orientation, disability, ethnicity, religion, physical appearance, or national origin.
No xenophobia, violent nationalism, nazi symbolism, holocaust denialism, or promotion of violent ideologies.
No stalking, harassment, dogpiling, doxxing, or brigading of users on this and/or other servers.

No content which is illegal in the United States.

hobbs-end.uk.text: Do unto others as you think they would want done to them.
Mark sensitive content with a content warning.
Gratuitous obscenity that serves no practical benefit to a discussion is not permitted.
Illegal content such as child pornography, unsurprisingly, is not permitted
Spam is not permitted, this includes creating spam accounts that only serve to provide profile links or advertise products and services.

Hate speech and abusive or threatening behavior is not permitted, specifically that which directed at any gender, nationality, religion, race, age, pizza topping preference, or sexual identity. One can hate on systemd all day long here.
Lack of a specific rule against a certain behavior does not indicate acceptance of that behavior. Each of us has a limited amount of time in this world. Don't be a jerk.
Violating one or more of these rules may result in an immediate, permanent ban without notice or warning.
You may not impersonate a person or brand without a clear indication the account is unofficial and/or a parody. Parody accounts are permitted, as are legitimate brand accounts.
No attacks against (or from) the instance. You may not do anything which may impact confidentiality, integrity or availability of Hobbs-End.uk, the users of the service or their data.

holonet.social.text: Embrace Harmony (Respect Others): There is no room for emotional turmoil on Holonet Social. Strive for tranquility and foster an atmosphere of peace among all users.

Illuminate the Path (No Discrimination or Hate Speech): Ignorance has no place within our galactic community. Encourage the pursuit of knowledge, sharing wisdom and insights to enlighten and uplift one another.
Cultivate Serenity (No Harassment): Passion may fuel the stars, but seek serenity. Let calmness be your guide when interacting on Holonet Social.

Seek Enlightenment (No Spam): The pursuit of personal gain is not the way of Holonet Social. Instead, channel your energy towards acquiring knowledge and enlightenment, nurturing your own growth and that of others.
Embrace the Living Force (No Bots): A sentient being must create and maintain all accounts on Holonet Social. Automated droids will be disconnected from the network.
Guard the Peace (Report Issues): As members of Holonet Social, we bear the duty of safeguarding peace within our galaxy. Be vigilant and report issues to the Magistrate.

hoosier.social.text: Hoosier.Social is inclusive to everyone of all ages, nations, races, genders, faiths, and creeds.  Racism, sexism, homophobia, and transphobia (including misgendering, deadnaming, or promotion of so-called "conversion therapy") are forbidden & posts that violate this rule will be removed.
Please keep our space safe for all and family friendly. No spamming. No personal attacks. Your opinions are welcome, but we encourage thoughtful conversation over provocation.

Hoosier.Social Admins have unilateral authority and judgment over users that violate rules.  Users can be immediately suspended without appeal.  Admins will de-federate any servers whose users act as a group to harass or attack this server or our users.
Users should not assume privacy on this server or anywhere on Mastodon. It's not designed to be private. Assume that anything you post here, including direct messages, are publicly visible.
These rules can be changed or updated at any time by Hoosier.Social Admins.
By joining Hoosier.Social you agree to these rules.

im-in.space.text: Don't be a d*ck, respect the others (no hate speech, racism, sexism, homophobia and transphobia) and fight in direct messages.

Please keep bad memes or any political incorrect stuff out of the public timeline.  
Feel free to use the "unlisted", "private" or "direct" visibility options when talking between friends and with people who are okay about that.

Not safe for work (NSFW) content is allowed if you put it behind both a #NSFW tag and add a content warning (the "CW" button below the message text box). 
Content depicting sexualized minors (including drawn, a.k.a. loli/shota), self-harm, gore and rape is not allowed.
As stated in our ToS you must be 16 of age or more to use this instance.
Don't make parody accounts or try to impersonate someone or a group.

Accounts for for-profit companies or used for advertising only, SEO boosting, or SPAM will be suspended.
If you truly want to participate in the Fediverse, please ask the admin for permission before joining.

Please do not use a public anonymizer email service (like temporary boxes or forwarders). 
You will be asked to change your email under a time limit or will be suspended. Self-hosted forwarders are exempt of this rule.
No promotion of cryptocurrencies or NFTs. Commenting on the surrounding news about it is still allowed.

Please put politics and activism behind CWs when posting with the "public" visibility. A few times is OK but repetitive ignorance of this rule will result in a limitation of visibility of your account.
Respect Switzerland's (owner's country) and Germany's (server location) laws.

india.goonj.xyz.text: Be civil. No trolling, microaggressions, or harassment.
No NSFW content without Content Warning
Illegal content including pornography is not permitted.
Hate speech is not permitted at all.

indieapps.space.text: Please do not request personal accounts. Only accounts dedicated to apps!
Please setup a verified link to your app's website in each account on indieapps.space.
Do not use your account for information unrelated to your app.
Use your app account only for news, announcements, tips, and user support (through unlisted or direct messages) for your app.
Only apply for account for apps developed by independent individuals or small teams.

indieauthors.social.text:
Be restrained with opinions not related to indie publishing, indie authors, and indie books. 

Posts, debates, or opinions making judgments on people's lifestyles, beliefs, personal identification, political affiliation, etc. are subject to moderation.
Be tolerant. This server will not condone, support, or allow intolerant or hateful communications of any kind.
Don't post copyrighted material unless you are the copyright holder or it falls under Fair Use w/attribution.

Be reasonably active. Indie Authors Social is an active and passionate community of Authors-Helping-Authors. Accounts will be suspended from this instance for prolonged periods of inactivity and:  no profiles, no links, no posts., no follows.
Abide by US law for content posted or attached to messages.

indiepocalypse.social.text:
Free speech does not mean freedom from consequences.

No racism, sexism, queerphobia, transphobia, xenophobia or bigotry of any kind are allowed.
Indiepocalypse has a zero-tolerance policy for harassment, dogpiling, bullying or doxxing.
No NFTs, no crypto, no blockchain. There are crypto-related instances on the Fediverse that are better suited.
The following content will be removed and will result in revocation of access to the service: sexual depictions of minors, beastiality, and promotion of Nazi symbolism and ideology.
Promotion of your games, projects and storefronts *are* allowed and encouraged, but spam is not. Do *not* directly message users to advertise.
Bots need to be approved by the admins or moderators of Indiepocalypse before being allowed.

Sexually explicit or violent media must be marked as sensitive an/or hidden under a Content Warning (CW) when posting. Because they cannot be marked, all avatars, headers, and bio content must be appropriate for all audiences.
Accounts for groups / organizations / brands / sites / doujin circles, et. al are welcome as long as they are indie. If you question if your group is "indie", feel free to ask!
AI-created and AI-altered art and writing is generally **not** allowed on this instance. There are valid ethical concerns regarding what material is being used to train models for AI bots.

indiehackers.social.text: DO interact with others as if you're at a friend's party: be polite, inquisitive, supportive, observant and all the other nice things that make parties great. And above all: have fun!
DO NOT ruin your friend's party by being nasty, obnoxious, hateful and all the other things that will get you ejected from a party.

indieweb.social.text: No spam or excessive self-promoting in posts.
No bots that are not labeled as such in their profile.
Keep conversations civil and respectful even in disagreement.
No racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, xenophobia, anti-Semitism, or casteism (including targeted misgendering, deadnaming, or promotion of so-called "conversion therapy").
No sexually explicit or violent posts or media allowed
No incitement of violence or promotion of violent ideologies

indigenousgulf.online.text: This instance is for Indigenous Mississippi River Delta/Gulf Coast organizations and community members to connect! Please respect that.

This instance does not allow bigotry and hate speech. You will be evicted from this digital community if found to be doing so. No racism, gender or sexuality based hate, body shaming, antisemitism, etc.
No punching down or lateral violence please.
Please describe your images as much as possible for accessibility to screen readers and the like.

Use common sense with Content Warnings (CWs). Tag potentially triggering conversations, intense politics (both as you see fit), solicitation, violence, and nudity/kink content. Tag anything lewd, or 'NSFW'- things inappropriate for an office environment.

inductive.space.text: No content that is illegal in Germany. No spam. No pornography.
Read and adhere to the Berlin Code of Conduct. https://berlincodeofconduct.org

Use content warnings for spoilers or sensitive subjects such as sexual content, violence, mental health, et cetera. Err on the side of caution, but please don't use content warnings as general subject line, use hashtags on top of your posts instead.
Please add captions to all images where reasonably feasible.
No commercial accounts, such as accounts used mainly for advertising a commercial entity, without approval.
No automated content, such as bots or crossposters, without approval.
Main posting languages should be English, German and Dutch (I can't moderate effectively if I don't understand large parts of the posts).

infosec.exchange.text: Do unto others as you think they would want done to them.
Mark sensitive content with a content warning.
Gratuitous obscenity that serves no practical benefit to a discussion is not permitted.
Illegal content such as child pornography, unsurprisingly, is not permitted
Spam is not permitted, this includes creating spam accounts that only serve to provide profile links or advertise products and services.

Hate speech and abusive or threatening behavior is not permitted, specifically that which directed at any gender, nationality, religion, race, age, pizza topping preference, or sexual identity.  One can hate on systemd all day long here.
Lack of a specific rule against a certain behavior does not indicate acceptance of that behavior.  Each of us has a limited amount of time in this world.  Don't be a jerk.
Violating one or more of these rules may result in an immediate, permanent ban without notice or warning.
You may not impersonate a person or brand without a clear indication the account is unofficial and/or a parody. Parody accounts are permitted, as are legitimate brand accounts.

No attacks against (or from) the instance.

You may not do anything which may impact confidentiality, integrity or availability of Infosec.Exchange, the users of the service or their data.
For more details see https://wiki.infosec.exchange/rules/start
No doxing (aka doxxing) or disclosing personal information without consent and as a means of harassing or causing others to harass another person.
No harassment in the form of continued engagement after a person has requested contact to stop

Automated posting:
- accounts that post >50% using automation must be labeled as a â€œbotâ€ in the user profile to help provide a visual indicator to visitors
- automated posts must be limited to one post per hour/24 per day with post visibility set to â€œpublicâ€. There is no limit on â€œunlistedâ€ posts.

isocial.cloud.text: Using a disposable email address is not permitted.
"It is prohibited to buy, sell, or transfer any account."
Please ensure that all bot accounts are properly marked and identified.
Do not Interfere with, disrupt, or create an undue burden on the Site or the networks or services connected to the Site.
Harassing, annoying, intimidating, or threatening any of our admins or agents engaged in providing any portion of the Site to you is strictly prohibited.
Don't bypass Site restrictions, including restricted sections. We take security seriously and need your cooperation to maintain a safe platform.
Copying or modifying the Site's software, which includes Flash, HTML, PHP, JavaScript, CSS, Ruby, PostgreSQL, and Redis, is strictly prohibited.

Violence, harassment, and other similar types of behavior discourage people from expressing themselves and ultimately diminish the value of global public conversation. Our rules are to ensure all people can participate in public conversation freely and safely.

The following content is prohibited on our platform: Violent Speech, Violent and Hateful Entities, Sexual Exploitation, Abuse/Harassment, Hateful Conduct, Perpetrators of Violent Attacks, Sensitive Media, Illegal or Regulated Goods or Services.

Private Information: You may not publish or post other people's private information (such as home phone number and address) without their express authorization and permission. We also prohibit threatening to expose private information or incentivizing others to do so.
You must not infringe on the intellectual property rights of others, including their copyright and trademarks.
It is prohibited to create accounts with the intention of replacing or imitating a suspended account.
"It is unacceptable to impersonate an admin or a system account."
We will maintain certain data that you transmit to the Site for the purpose of managing the performance of the Site, as well as data relating to your use of the Site.
Although we perform regular routine backups of data, you are solely responsible for all data that you transmit or that relates to any activity you have undertaken using the Site.

You agree that we shall have no liability to you for any loss or corruption of any such data, and you hereby waive any right of action against us arising from any such loss or corruption of such data.

You agree that by accessing the Site, you have read, understood, and agreed to be bound by all of these Terms of Use. IF YOU DO NOT AGREE WITH ALL OF THESE TERMS OF USE, THEN YOU ARE EXPRESSLY PROHIBITED FROM USING THE SITE AND YOU MUST DISCONTINUE USE IMMEDIATELY.

journme.social.text: Respect for All: Treat every member with kindness and respect. No harassment, bullying, or discriminatory language.
Constructive Conversations: Engage in discussions constructively. Avoid aggressive or confrontational behavior.
Privacy and Safety: Do not share others' private information. Respect each individual's privacy and safety.
No Hate Speech: We strictly prohibit hate speech, including racist, sexist, homophobic, or transphobic comments.
Appropriate Content: Share content that's appropriate for a diverse audience. No explicit, violent, or disturbing material.
Intellectual Property: Respect copyright and intellectual property rights. Share only content you have the right to use.
Follow Local Laws: Abide by your local laws and regulations. No promotion of illegal activities.
Report Misconduct: Encourage reporting rule violations. Foster a community that self-monitors and supports moderation.
Positive Engagement: Encourage positive and constructive engagement. Promote a culture of learning and sharing.
Community Spirit: Embrace the spirit of the community. Contribute positively and help foster a welcoming environment.

julialang.social.text: By being here, you agree to follow the Julia Language Code of Coduct: https://julialang.org/community/standards/
Please do not use overtly sexual language or imagery.
Do not attack anyone based on any aspect of personal identity, including gender, sexuality, politics, religion, ethnicity, race, age, or ability.

Keep in mind that what you write or say in public forums is read or heard by many people who don't know you personally, so please refrain from making prejudiced or sexual jokes and comments â€“ even ones that you might consider acceptable in private.
Ask yourself if a comment or statement might make someone feel unwelcomed or like an outsider.

In particular, do not sexualize the term "Julia" or any other aspects of the project. While "Julia" is a female name in many parts of the world, the programming language is not a person and does not have a gender.
All participants in the Julia community are expected to respect copyright laws and ethical attribution standards. This applies to both code and written materials, such as documentation or blog posts.
Materials that violate the law, are plagiaristic, or ethically dubious in some way will be removed from officially-maintained lists of resources.

If you believe one of these standards has been violated, you can either file an issue on an appropriate repository or confidentially contact the Julia Stewards at stewards@julialang.org. Keep in mind that most mistakes are due to ignorance rather than malice.

Be concise. Constructive criticism and suggestions are welcome, but high-traffic forums do not generally have the bandwidth for extensive discourse. Consider writing a blog post if you feel that you have enough to say on a particular subject.

We welcome the participation of researchers of all kinds in the Julia community. However, please remember that open source development is a social process and that the participants on the other side of any interaction are (obviously) humans.

If you are doing research on the community or its processes, you are likely performing Human Subjects Research (HSR) and are expected to abide by the highest standards of ethics and professional practice. Meeting this expectation is your responsibility.
We consider engaging in unethical research (human subject or otherwise) to be a cause for bans or other sanctions from the community.

The Julia community is built on a foundation of reciprocity and collaboration. Be aware that most community members contribute on a voluntary basis, so ideas and bug reports are ok, but demands are not.
If you have a conflict or concern that requires resolution, please contact the Julia Community Stewards

kei.fashion.text: The minimum age to join this server is 16 years old. If found to be younger, you will be banned.

Racial slurs, discrimination against gender and sexual minorities (including trans-exclusionary radical feminism), ableism, fatmisia, xenophobia and/or violent nationalism, and targeted harassment of any other kind is not allowed. Accounts flagged will be investigated and banned from the server.
Copyright protections still apply to images and other content. Please cite sources when reposting content. Content may be removed if the original creator requests.

DDLG, kink, sexual harassment, sexual interaction with minors, and other sexually explicit content is absolutely unpermitted on this server and are bannable offenses. This includes boosts to the server.
NSFW content is allowed but it cannot be sexually explicit content and must be properly tagged #NSFW and marked as sensitive with appropriate content wrappers.
No flooding of public timelines (making public posts in quick succession) You will potentially be flagged for spam.
Coordinate criticism is not allowed as default unless EXPLICITLY REQUESTED by the original poster.
Discussion & images regarding print replicas outside of an educational context (contrasts between original & fakes, how to avoid buying fakes, verifying a fake, etc.) are not permitted.
No NFTs, cryptocurrency, or AI content is allowed.
The rules of harassment apply to users on other servers as well. If you're reported for harassment by other admins or server users, you will be investigated and potentially banned.

KEY BISCAYNE ONLY. This is a server for the Key Biscayne community. This is a loosely-defined term, and includes residents, former residents, and others with a demonstrable nexus of community involvement.
No ad hominem attacks. An idea may be criticized in the harshest terms, but it's always the idea, not the person that is the subject of debate.
This is a fact based site. Do not propagate misinformation or disinformation

Don't harass anyone, especially the moderators. Harassment can be tough to define, but any slur or prejudicial comment based on identity will be removed. Repeated harassment will result in suspension.
Do not encourage violence, either implicitly or explicitly.

Real ID. This server (or "instance," in Mastodon-speak) relies on real IDs.  So, we need you to have a photo or avatar and either a real-name username or make clear who you are, etc in your bio. If youâ€™d rather remain anonymous, lots of other servers support that.
