kiddush.social.text: What is hateful to you, do not do to your fellow; the rest is commentary
No harassment, trolling, brigading, dogpiling, or doxxing
No antisemitism or promotion of antisemitic tropes
No promotion of discriminatory or supremacist ideologies of any kind
No use of slurs or other hateful language
No pornographic, erotic, or â€œshockâ€ content
No threats of, or incitement to, violence

kind.social.text: Don't be an asshole, and don't post anything illegal. Those concepts guide most other rules & moderation.
No racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, antisemitism, ableism, harassment, or other hateful conduct. Please, also report it whenever seen.

Content Warnings & Sensitive Media labels are required for depictions of nudity, bloodshed, or extreme harm (NSFW.)
CWs, Alt Text, & PascalCase hashtags are encouraged to improve everyone's experiences, especially disabled users. However, policing or bullying people to use them is unacceptable.

No big corporate advertising, spam, or accounts.
No crypto advertising, spam, or accounts.
No "AI" advertising, spam, or accounts.
However, small businesses & independent creators, along with their self-promotion, are welcomed and encouraged.

Automated & Bot accounts must be labeled as such. If the account will be regularly posting more than 3 times a day, posts should be set as Unlisted by default to prevent clogging up the Local timeline.

Check out the admin's Pinned Posts for new user info like: app suggestions, moderation principles, Mastodon norms, & more. The admin's profile can be found at https://kind.social/@Texan_Reverend
If you have questions or want help configuring your account & app, Texan_Reverend is only an @ away.

kinky.business.text: Exclusively 18+. Zero tolerance for underage or otherwise illegal content.
Keep everything here consensual. No exceptions.
Do not flood the server with posts. No more than a small number of pictures in rapid succession. Violating it will get you silenced or suspended.
If you're posting a picture that's not yours, attribute it correctly. We like original content (text, pics, etc.) 100 times more than random porn off the Internet.
Use sensitive media flag *and* content warning (CW) for NSFW media. No full-on nudity in avatars.
Respect each other, absolutely no hate speech

You're here to *be* here - the main purpose of an account on this instance should be to contribute to the community, not advertising a business or directing traffic elsewhere. Any advertisements should be unlisted or follower only.

kinktroet.social.text: Kein Hate Speech, kein Rassismus (Race Play okay, aber bitte passend taggen).
#NSFW-Bilder bitte immer so kennzeichnen und mit #ContentWarning versehen.

kinkycats.org.text: Sexually explicit or violent media must be marked as sensitive when posting. Erotic art and nude content can be posted without content warning or marked as sensitive but it should not display sexual acts. Underage and animal abuse content is forbidden.
No racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, xenophobia, or casteism.
No harassment, dogpiling or doxxing of other users.
Do not share intentionally false or misleading information.
No incitement of violence or promotion of violent ideologies.
Do not spam or burst post-boost. Bot accounts should be limited to 1 post per hour.

kinkyelephant.com.text: Don't be a dick. Being nice to each other is the most important rule of this instance.
Don't post stuff you don't have the rights to without permission. This is a creator-friendly instance.
Hywel is running this instance out of his own pocket for BDSM models, producers and fans. If you don't like the way this instance is run, start your own. That's what Mastodon is for :-)
If you post illegal stuff, you're out.

Please mark "Not Safe For Work" (NSFW) content with the eye button for images AND the CW button for text. It is important to DO BOTH for every post so vanilla users on other instances know what they are getting.

kinney.social.text: For the Kinney family. Accounts require a valid @kinney.io email address.

kirbyfediverse.masto.host.text:
18+ to Join this server
(This is to make data handling and legal requirements easier on us)
I understand that this fandom is appealing to kids, but we're aiming to make a (SFW) safe space for adults, and that could cause issues with minors. Besides, social media is DANGEROUS

No Pornography
(This makes legal requirements easier)
This includes artistic nudity featuring genitals, buttocks, breasts, acts of sexualization, acts reasonably considered fetishtic. If in doubt, mark sensitive, and add a Content Warning. This applies to all posts, even text only.

No Harrassment. 

This includes harrassing based on protected characteristics such as race, gender, biological sex, gender expression, romantic and sexual attraction, class, disability, nationality, and attempts to reduce peoples ability to celebrate and be proud of who they are.

No Harrassment. Again.   
We will also take action against those harrassing Sex Workers, NSFW artists and shippers. We will take action AGAINST people harrassing others for creating proship/profic/shocking art/stories. Ths Server is SFW, but it will be a safe space for these people.

CW and Tag All Ships      
If you are creating shipping art/fanfic, use the #ShippingContent tag, and provide a CW to mention the characters being shipped. This way, people who don't want to see certain ships, don't have to. This applies to ALL ship content, no matter who is being shipped.

Don't Like, Don't Look   
If a CW tells you something may be triggering to you (creepy crawlies, a ship you dislike) and you decide to look anyways, that's on you. Action will be taken against your account if you retaliate against the content creator, including sub-tooting.

Don't publically callout 
Instead, send the info to a moderator or admin. If we deem it necessary, we will take action. Mob/vigilante justice will NOT be tolerated, as it leads to harrassment. Public Callouts, especially for smaller things, are a source of harrasment, and thus a form of such.

Enjoy The Kirby Franchise.             
While off-topic content is fine, at least some toots you make should be about the Kirby fandom. Also, don't come here to hate all the time. You can feel free to vent (with a CW), and provide critique about Kirby, but show the series some love.

Offsite/Past behaviour   
Rules 2,5,8 do not apply off this instance.
Rules 3,4,6,7 apply off this instance, AND RETROACTIVELY. If you've harrassed someone who's on here, they have the right to demand an apology / retraction, both here and on the site of harrassment.

Have fun                                 
As this world and internet gets scarier, it's important to be able to relax and have fun. We hope this will be a place where that can happen.

kitsunet.net.text:
Please put all NSFW content behind a content warning.
Multiple violations can lead to suspension from Kitsunet.

Please put anything that could hurt, offend or trigger someone else, behind a content warning.
A good guideline to follow is if you have any doubts whether or not some content should be behind a CW, place it behind a CW.

Nazis, alt-righters and fascists of any kind, need not apply.
You will be suspended when discovered.

Members of hate sites like ED or KF also need not apply.
On discovery of co-membership of a hate site, you will be banned.

This is an adult instance.  People under 18 should apply when they become 18. 
Anyone found under 18 will be blocked from the instance.   You may re-apply to Kitsunet when you become 18.

This is not a place that will tolerate hate speech, or hate on other members.
Infractions will be counted, and more than 2 will get you banned.

Trolling other people in the fediverse will not be tolerated.
Instances will be counted and more than 3 can lead to suspension.
Exposure of private or personal information of other members without their expressed consent, visible to a moderator or admin, will lead to immediate suspension from the instance.

NO Photos or real-life pictures of underage persons engaging in inappropriate or sexual acts.
Infractions will lead to immediate suspension from Kitsunet and reporting to the authorities to the best of our ability.

NO Disrespecting of a members given gender pronouns, particularly if listed in their profile.
Multiple infractions may lead to suspension from Kitsunet, depending on severity and inferred intent.

NO Disrespecting of others sexual orientation or gender status.
Multiple infractions may lead to suspension from Kitsunet, depending on severity and inferred intent.

NO Photos or real-life pictures of people abusing or engaging in copulation with animals.
Infractions will lead to immediate suspension from Kitsunet and reporting to the authorities to the best of our ability.

NO Kinkshaming in general.
Multiple infractions may lead to suspension from Kitsunet, depending on severity and inferred intent.

kokoro.shugetsu.space.text:
We choose whether you have the right to play, not you.
If you consider your rights(So-called freedom of speech) to be limited, then you're right. Leave as you like. This only applies to those jerks who believe their trash view shall be swallowed by any other innocent people.

Show kindness and sympathy.
Please avoid political conflict, discrimination, privacy poking and extreme(especially anti-social) views, in any kind. Maintain a rational and human atmosphere. We may even not need to do any action - users will do their own judgement.

Respect to one's copyright.
Please do not repost any user's content and post to any exterior(We define this as "Out of Fediverse") platform without a permission. You may face a ban doing so.

Protect yourself.
No one will ask for your private information for any reason in the Apartment. Even including Kokoro-chan. Protect yourself against spam and online fraud.

No spammy content.
Please do not refer to sensitive content such as violence, harassment, and pornographic content. However, this rule is not strictly sentenced, since "spammy" is the main(and also a blurry) definition. If you can be sure the content will bring joy and not trouble, go ahead.

Violence of law will be banished.
Again, do not cause trouble. If any contents are related to CP(Child Porn), severe harassment, or privacy poking of other users or site moderators, you WILL be banished.

lawfedi.blue.text: Do not discriminate against discrete, insular, minorities.

Advocacy directed to inciting or producing imminent lawless action and is likely to incite or produce such action falls clearly outside the bounds of First Amendment protection and will result in moderation action.
Spamming others is an act of non-excellence. Thus, spammers will be banished.
Racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, xenophobia, and casteism are not allowed as they fail to meet the excellence threshold. See supra Rule 1.
Do not post content that is unlawful in the United States, the state of New York, or the state of Florida.
Do not create or share misinformation. It is low value speech that falls outside the protection of the freedom of speech and will result in moderation action.
Place adult content behind a content warning and flag such images as sensitive.

layer8.space.text: Sexually explicit or violent media must be marked as sensitive when posting
No incitement of violence or promotion of violent ideologies
No harassment, dogpiling or doxxing of other users
Do not share false or misleading information that may lead to physical harm

lawsocial.org.text: Minimum age: Users must be aged 18 years or older to register for an account.
Free Speech: We encourage our members to engage in meaningful discussions on social, legal and political issues.
No abuse based on descent: Any abuse or threat to individuals or a community based on descent like caste, religion, race, gender or place of birth  will not be tolerated on this server.
No casteist speech: No untouchability or caste superiority or reinforcing caste prejudices or  mocking/abusing anyone based on their caste is allowed.
No queerphobia, transphobia, xenophobia or anti-semitism permitted.

No hate speech allowed that abuses, harms or insults based on real or perceived â€œidentity factorsâ€ of an individual or a group, including: â€œcaste, religion, ethnicity, nationality, race, color, descent, genderâ€ and also characteristics such as language, disability, health or sexual orientation.
Trigger Warning: Consider adding content warnings to your posts about controversial subjects or commonly-held phobias.
Criticism, parody, comedy or self expression through creative outlets that offends other server rules will be allowed.

No harassment of others or organize, promote, or participate in harassment. Disagreements happen and are normal, but making continuous, repetitive, or severe negative comments or circumventing a block or ban can cross the line into harassment.

Do not make threats of violence or threaten to harm others. This includes indirect or suggestive threats, as well as sharing or threatening to share someoneâ€™s personally identifiable information (also known as doxxing). If you notice any instances of such threats, please report.
No advertising, spam or excessive promotion: We encourage sharing research outputs and publications for discussions but please do not treat it as Linkd.in (job hosting/finding platform).
No promotion or support of violent extremism. This also includes glorifying violent events, the perpetrators of violent acts, or similar behaviors.

No sexualizing of children: You cannot share content or links which depict children in a pornographic, sexually suggestive, or violent manner, including illustrated or digitally altered pornography that depicts children (such as lolicon, shotacon, or cub) and conduct grooming behaviors.

Anti-sex worker perspectives or advocation against sex workers and discrimination or advocation against genders and sexual minorities is prohibited. Every "unpopular opinion" should be expressed in a respectful and civil manner.
Do not share content that glorifies or promotes suicide or self-harm on LawSocial, including any encouragement to others to cut themselves or embrace eating disorders such as anorexia or bulimia.

Do not share false or misleading information that can cause physical or societal harm. We may remove content if we reasonably believe its spread could result in damage to physical infrastructure, injury of others, obstruction of participation in civic processes, or the endangerment of public health.
We prohibit any sort of self-harm threats used as a form of emotional manipulation or coercion.
We prohibit promotion of scams, including web3/crypto and other ponzi schemes.
We prohibit impersonation of other people, companies, organizations, brands, etc.

We prohibit distributing or providing access to content involving the hacking, cracking, or distribution of stolen goods, pirated content, or accounts. This includes sharing or selling game cheats or hacks.
We fully subscribe to and comply with the Mastodon Server Covenant.
If five toots or more are removed in a period of three months or less, then the user account will be suspended for six months.

leds.social.text:
This is a Civilized Place for Public Discussion
Please treat this server with the same respect you would a public park. We, too, are a shared community resource â€” a place to share skills, knowledge and interests through ongoing conversation.

Improve the Discussion
The topics discussed here matter to us, and we want you to act as if they matter to you, too. Be respectful of the topics and the people discussing them, even if you disagree with some of what is being said.

Be Agreeable, Even When You Disagree
You may wish to respond to something by disagreeing with it. Thatâ€™s fine. But remember to criticize ideas, not people. Please avoid:

Name-calling
Ad hominem attacks
Responding to a postâ€™s tone instead of its actual content
Knee-jerk contradiction

Always Be Civil
Donâ€™t post anything that a reasonable person would consider offensive, abusive, or hate speech.
Keep it clean. Donâ€™t post anything obscene or sexually explicit.
Respect each other. Donâ€™t harass or grief anyone.
Donâ€™t post spam.

libella.social.text: HÃ¶flichkeit: Verzichten Sie auf Beleidigungen, Verunglimpfungen, Provokationen oder Drohungen gegenÃ¼ber anderen. Bedenken Sie, dass Beleidigungen strafrechtlich verfolgt werden kÃ¶nnen. Respektieren Sie die Meinung anderer und Ã¤ussern Sie konstruktive Kritik.

Klarnamen nutzen: Nutzen Sie, wenn mÃ¶glich, Ihren Klarnamen. Die AnonymitÃ¤t verleitet zu Ã„usserungen, die Sie Face-to-Face eher nicht machen wÃ¼rden.

MissverstÃ¤ndnisse vermeiden: Ãœberlegen Sie gut, was Sie mit Ihrer Ã„usserung sagen wollen. Ã„ussern Sie sich dann eindeutig oder nutzen Sie als Ersatz fÃ¼r die fehlende Gestik und Mimik Emoticons (Emojis), zum Beispiel Smileys. Dies gilt insbesondere bei ironischen Bemerkungen.

Posten Sie keine Bilder und keine Videos, die Gewalt darstellen, andere Menschen entwÃ¼rdigen oder diese in peinlichen Situationen zeigen.

library.love.text: Be kind. Be thoughtful. Be respectful to and of others. If you cannot do that, you will be invited to mastodon somewhere else.

librarysocialism.social.text:
Don't be a fascist.

Just don't.  If you have to, just line up against the wall already.

No spam, no advertising. This is open source and socialist. Don't try and hawk stuff here.

If you want to promote your non-profit stuff, please just keep it within reason, and don't derail other conversations!

libori.social.text: Diese Mastodon-Instanz wird als privates Hobby ohne Garantie fÃ¼r VerfÃ¼gbarkeit betrieben. Es besteht kein Anspruch auf jederzeitigen funktionierenden Zugang zum Konto. Ich werde geplante Downtimes vorab Ã¼ber den Account "Isidor" ankÃ¼ndigen.
Auf dieser Instanz sind alle Nutzerinnen und Nutzer willkommen, egal welcher politischen, religiÃ¶sen oder sexuellen Ausrichtung und geschlechtlicher IdentitÃ¤t.

Wenn aber der Eindruck entsteht, dass hier jemand beleidigend, diskriminierend oder schlicht nervtÃ¶tend wird, behalte ich mir das Recht vor, auch ohne AnkÃ¼ndigung Accounts zu sanktionieren oder zu deaktivieren.

Ich gehe davon aus, dass alle Nutzerinnen und Nutzer dieser Instanz in der Lage sind, sich selbst gegenÃ¼ber anderen zur Wehr zu setzen und Querelen unter einander zu klÃ¤ren. Die Meinungsfreiheit erlaubt auch hitzige Debatten. Werden Grenzen Ã¼berschritten, gilt jedoch Ziffer 3.

libretweet.com.text: My instance. My rules. Don't like it, don't reply.
Reports automatically sign you up for spam.
If you reply then block, kill yourself. You're entire instance will get put on every spam list under the sun.

libretooth.gr.text: Be excellent to each other. Be polite and respect everyone. Everyone is welcome to this instance. Libretooth is a safe place for all people, regardless of age, gender, class, sexual orientation, appearance.

In order to make libretooth a welcoming and safe place for everyone we are intolerant towards intolerance. Toxic or poisonous content, behaviour that crosses the line into abuse and harassment, is not welcome to this instance.
For-profit commercial content is also not allowed, whether it's from spam bots or business accounts.

libraryland.social.text: LibraryLand is a space for productive conversations about libraries, archives, museums, or academia.

We want this to be a fun, pleasant, and harassment-free experience for everyone, regardless of gender, gender identity and expression, sexual orientation, disability, physical appearance, body size, race, or religion.

lifergeek.social.text: You will not engage in any form of harassing, discriminatory, threatening, or offensive speech or behavior including but not limited to race, gender identity and expression, national origin, disability, marital status, age, sexual orientation, or other protected categories.

We strictly prohibit transphobic behavior, hateful speech, and any form of violence targeted towards transgender individuals. Our commitment is to create a platform where everyone feels welcome and respected.

Clearly content warn (CW) content and discussions considered of mature or possible traumatic nature (gore, war, thirst traps, trauma). Keep it safe, we don't want to host your nudes - We're not an 18+ instance.
No promotion of gambling, Crypto, NFTs, anti-vaccination, self-harm, terrorism, illegal activities, Abuse/exploitation, or Violence.

lighttheunicorn.horse.text: You must be at least 18 years old to hold an account on this instance.
Do not upload or post any images, videos or illustrations of anyone under the age of 18.
Do not post any photographs or videos of nudity or genitals of any kind.
Do not upload any copyrighted material to this instance without written permission from the copyright holder.
Use of this instance is at your own risk, LightTheUnicorn accepts no responsibility for any content posted by users of this instance.
Homophobia, transphobia, racism, derogatory terms and hate speech are not tolerated here and will result in actions being taken on any accounts found to be engaging in these behaviors.

This server is hosted and moderated from the United Kingdom. As such, some terminology and discussion here may not be relevant to other countries such as the United States. Please be mindful and considerate of this as we will try to be for you.

linux.social.text: Adhere to our Community Code of Conduct (https://linux.social/about).
Use welcoming, inclusive and friendly language.
Be respectful of differing viewpoints and experiences.
Gracefully accept constructive criticism and give it - where needed - only respectfully.
Show empathy towards other community members and focus on what is best for the community.
No sexualized language, imagery, or sexual attention/advances.
No trolling, insulting/derogatory comments, or personal/political/religious attacks.
Do not publish others' private information, such as a physical or electronic addresses, without explicit permission.
Do not engage in conduct which could reasonably be considered inappropriate in a professional setting.
No posting of commercial or business content (unless sharing your Linux-related activities or experiences).
No posting or boosting the same content repeatedly or frequently.
No botting or cross-posting from other services if those posts include jargon or links to those services.
Avoid political and religious topics, there are instances better suited to these topics.
A reasonable ratio of posts must contain LinuxÂ®-related content.
Refer to our Privacy Policy (https://linux.social/privacy-policy) regarding minimum age requirements for using this server.

loci.onl.text: CW (Content Warning) Tag: must be used for any gore, smut, nudity, NSFW/NSFL stuff - anything people may want to prepare themselves for or to not see over work's wifi.

CW (Content Warning) Tag: Encouraged but not mandatory use for: politics, DWP/Government horror, spoilers and discussion of plot for media and books, or extensive roleplaying discussion that may not be interesting to everyone.  But please use them for anything you want, they're helpful :)

Unwanted Content: Repetitive commercial spam - updates on ongoing projects are fine, but identical repetition of adverts is not.  This instance is for talking to people about your/their cool stuff not commercial business advertisements.
Unwanted Content: Bots - Please ask first, if you want to run a bot please make sure it posts unlisted or followers only and be careful with it.

Shitty Banned Content: racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, being shitty to gender & sexual minorities (including kinkshaming), ableism, sexualised depictions of children or lolicon (not the fashion), violent nationalism, facism, national socialism, holocaust denial, casteism, or xenophobia.

Shitty Banned Behaviour: Don't stalk, harass (wide interpretation), dox, or post any private information about people (names or other aliases/accounts, addresses, locations, pictures, etc) without permission.

Shitty Banned Behaviour: Respect requests to drop subjects/stop interacting with people, including unsolicited advice, don't try and get others to gang up on anyone.  Don't be an arse and hassle people about their bodies, minds, or lives.  TL;DR don't be an edgelord or ill socialised prat.

Peoples time and energy are not infinite: No obligation to follow or interact with others, if someones posting or topics are exhausting then please disengage from them/filter out keywords.  If someone unfollows/blocks/filters you, try not to feel bad about it, assume they are busy/exhausted.
Unwanted Members: No Cops.  No Fash.  No Tories.  No "concerned right wing individuals just asking questions"

longcovid.social.text: Longcovid.social is an instance in which #LongCovid sufferers, #chronicillness sufferers, their carers, their allies, scientists, physicians, advocates and anyone who needs support can have a safe space for discussion, support, advocacy, and fighting for patientsâ€™ and human rights.
This instance follows rigorously human rights, and any toot that violates them, directly or indirectly, will be removed and the account associated with it will be suspended.
Sharing content without permission from the accounts in this instance will result in an instant suspension if the respective account limited the visibility of their toots.

This instance is posited as a safe space for everyone, irrespective of sex, gender, sexual orientation, ethnicity, birth place, health status, disability, etc. No form of discrimination will be tolerated. Describing discrimination and hardship will never represent a reason for suspension.

We will block both users and instances that promote conspiracy theories, including anti-vaccine, post antiscientific content, try to sell or promote any type of cure to the accounts in the instance. If your views are not science-oriented/accepting, this instance may not be for you.
Vaxx injured people are part of the sufferers, and they are welcome.  The antivaxxer rule refers specifically to conspiracy theories that spread vaccine misinformation.
If you feel some users and some domains are violating any of the rules above, be generous in informing the moderator and state clearly how that account violates the rules.

Letâ€™s make this space a safe and inclusive space.
Kindly use empathy and consideration when tooting. Enjoy ;)

lounge.town.text:
Protect the Vulnerable:
In case of user conflicts or rules misinterpreted as harmful, admins prioritize the vulnerable to prevent/minimize harm.
No Bigotry: No racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, xenophobia, casteism, classism.
Alt-text is Required: Alt-text is mandatory for images. Follow @PleaseCaption@botsin.space bot for reminders

NSFW Content Warning: ALL NSFW content must have a CW. Unsure? Use a CW.

No Incitement of Violence: Promoting/supporting violence against any group/individual prohibited. Unsure? Don't post.
Bot Rules: Bots must be marked, follow rules, and not strain resources. Non-compliant bots will be suspended, then removed if not fixed.

Assholes aren't welcome.

ALF Mastodon is a left wing progressive and welcoming space. to keep it a space open to all where they can feel safe.
Discrimination against those lower down on the social ladder will not be tolerated.
We do endorse punching up because reverse racism and things like that aren't real.
All illegal content is not allowed on ALF Mastodon whatsoever.
ALF Mastodon is an anti fascist space. We endorse and support the idea of deplatforming and fighting fascism at every turn.
ALF Mastodon is not a platform for capitalists to advertise on and park their social media brand accounts on.
Consistent spam is not allowed, even when considered to be a joke by the user.
Bad faith rules lawyering in an attempt to avoid the clear and obvious progressive intent of these rules is unacceptable behavior.
We welcome new ideas, new perspectives, and a discussion about what makes a space as open and positive as possible.
A general failure to follow these guidelines will lead to the removal of your posts, and eventually your account should we decide that the matter is serious enough.

m.prt.si.text: Violence: You may not threaten violence against an individual or a group of people. We also prohibit the glorification of violence. We allow some forms of violent speech where itâ€™s clear that there is no abusive or violent intent, e.g., â€œIâ€™ll kill you for sending me that plot spoiler!â€.
Terrorism/violent extremism: You may not threaten or promote terrorism or violent extremism.
Child sexual exploitation: We have zero tolerance for child sexual exploitation. Accounts engaging in such activity will be permanently removed.
Abuse/harassment: You may not engage in the targeted harassment of someone, or incite other people to do so. This includes wishing or hoping that someone experiences physical harm.

Hateful conduct: You may not promote violence against, threaten, or harass other people on the basis of race, ethnicity, national origin, caste, sexual orientation, gender, gender identity, religious affiliation, age, disability, or serious disease.
Suicide or self-harm: You may not promote or encourage suicide or self-harm.

Sensitive media, including graphic violence and adult content: You may not post media that is excessively gory or share violent or adult content without Content Warning (CW). Media depicting sexual violence and/or assault is not permitted.

Illegal or certain regulated goods or services: You may not use our service for any unlawful purpose or in furtherance of illegal activities. This includes selling, buying, or facilitating transactions in illegal goods or services, as well as certain types of regulated goods or services.

Private information: You may not publish or post other people's private information (such as home phone number and address) without their express authorization and permission. We also prohibit threatening to expose private information or incentivizing others to do so.
Non-consensual nudity: You may not post or share intimate photos or videos of someone that were produced or distributed without their consent.

Platform manipulation and spam: You may not use this service in a manner intended to artificially amplify or suppress information or engage in behavior that manipulates or disrupts peopleâ€™s experience.

Civic Integrity: You may not use this service for the purpose of manipulating or interfering in elections or other civic processes. This includes posting or sharing content that may suppress participation or mislead people about when, where, or how to participate in a civic process.

Misleading and Deceptive Identities: You may not impersonate individuals, groups, or organizations to mislead, confuse, or deceive others, nor use a fake identity in a manner that disrupts the experience of other users.
Synthetic and manipulated media: You may not deceptively share synthetic or manipulated media that are likely to cause harm. Such content require clear Content Warning (CW) that it is not real.
Copyright and trademark: You may not violate othersâ€™ intellectual property rights, including copyright and trademark.
Parody: Parody is allowed. Parody accounts must be labeled in bio/handle, if they impersonate another person or institution.
Conspiracy theories: We will limit all efforts connected to dissemination of various harmful conspiracy theories on our network. Satirical conspiracy theories such as "Birds Aren't Real" are allowed.

macrofurs.social.text:
Do not break any laws.

Use common sense and knowledge of the laws of your country of residence.

Be kind.

Discriminatory language based on gender, sexual orientation, religion, etc. is not tolerated.

Be respectful.
Do not make your issues with another user public. Either settle it in private or contact a moderator.

Use CW (Content Warnings).
Make liberal use of CW for content including but not limited to: lewd/kinky/politics (and other polarizing subjects)/drugs/game spoilers. As a rule of thumb: if it'd be awkward to explain in public, put a CW on it.
Keep your avatar/banner safe. Other instances will see these, so avoid any explicit or otherwise highly suggestive content.
Credit Artwork. Link back to, or at least provide the name of, the artist of any and all artwork you post. Failure to do so repeatably will result in swift account suspension.

Content featuring pedophilia/zoophilia/irl snuff or gore/etc. will lead to immediate account suspension.
This includes characters that are "technically" of age, but look underage.
While not required, alt text is highly encouraged.
AI images, while allowed have to be tagged as such, do not claim the artwork as your own. Provide the AI and settings used in alt text.
You alone are responsible for any and all content you post to this site. You may not post copyrighted content you do not have the right to use.

Impersonating another individual without a clear indication of parody (i.e. "Parody" as part of the display name) will lead to swift suspension. Furthermore, parody is only permitted for lighthearted fun, mean-spirited mockery will still lead to suspension.
Due to the nature of this instance, any and all users have to be of age in their respective country or at least 18 years old, whichever is higher.
Migrations or new accounts onto this instance as an effort of ban/block evasion will lead to swift suspension.
More rules may be added or changed in the future as necessary, this will (usually) be accompanied by an announcement and reminder to review the rules.
Due to an increase of spam accounts as of late we require approval for sign-ups. Please provide a simple reason for your sign-up to ensure it's not automated.

machteburch.social.text: Rassismus wird nicht toleriert, ebenso wie Sexismus, Beschimpfungen, sowie Diskriminierung von Minderheiten jeglicher Art.

mas.greatlakes.club.text:
Detailed rules
The following guidelines are not a legal document, and final interpretation is up to the admin; they are here to provide you with an insight into our content moderation policies:

The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline:

*Excessive advertising
	*Uncurated news bots posting from third-party news sources
	*Untagged nudity, pornography and sexually explicit content, including artistic depictions
	*Untagged gore and extremely graphic violence, including artistic depictions
The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline, and may result in account suspension and revocation of access to the service:

*Racism or advocation of racism
	*Sexism or advocation of sexism
	*Casteism or advocation of casteism
	*Discrimination against gender and sexual minorities, or advocation thereof

*Xenophobic and/or violent nationalism
	*Spreading disinformation or conspiracy theories that undermine public health
	*Spreading disinformation or conspiracy theories that undermine intelligence and polite discussion and common sense

The following types of content are explicitly disallowed and will result in revocation of access to the service:
	*Sexual depictions of children
	*Conduct promoting the ideology of Nationalism of any country, falsehoods, blatant lies or any for of misinformation or disinformation.

*Any conduct intended to stalk or harass other users, or to impede other users from utilizing the service, or to degrade the performance of the service, or to harass other users, or to incite other users to perform any of the aforementioned actions, is also disallowed
, and subject to punishment up to and including revocation of access to the service. This includes, but is not limited to, the following behaviors:

*Continuing to engage in conversation with a user that has specifically has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist may be considered harassment, regardless of platform-specific privacy tools employed.
*Aggregating, posting, and/or disseminating a person's demographic, personal, or private data without express permission (informally called doxing or dropping dox) may be considered harassment.

These provisions notwithstanding, the administration of the service reserves the right to revoke any user's access permissions, at any time, for any reason, except as limited by law.

Most of our rules are forked from mas.to, copied from c.im

mas.panix.com.text: Do not do anything illegal or anything that adversely affects Panix's legal interests.

mas.to.text: No discrimination, including (but not limited to) racism, sexism, homophobia or transphobia.
No explicit (NSFW) content without content warnings and/or sensitive media markers. Explicit content must not be used in user avatars or header images.
No harassment of other users on this or other servers.
No content illegal in the following countries: United Kingdom, Germany
No incitement of violence or promotion of violent ideologies.
No disinformation regarding public health issues or political/military campaigns.
No spam. This includes commercial advertising, promotion of services, and SEO.
No impersonation of other individuals, public figures or organisations, unless clearly marked as a parody.
All automated (bot) accounts must enable the bot flag in their account preferences, respect #nobot markers, and post as unlisted unless making less than one post per hour.

Personal use is permitted, and personal opinions and posts allowed, but please do not co-opt this instance for entirely non-HPC-related commercial or other purposes. Be sure to fill out your profile information to help decide whether to follow or interact.
This server is federated with others in the Mastodon network and may display content from other servers. Selecting the local timeline may increase your fraction of HPC-oriented posts.

Please use hashtags such as #HPC to increase discoverability outside of this server. Using #CamelCase in your hashtag makes it more useful to those who use screen readers, and be sure to add alt text to any media.
Be respectful and aware that abusive or illegal behavior or other violations of server rules will lead to suspension of access.
By selecting â€œAcceptâ€ you certify that you are over 13 years of age and agree to the terms of use and privacy policies for this service.

mast.thomasdmn.net.text:
Detailed rules
The following guidelines are not a legal document, and final interpretation is up to the admin; they are here to provide you with an insight into our content moderation policies:
The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline:

Excessive advertising
Uncurated news bots posting from third-party news sources
Untagged nudity, pornography and sexually explicit content, including artistic depictions
Untagged gore and extremely graphic violence, including artistic depictions

The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline, and may result in account suspension and revocation of access to the service:
Racism or advocation of racism
Sexism or advocation of sexism
Casteism or advocation of casteism

Discrimination against gender and sexual minorities, or advocation thereof
Xenophobic and/or violent nationalism
Spreading disinformation or conspiracy theories that undermine public health

The following types of content are explicitly disallowed and will result in revocation of access to the service:
Sexual depictions of children

Conduct promoting the ideology of Nationalism of any country, falsehoods, blatant lies or any for of misinformation or disinformation.

Any conduct intended to stalk or harass other users, or to impede other users from utilizing the service, or to degrade the performance of the service, or to harass other users, or to incite other users to perform any of the aforementioned actions,
is also disallowed, and subject to punishment up to and including revocation of access to the service. This includes, but is not limited to, the following behaviors:

Continuing to engage in conversation with a user that has specifically has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist may be considered harassment, regardless of platform-specific privacy tools employed.
Aggregating, posting, and/or disseminating a person's demographic, personal, or private data without express permission (informally called doxing or dropping dox) may be considered harassment.

Inciting users to engage another user in continued interaction or discussion after a user has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist (informally called brigading or dogpiling) may be considered harassment.
These provisions notwithstanding, the administration of the service reserves the right to revoke any user's access permissions, at any time, for any reason, except as limited by law.
Most of our rules are forked from mas.to, copied from c.im

mastdn.io.text: Respectful Communication: Engage with others in a respectful and considerate manner. Derogatory language, harassment, or bullying of any kind is not tolerated.
No Hate Speech: Posts promoting hatred or discrimination against individuals or groups based on race, ethnicity, gender identity, sexual orientation, religion, or disability are strictly prohibited.
Constructive Discourse: Encourage and engage in constructive and meaningful discussions. Avoid posting content that is deliberately inflammatory or provocative.
Protect Privacy: Do not share personal information about others without their explicit consent. This includes private messages, personal data, and contact details.
No Misinformation: Sharing false or misleading information is not allowed. Verify the accuracy of your posts, especially when discussing sensitive or controversial topics.
Respectful Debate: Differing opinions are welcome, but discussions should remain civil. Do not resort to personal attacks or derogatory remarks in debates.
Content Labeling: Use content warnings for posts that might be sensitive or triggering. This includes topics like violence, sexual content, or graphic imagery.
No Illegal Activity: Do not engage in or promote illegal activities. This includes sharing pirated content, threats of violence, or engaging in cybercrime.
Report Violations: If you encounter content that violates these rules, please report it to the moderators for review. We rely on our community to help maintain a safe environment.

Moderation and Enforcement: Violations of these rules may result in content removal, warnings, or bans. Our moderation team will enforce these rules to ensure the safety and well-being of all members.

masto.fuzzy.systems.text: Follow the spirit of the Fuzzy Systems mission statement - encouraging an open internet, welcoming to everyone.
Respect boundaries set by others, listen. Apologize if you overstep them. Give space. Failure to do so is an instant ban.
Instead of escalating, flag toots for an admin to look into. We're not overcrowded here.
CW anything that might potentially upset someone, including NSFW content.

Ableism, racism, sexism, transphobia, xenophobia, and microaggressions are all forbidden - you'll be banned if you repeatedly do it or if it's serious, but we all make mistakes and have things to unlearn.

masto.globaleas.org.text:
No bullying, trolling, harassing, or severely disrespecting fellow members is allowed.
GWES is an inclusive community. Forms of discrimination, of any kind, are not tolerated.
No NSFW or NSFL posts are allowed.

Please do not discuss controversial or overtly political issues.
Controversial issues does include EAS community drama.

Weather misinformation must be kept out of GWES, especially during severe weather. It's important that, during severe weather situations, we keep up with the best information possible in order to avoid confusion or over-reaction

Do not engage in illegal activities involving the server
This includes DDoS attacks, Doxxing other members, and other such activities that are harmful to members
Breaking this rule will result in an immediate, permanent ban

Do not use the Emergency Alert System (EAS) or your country's alerting system for illegal activations on public airwaves
Breaking this rule will result in an immediate, permanent ban, among other legal issues you will likely be facing from the FCC or your country's communications bureau
Please keep mentioning, spam, caps, mini-modding, etc. in moderation.

mastoart.social.text: Be kind and respectful. No personal attacks, harrassment, dogpiling or stalking. Misinformation as well as racist, extremist, ableist, anti-semitic, homophobic, sexist, transphobic or otherwise hateful or discriminatory content are prohibited.
This server is for humans, not for corporations or bots. Bots are only allowed if given explicit written permission by the administration team.
You may only upload content that you have created yourself, or content created by third parties that you have permission to upload. No NFTs, crypto, or AI-generated/-assisted artwork.
No corporate advertising. Promotion of your own work, commissions or stores is welcome, but a balance between regular posts and advertisements is encouraged to maintain a sense of a community.

No pornography. Non-explicit mature art depicting consenting adult characters is welcome, but must be marked as sensitive, put under a CW and tagged accordingly. Examples include non-sexual depictions of nude characters, characters in suggestive clothing, or characters engaging in intimate behavior.

NSFW and potentially triggering content must be marked as sensitive, put under a CW and tagged accordingly for filtering. Examples include common phobias, gore, drugs, suicidal ideation or erotic content. Rule of thumb: â€œIf I can't look at it with my manager looking over my shoulder, it needs a CW.â€
We recommend that you add alt text to your images if you can. It is not mandatory, but it contributes to an inclusive community and increases the chances that your work will be shared by other users.

mastobate.social.text: MASTURBATION ONLY - no oral or anal media permitted.

USE CONTENT WARNINGS (CW) for all NSFW media or language.
NO NSFW IMAGES IN PROFILES (header and avatar pics).
NO ADS OR SPAM, including pay-to-view sites or content. You may mention your OF/JFF/etsy page in your profile, but posts just to drive traffic to any commercial site will be removed.

NO HATE - No racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, xenophobia, casteism, or body shaming. No religious or political proselytizing. Treat everyone with respect. Never reveal personal details of other users.

mastodns.net.text: Posts on MastoDNS must comply with the DNS-OARC Code of Conduct, which is available here: https://www.dns-oarc.net/oarc/policies/conduct
When participating, treat others with tolerance, respect and courtesy, regardless of who they are and who you are.
Do not use language which is racist, sexist, homophobic, transphobic, ableist, uses slurs, or is otherwise discriminatory.
Do not use personal attacks in discussion with others.  Vigorous debate is welcome, but ad hominem does nothing to advance an open exchange of ideas.
Content which is illegal or endangers the safety of others is prohibited.
Do not harass anyone, or participate in group harassment of anyone.  Postingâ€”or threatening to postâ€”other people's personally identifying information ("doxing") constitutes harassment.

Do not post adult content, or sexually explicit material (including pictures containing nudity).  This includes sexualized comments or jokes.  Posts including unwelcome sexual attention constitute harassment.
Do not post about controversial or sensitive subjects without a Content Warning.

Do not police your fellow users.  You may feel a user has violated our standards or rules, but you should block them or report them for admins to handle.  Starting an argument among users only serves to add noise to the signal.
Do not debate moderation actions in public posts.  If you disagree with how a moderator enforced these rules, you may direct-message the moderation team or email mastodon@dns-oarc.net.

mastodo.neoliber.al.text: Be civil: don't flame, harass, doxx, or dogpile. When disagreeing with others, don't resort to name calling or bad faith arguments.
Be decent: don't post vulgar or offensive content such as porn, gore, or sexualization of minors. Anything potentially shocking should be put behind adequate content warnings
Be woke: don't post bigoted content and don't glorify or advocate for violence
Be law-abiding: don't post any content illegal under US laws such as copyrighted material
Be a good neighbor: don't brigade any subreddits or cause trouble with other Mastodon instances
Be honest: don't post deliberate misinformation unless it's really funny like convincing someone to eat the stickers on fruit
Don't spam: treat Mastodon as a place for conversation, not a captive audience

Other / Mod discretion: it's not possible to list all the ways in which content can be harmful. Feel free to report content that doesn't violate the letter of the rules here, and likewise please understand that mods may take action based on their best judgement

mastodon-belgium.be.text:
Be nice to each other. No shitposting on this server.
Trolls will not be tolerated. Please act in a civilized manner.
No porn, explicit or violent media, racism, sexism, fascism, homophobia, or any other form of abusive behavior, harassment or hate speech.
No incitement of violence or promotion of violent ideologies.
No doxxing of users. Any form of harassment will not be tolerated.
No content illegal in Belgium or, by extension, EU law.

No intentional spreading of fake news, false information or misleading content.
This includes attempts to impersonate Mastodon staff.

Politics and religion is tolerated but discouraged. Please use a Content Warning if you do post them.
Whatever your political or religious view may be is your concern but we'd appreciate it if you wouldn't use this platform to plaster it in other people's faces.

Please don't bring discussions from other Social Media channels over to Mastodon.
If you want to discuss a topic, please do it on the originating side.

If you're a commercial or government entity or you represent one, please consider hosting your own Mastodon instance.
This instance is set up and paid for by volunteers in order to give users access to the Fediverse.
It's not intended to be used as a commercial or governmental platform.

This is a private Mastodon instance, access to this server is a privilege and not a right.
The right to access and/or use this server may be revoked at any given time.

Interpretation of these rules is up to the server's admin discretion and is not open for discussion.
They may change without prior notice.

mastodom.social.text: Exclusively 18+. Zero tolerance for underage or otherwise illegal content.

If you're posting a picture that's not yours, attribute it correctly. We like original content (text, pics, etc.) 100 times more than random porn off the Internet.
Use sensitive media flag *and* content warning (CW) for NSFW media. No full-on nudity in avatars.
Respect each other, absolutely no hate speech

You're here to *be* here - the main purpose of an account on this instance should be to contribute to the community, not advertising a business or directing traffic elsewhere. Any advertisements should be unlisted or follower only.

mastodon.acm.org.text: Be professional. Maintain high standards of professional competence, conduct, and ethical practice when sharing and discussing work related to computing. Know and respect existing rules pertaining to professional work.

Be respectful.
Respect the work required to produce new ideas, inventions, creative works, and computing artifacts. Respect privacy. Honor confidentiality.

Be inclusive.
Diversity and inclusion are central to ACM's mission. We do not tolerate any kind of discrimination against anyone because of their age, gender, race, ethnicity, religion, disability, sexual orientation, or any other distinguishing characteristic or trait.

Be accessible.
We encourage you to adopt inclusive practices when posting your content. Best practices include providing alternative text for media, and more.

Be honest.
Computing professionals should be honest about their qualifications and forthright about any circumstances that may lead to either real or perceived conflicts of interest.

Be friendly.
Feel free to be conversational, personal, and fun! Fill up your profile page to tell us who you are, use computing-related hashtags to increase discoverability outside of this server. Engage with other users' content by meaningful re-tooting and commenting.

mastodon.app.araneum.org.text: You have to be an Araneum member in good standing

mastodon.archfiend.org.text:
Don't be a shithead.

"Being a shithead" includes, but is not limited to, being racist, sexist, misogynist, transphobic, homophobic, queerphobic, etc.

Be kind to, and respectful and considerate of, others.

"Being kind to, and respectful and considerate of, others" includes, but is not limited to, not exhibiting shithead behavior, using content warnings appropriately, and providing meaningful alt text for uploaded images.
Don't do anything on this server that will get you, me, or any other admins in legal trouble in any applicable jurisdictions.
These rules are not intended to be exhaustive; behavior not specifically prohibited is not necessarily allowed.  Admins are the sole judges of compliance with the rules.

Finally, as previously stated, this is a private instance.  Accounts are given only to trusted friends of the administration.  Requests from people not meeting this description will be summarily ignored.

mastodon.archive.org.text: Code of Conduct. Employees using the Internet Archive Mastodon server are expected to follow the code of conduct provided by Internet Archive Human Resources.

mastodon.arnos-vale.net.text: Do unto others as you think they would want done to them.
Mark sensitive content with a content warning.
Gratuitous obscenity that serves no practical benefit to a discussion is not permitted.
Illegal content such as child pornography, unsurprisingly, is not permitted.
Spam is not permitted, this includes creating spam accounts that only serve to provide profile links or advertise products and services.

Hate speech and abusive or threatening behavior is not permitted, specifically that which directed at any gender, nationality, religion, race, age, pizza topping preference, or sexual identity. One can hate on systemd all day long here.
Lack of a specific rule against a certain behavior does not indicate acceptance of that behavior. Each of us has a limited amount of time in this world. Don't be a jerk.
Violating one or more of these rules may result in an immediate, permanent ban without notice or warning.
You may not impersonate a person or brand without a clear indication the account is unofficial and/or a parody. Parody accounts are permitted, as are legitimate brand accounts.
No attacks against (or from) the instance.
You may not do anything which may impact confidentiality, integrity or availability of this server, service, the users of the service or their data.
No doxing (aka doxxing) or disclosing personal information without consent and as a means of harassing or causing others to harass another person.
No harassment in the form of continued engagement after a person has requested contact to stop.

Automated posting:
- Accounts that post >50% using automation must be labeled as a â€œbotâ€ in the user profile to help provide a visual indicator to all.
- Automated posts must be limited to one post per hour/24 per day with post visibility set to â€œpublicâ€. There is no limit on â€œunlistedâ€ posts.

mastodon.art.text: No posting other artist's work without credit AND analysis/opinion .
Tag sensitive content such as violence/blood, graphic nudity, lewd content, and other potentially upsetting or triggering topics, AND hide them under a Content Warning (CW).
No trolling, microaggressions, bullying, or harassment. See the Code of Conduct for the full list.
No unapproved bots, corporate advertising, or spam (this does *not* mean your shop links and commission pages! Please share those often!).
No racism, sexism, discrimination against gender and sexual minorities, ableism, fatmisia, xenophobia and/or violent nationalism, or the advocation of all of the above.

No content that includes sexual depictions of minors (this includes loli), content illegal in Germany and/or France, such as holocaust denial or Nazi symbolism, conduct promoting the ideology of National Socialism.
Conduct intended to stalk or harass users, impede users from using the service, degrade the performance of the service, or incite others to perform any of the aforementioned actions, is disallowed.
No NFT content. None at all. There are crypto-related instances on the fediverse that would be more suitable.
No AI-generated imagery allowed at all
No flooding the public timelines (making lots of public posts in quick succession).

mastodon.ashevillains.org.text:
No hate speech, or threats of violence.

More rules as needed.

mastodon.aspectsof.love.text: Treat others the way they'd like to be treated.
Generally speaking, be respectful, and don't be a dingleberry.

mastodon.astifter.com.text: This server is closed to public registrations.

mastodon.b2b-marketing.pl.text: Keep the discussion on marketing B2B subject (broadly speaking).
No copyrighted content. If you don't own the copyright or unsure - don't post it.

mastodon.baazee.social.text: No Hate Speech, Racism, Sexism, Antisemitism or other form of discrimination is allowed
Don't mass-mirror posts from Twitter or other media
Trolle werden geblockt. AfD- und Putin-Fans sind nicht erwÃ¼nscht.

mastodon.au.text: No incitement of violence or promotion of violent ideologies .
Threatening, abusive, intolerant or illegal behaviour will lead to moderation and/or account deletion.
Do not post anything that is illegal in Queensland, Australia - this service and all data stored on it is 100% stored and operated in QLD.
Do not knowingly share false or misleading information.
The Content Warning flag must be used for NSFW content, and NSFW media should be marked as sensitive.
Registrations are monitored and accounts considered spam, duplicates, impersonating legal entities or persons will be deleted.
Always be kind to each other. Don't say anything you wouldn't face to face.

NSFW content needs to be marked as such.
Please use content warning for NSFW and/or nudity content.

No advertising
Absolutely no advertising is tolerated.
USE ENGLISH, NORWEGIAN OR PORTUGUESE! Content in other languages will be erased.

Rules
Always be kind and polite and treat others with respect.

Do not harass or insult anyone! Absolutely refrain from personal attacks. Not alone and not as a group. Posting or threatening to post personally identifiable information will be considered harassment.
Respect the user's wish not to be contacted if the person has indicated so.
Nationalist propaganda and Nazi symbolism are NOT allowed on this server! tolerated. The promotion of the ideology of National Socialism is also forbidden!
Do not post or share pornographic or sexualized content. Jokes and comments with pornographic or sexualized content are undesirable.
Spam or commercial advertising must not be published. We define commercial advertising in this context with the purpose of making money directly or indirectly.
Pseudo-arguments, black rhetoric or sophism, killer phrases are undesirable.
We do not tolerate the endorsement or use of racist, sexist, homophobic, transphobic, anti-disabled or otherwise discriminatory or hateful language.
Adhere to the laws applicable in Germany.
Do not post proven false information, fake news and conspiracy theories.
The permitted language is German or English

mastodon.babb.no.text:
Languages allowed: Norwegian, English and Portuguese.
Because of moderation issues, all posts in other languages will be deleted.
Basic rules: respect above all. Here, we respect each other.

NSFW content needs to be marked as such.

No advertising

mastodon.bandshell.rocks.text:
Respect:
Treat others as you would wish to be treated: Do not insult, bully or discriminate. If you can't say something without being racist, sexist, homophobic, transphobic, etc, don't say it here at all.
Opinions: You are entitled to your own opinion. Nobody else is entitled to your opinion. You may be entitled to free speech, but everybody else is entitled to the freedom of not listening to you.
Membership: Only real people are allowed on this server. When you ask for an account, you will need to tell us who you are, and then we will check you out.
Privacy: We do not use your personal data in any way. We do not sell it. We do not use it for advertising. We do not allow anyone else to access it or use it.
Trust: Whilst everybody loves a good Road Story, if you are presenting something as fact, make sure it is, or we will call you out on it.

mastodon.basjes.nl.text: Just be nice to all others and respect them for who they are.

mastodon.beehive.ee.text: Don't be a dick, or at least be a pretty one.

mastodon.bellamazz.com.text: This server is intended for my/my friends' personal use. If you apply and I do not know you, I probably will reject you.

mastodon.beer.text: Do not use slurs or racist, sexist, homophobic, transphobic, ableist or otherwise discriminatory or hateful jokes or language or promote white supremacy, anti-Semitism, transphobia or other hateful ideologies.

Do not harass anyone, participate in group harassment of anyone, or otherwise engage in personal attacks. Posting or threatening to post other peopleâ€™s personally identifying information (â€œdoxingâ€) constitutes harassment.
Do not be intentionally antagonistic. A post or reply designed to provoke a confrontation is not acceptable.
Do not post adult content, including pictures containing nudity, or unwelcome sexual attention (including sexualized comments or jokes).

Do not use automated tools to toot without participating in the community. It is fine to post with an automated tool so long as you are an active member of the Mastodon.Beer community and respond to replies you receive here. Unmonitored accounts that post automatically are not acceptable.
Please post in English, at least for initial posts. The admin only speaks English. Until or unless that changes, this will make dealing with any issues or concerns simpler.

Do not post spam. Toots that are nothing other than a link and/or contain an inordinate number of hashtags are spam, as does any overly commercial self-promotion. (It is fine to toot about your own projects and share what you are excited to be working on â€” just keep the toot itself interesting).

Do not post about inflammatory, controversial subjects without a Content Warning. Content Warnings are also a kindness. Think of them as opt-in hash tags that might save someone creating an opt-out via a filter.
Do not â€œshitpostâ€ which is defined as: "to post off-topic, false, or offensive contributions to an online forum with the intent to derail the discussion or provoke other participants".
Do not engage in name calling, ad hominem attacks, or any other uncivil behaviour; criticize ideas, never people. You do not have to be nice, you are asked to try to be kind.

Do not tone police. Toots may violate the standards of civility we set on Mastodon.Beer, but you should not criticize users for their tone. Report them or feel free to block them. In neither case should you criticize their tone.

Respect the server, respect each other, respect yourself.
No Racism, Sexism, Transphobia, Ableism, Homophobia, etc.

mastodon.boiler.social.text: Do not create posts or send messages which violate Purdue's policies (e.g. on academic integrity).
Homophobia, transphobia, racism, and all other forms of bigotry and discrimination are forbidden entirely.
Do not harass users of this or any other Mastodon instance.
The Administration reserves the right to totally revoke all service to any user, at any time, for any reason.

mastodon.boston.text: The following lists the prohibitions on this instance that may result in post moderation or account restriction or banning:
Violence: You may not threaten violence against an individual or a group of people. We also prohibit the glorification of violence.
Terrorism/violent extremism: You may not threaten or promote terrorism or violent extremism.
Child sexual exploitation: We have zero tolerance for child sexual exploitation
Abuse/harassment: You may not engage in the targeted harassment of someone, or incite other people to do so. This includes wishing or hoping that someone experiences physical harm.

Hateful conduct: You may not promote violence against, threaten, or harass other people on the basis of race, ethnicity, national origin, caste, sexual orientation, gender, gender identity, religious affiliation, age, disability, or serious disease.

Perpetrators of violent attacks: We will remove any accounts maintained by individual perpetrators of terrorist, violent extremist, or mass violent attacks, and may also remove accounts disseminating manifestos or other content produced by perpetrators.
Suicide or self-harm: You may not promote or encourage suicide or self-harm.

Sensitive media, including graphic violence and adult content: You may not post media that is excessively gory or share violent or adult content within profile or header images. Media depicting sexual violence and/or assault is also not permitted.

Illegal or certain regulated goods or services: You may not use our service for any unlawful purpose or in furtherance of illegal activities. This includes selling, buying, or facilitating transactions in illegal goods or services, as well as certain types of regulated goods or services.

Spam / Intrusive Commerical Content: While business and brands are encouraged to create accounts, spam and unsolicited commercial content will not be tolerated.  For example, creating posts is ok, but creating posts and tagging people you don't have a pre-existing relationship with is not allowed.

mastodon.bot.text: Discrimination: No racist, sexist, homophobic, transphobic, hateful, harmful, xenophobic, or similar activity.
Disinformation: No false or misleading information.
Spam: Commercial advertising is banned. Any excessive promotion is banned. This includes excessive use of hashtags.
Harrassment: Do not harrass anyone or contribute to personal attacks. Do not post any personally identifying information of others (â€œdoxxingâ€).
Aggression: Do not be aggressive or antagonistic. Do not provoke confrontation.
Impersonation: Never impersonate another person, service, brand, etc.
Adult content: Do not post adult content, including pictures containing nudity, or NSFW content, even with content warnings.
Be a good bot. Abide by our Rules for Bots.

mastodon.bofhers.es.text: No violence, no racism, no homophobia, no trasnsphobia, safe space LGTBQIA+, no  religious extremism, no colonialism, no white supremacy.

Do not LART users for no apparent reason ;).

mastodon.blackblock.rocks.text: Be polite. No trolling, microaggressions, or harassment.

mastodon.bsd.cafe.text:
Be Respectful: 
Treat all members with respect and kindness. Harassment, hate speech, discrimination, or any form of bullying will not be tolerated.
Respect Privacy: Do not share personal information of others without their explicit consent. Protect your privacy and exercise caution when sharing personal data.
Copyright and Licensing: Respect copyright and licensing agreements. Only share content that you have the right to use and distribute.
No Trolling or Flame Wars: Avoid engaging in flame wars, trolling, or intentionally provoking other users. Disagreements are fine, but keep discussions civil.
Report Abuse: If you encounter any violations of the server rules or witness inappropriate behavior, please report it to the moderators for prompt action.
No Malicious Activities: Do not engage in any illegal or malicious activities, including but not limited to hacking, spreading malware, or inciting violence.
Follow Instance-Specific Guidelines: In addition to these rules, follow any instance-specific guidelines posted by the administrators.

mastodon.bstly.de.text: The offfical charter of Bastelei e. V. applies!

mastodon.brittg.com.text: No discrimination, including (but not limited to) racism, sexism, homophobia or transphobia.
No explicit (NSFW) content without content warnings and/or sensitive media markers. Explicit content must not be used in user avatars or header images.
No harassment of other users on this or other servers.
No incitement of violence or promotion of violent ideologies.
All bot accounts should be opt in by default. Posts should be unlisted and are only allowed to interact with followers.

mastodon.cameko.org.text: Membership to the server is limited to the administrator of the server and to directly known friends.  If you are looking to join a Mastodon server but are not part of this group, I recommend using either https://mastodon.social or any of the other open membership Mastodon servers.
Due to limited time constraints, moderation is mainly left to the individual users. However, if you are here, this is because I know you. Please do not abuse this.
If you are a member of the server and would like a user added, please contact me. I can send out invites if given an email, and/or approve users if they have already applied.
If you need a server hard blocked, please contact the administrator.
The administrator of the server reserves the right to moderate content on this server as required by the laws of the jurisdiction of the location of the server (currently, the United States).

PLEASE LIMIT/AVOID DISCLOSING PII OR CRITICAL SECRETS ON THIS SERVER! Server administration is limited, and I cannot guarantee absolute protection of data here. If you need to communicate private data, I strongly recommend a different encrypted mechanism.

mastodon.circle.lt.text: Don't use this server in any way that would violate the U.S. federal law or California State law.
No authoritarianism. Fascists and tankies are not welcome.
No discrimination. Racism, antisemitism, colonialism, casteism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, and other kinds of prejudice will not be tolerated.
Don't intentionally cause or encourage others to cause any kind of harm to people in this community or to anyone they may care about. No trolling, no harassment, no stalking, no doxxing.
Adult and other NSFW content must be marked sensitive and hidden behind a non-explicit content warning.

mastodon.clinicians-exchange.org.text: Conversations must be respectful. Please alert the moderators if there is a post that needs to be addressed.

First & last name, professional credentials, & geographical location at the large territory level (state/province/country) are encouraged in your profile.  **WE DO ALLOW PSEUDONYMS HOWEVER**  Upon request -- we will approve 2nd accounts so you can have a professional account and a pseudonym account.

Members should be mental health professionals, retirees, or graduate students. This is BROADLY DEFINED -- licensed advanced degree people, para-professionals at group homes & day programs.  Association staff.  State health board staff.  No proof of mental health employment normally needed.
Advertising and marketing on the forum are expressly prohibited. You are welcome to advertise in your profile, but not directly to the server.

This forum is NOT confidential. All messages are archived on the web and can be widely read. Do not say anything that would compromise anyoneâ€™s confidentiality or violate your professional ethics in any way. This is an open-door meeting and should be treated as such. NO CLIENT CASE STUDIES!

We encourage the use of hashtags such as:
"#OT" and "#watercooler" -- for off-topic and personal discussions
"#political" -- for political topics (which must remain polite and at least vaguely tied to psychology)
Some other good hashtags: "#sundaysalon" "#strictlybusiness" "#COVID"
We encourage the use of Content Warnings so that community members can decide whether they want to engage with a post that may be controversial or explicit.

The information distributed may or may not have been checked for accuracy. By your use of this forum, you agree to hold harmless the forum owners, moderators, and all contributors against any and all claims arising out of such use, regardless of the cause, effects, or fault.

Be kind. Harassments and/or hateful speech will not be tolerated. Any reports of this conduct will lead to reprimands and finally permanent ban if continued.
No nudity, porn or 18+ content. There's plenty of other instances where you can join for that kind of content. When posting media containing otherwise NSFW material, please flag content as such.
No ads or spam. Shameless plugs to own content allowed as long as it's not linking to BirdSite.
No spreading of misinformation, conspiracy theories or anti-science bullcrap. This ain't your uncle's Facebook.

mastodon.content.town.text: Be judicial in what you post.
Please donâ€™t post stuff that shows disturbing content (violence, bodliy harm, cruelty, etc) without using the content warning features. Err on the side of caution.

Avoid mansplaining. While you may be an expert on a topic in your friend circles, it's likely that there's someone here who you could learn a lot from. Mansplaining shuts down those opportunities to learn.
Please set a user icon. It can be anything you want, as long as it isn't the Mastodon default image.
Avoid behavior that forces us to create new rules.

mastodon.comwork.io.text: Do not post hateful content. No discrimination will be tolerated.
Do not harass anyone, participate in group harassment of anyone. Any kind of harassment won't be tolerated.
Do not post adult content (forbid under the age of 18 according to the French law), including pictures containing nudity, or unwelcome sexual attention (including sexualized comments or jokes).
Beware about our term of services: https://mastodon.comwork.io/terms

mastodon.cooleysekula.net.text: No toxic and hateful speech. We have a zero-tolerance policy on attacks against anyoneâ€™s gender identity or expression, sexual orientation, race, ethnicity, nationality, religion, age, disability, personal appearance, or socio-economic status.
No incitement of violence and no promotion of misleading or violent ideologies.
No harassment, dogpiling, or unwanted advances. You may not continue to engage with a user who has explicitly requested that you stop.
No doxxing of other users. Unauthorised requests for or distribution of any personal information or data is not allowed. Please treat personally identifying information with respect and privacy.
No content illegal in Canada or copyrighted content that you don't own rights to. Illegal or copyrighted content is not allowed to be stored, posted, or discussed on this instance.

Sexually explicit or violent media must be marked appropriately. Posts and images with sexually explicit or violence must be flagged as sensitive and contain a content warning. Users may not have sexually explicit or violent media as a profile photo or header image.
No spamming. Excessive posting, boosting, advertising or mass-marketing posts will be actioned accordingly and based on intent.
Be yourself. Accounts intended to impersonate or parody are not permitted, and those found to be directly misrepresenting themselves as another person or entity will be actioned accordingly.

mastodon.cute.camp.text: Be you. This is a space to celebrate our diversity. Here you don't need to be a brand, be true to yourself and let others do the same.

Cultivate a safe atmosphere. Harassment will not be tolerated, oppressive behavior will not be tolerated, and while failure to recognize the boundaries of others may be met at first with a gentle attempt to educate you, repeated failure will not be tolerated.

Share Things. Talk about what you are up to! Talk to other people about what they are up to! Make things! Share you patreon! Post your art! Share your knowledge! Ask the questions that keep you awake at night.

Banal bullshit unwelcome. There's nothing interesting about homophobia, transphobia, racism, sexism or any of the other unexamined default settings some people grow up with. Being a neo-Nazi isn't an opinion. Feel free to disagree somewhere else where none of us have to hear you. Enforced strictly.

mastodon.cyborgcentral.net.text: Do not harass, doxx, or attempt to violate the privacy of other users. You will be banned.
Mastodon instances that post nothing but spam or abuse will be blocked.
Do not share illegal files using the service. This includes any files that would be illegal to possess in the United States, as well as copyrighted files.
Do not impersonate other users. You will be banned for this, even if it is really, really funny at the time.
Do not use the service to harass or spam other fediverse users. You will be banned.
The administrators of this service reserve the unlimited right to moderate content in any way they see fit. We pledge to not excessively moderate content, but will do so if necessary.

mastodon.darksheep.social.text: Please keep in mind only English, Czech and Slovak language is used here. This rule only applies within the server instance.
No content that is illegal in the Czech Republic and in the European Union.
No incitement of violence or promotion of violent ideologies.

Respect others. We do not tolerate any derisive, offensive or hateful comments about race, religion, culture, sexual orientation, gender, identity, or political affiliation, among other things. Respect others' differences of opinion and life attitudes.
No harassment, dogpiling or doxxing or similar activities leading to targeted harassment of users.

Sexually explicit or violent media must be marked as sensitive when posting. Furthermore, NSFW content (i.e., artistic nudity) must be hidden behind a content warning, the NSFW filter, or marked as unlisted/private.
We do not allow impersonation of public figures or institutions. Parody accounts must be clearly identified.
Do not share intentionally false or misleading information.
Profiles related to cryptocurrencies and NFT allowed only after admins approval. It's because most of them are just scam.
Spam is not allowed. Meaning posting multiple posts in a short amount of time, or the same post multiple times. Malware links, fishing links. BAN without any notice.

mastodon.despise.computer.text:
No harassment.

Don't harass people on this server or any others.

No CSAM, revenge porn, etc.

If this shows up in your feed because an account you follow on another server posted, boosted, or interacted with it, notify me immediately so that I can take action.
If another server is targeting you for harassment, report it and I will de-federate them.
This server does not de-federate without good cause. What that means is necessarily arbitrary, but it will always be a high bar for me to clear. You (generally) have the right of free association.
All bots querying this instance need to have descriptive user agents. If your bot is getting blocked and you feel you have a descriptive user agent, contact me.
If something is broken, report it ASAP
