Conversely, this means that I reserve the right to exclude federating services or their users, which in my eyes deviate from these values or act contrary to them, from interacting with this service.

so.fnky.nz.text: Read the detailed code of conduct at https://geek-cookbook.funkypenguin.co.nz/community/code-of-conduct/

soapbox.hackdefendr.com.text:
Respect Privacy
Do not share or post personal information of others without their explicit consent. This includes addresses, phone numbers, emails, and private conversations.

Avoid Hate Speech
Refrain from using language that is discriminatory, racist, sexist, or hateful in any form. Promote a culture of respect and tolerance.

No Harassment
Do not engage in bullying, intimidation, or harassment of other users. This includes any form of cyberbullying or trolling.

Authenticity
Be honest about your identity. Impersonating others or creating fake accounts for deceptive purposes is prohibited.

Intellectual Property Respect
Do not post content that infringes on the intellectual property rights of others. This includes unauthorized use of copyrighted materials, trademarks, or proprietary information.

No Illegal Activities
Do not use the platform to engage in or promote illegal activities. This includes the sharing of pirated materials, instructions for committing crimes, or selling illegal substances.

Appropriate Content
Avoid posting content that is excessively violent, graphic, or sexually explicit. Adhere to community standards and content guidelines.

No Spamming
Refrain from spamming other users with unsolicited messages, advertisements, or repetitive content.

Report Abuse
If you encounter abusive behavior, illegal activity, or content that violates these rules, report it to the platform administrators promptly.

Follow Platform-Specific Rules
Adhere to any additional rules and guidelines specific to the social media platform you are using, as each platform may have its unique set of policies.

soc.gsg.live.text: We are kind of ridiculous. We are not necessarily "cool" people. Dorks unite! You may or may not be cool! But don't be a douche. That's the main thing. Be excellent to each other.
Our focus is streaming on Twitch. If you work off Youtube, that's cool too! Mostly, electronic music, but if you do something else and want to share it, please do!
We are a community. We listen to each others music, and help promote each others streams and videos.
Are you a know-it-all? Leave your worries at the door. We already love you. You don't need to prove anything.
Hang out with us. If you go to our streams, we'll go to yours. We can all do more by coming together.
Suit Up! If you can do a regular stream and you feeling Shrampy talk to us about using the logo, getting a Discord role, and getting a Mastodon account on our instance.
Rules suck. Do what you want. If you post something in the wrong place no one is going to be awful about it. Be excellent to each other. Party on dudes!

soc.eli173.com.text: No bigotries (racism, homophobia, related isms and phobias)

soc.bosio.info.text: Se ti vuoi iscrivere al social network Mastodon, ti consiglio l'istanza italiana Mastodon.uno, ma ce ne sono anche tante altre.
Ti suggerisco di acquistare un nome di dominio con associato uno spazio host sul quale installare, configurare e gestire una tua istanza Mastodon personale.

Questo server ospita una istanza sperimentale e personale del social network decentralizzato Mastodon su un computer casalingo con sistema operativo Linux Ubuntu 20.4 e server web Apache2, ospitato in una abitazione privata e non in una web farm professionale. Non sono previste iscrizioni.

This server hosts an experimental and personal instance of the decentralized social network Mastodon on a home computer with Linux Ubuntu 20.4 operating system and Apache2 web server, hosted in a private home and not in a professional web farm. Registrations are closed at the moment.

soc.jrconlin.com.text:
Nazi Punks, fuck off.

We follow the mozilla community participation guidelines <https://www.mozilla.org/en-US/about/governance/policies/participation/>, except for reporting and questions should be directed to the site admin.
No religious extremism, nationalism, racism, homophobia, transphobia or the like.
Lack of a specific rule against a certain behavior does not indicate acceptance of that behavior. Each of us has a limited amount of time in this world. Don't be a jerk.
Violating one or more of these rules may result in an immediate, permanent ban without notice or warning.

Hate speech and abusive or threatening behavior is not permitted, specifically that which directed at any gender, nationality, religion, race, age, pizza topping preference, sexual identity or broad definition of groups (except nazis. which can fuck right off)

soc.ironwyn.ch.text:
Rule #1, as if it needs to be said, is no bigotry and related disinformation. 

Anybody who is here knows what that means.
No non consensual or underage sexual depictions, even if they are theatrical, artistic, or informative. Abuse survivor imagery is no exception because it may be triggering.
Animal slaughter must have a content warning. This includes "after" photos of animal sacrifice. Photos or videos of meat in cooking preparation are fine.
Administrator and peers reserve the right to block and remove problem users.

soc.ottr.uk.text: Discrimination and bigotry are not tolerated.

Content warnings are required for content that may cause distress, upset, or be uncomfortable for others.
If in doubt; put a content warning on it.

Detailed content warnings are required for "NSFW" posts.

e.g. "nudity, non-sexual, exposed breasts"
Members under 18 must not post lewd, NSFW, explicit or sexual content. This includes replies.
No content that would otherwise be illegal in France (the location of our hosting provider).
No content that is considered illegal under French or European laws.
No harassment. e.g. repeated follow requests after being denied; attempting to follow a user who has blocked you from an alternate account.

soc.nym.se.text: This is a private Mastodon server.

soc.saiyajin.space.text: The verdicts of SonGoku and his subordinates are final. I am God here. You are not. We do not have to explain ourselfs for the verdict.

I command a one strike policy for lifetime. If you are out, you stay out. If I see you again with a puppet account, I burn you with my ten times kai-o ken out of the universe of the last and next 100 timelines.

I strictly prohibit transphobic behaviour, hate speech and any form of violence targeted towards transgender invidividuals. My commitment is to create a platform where everyone feels welcome and respected. This also applies to all other genders, even those I do not yet know.

I consider spam as one of the following: commercial advertising, promotional campaigns, crypto advertising, NFTs, anti-/vaccination, self-harm, terrorism, illegal activities not only against humanity, abuse against humanity or violence.
Clearly content warn (CW) content and discussions considered of mature or possible traumatic nature (gore, war, thrist traps, trauma).
No harm against animals. Insects are prohibited, even if covered with CW.
Do not post anything that may trigger phobia of users (Trypophobia, Arachnophobia etc.) even if you cover it behind CW.

Political opinions and discussions are allowed as long as you do not promote a party or urge other users to become politically active. You respect the decision and back off if users do not want to discuss politics. All posts have to be covered by CW.

You do not advocate military action, military progress. All military actions always have the aim of suppressing the will and dignity of a human being. This also applies in the case of defence. We are one humankind and we have to behave as such.
Religions and sects are the same scum of mental manipulation for me. Neither has any place here.
If I see you writing in foreign letters or language except english or german, I will silence or ban you. This instance is for all users and has to use a language all can understand: english.
All rules may change at anytime.

soc42.com.text: Any content presented, served or otherwise visible is not allowed to be used in any training of AI, ML or other algorithmic or statistic activities.

Be Kind and Constructive:

    While disagreements are natural, strive to approach conflicts with empathy and a desire for understanding.

No Fake News or Disinformation:

    Sharing intentionally misleading information or conspiracy theories without basis in fact is not allowed.

Account Limitations:

    Users are limited to creating one account per person, unless given explicit permission by the admins.
    Bots should be clearly marked as such and must follow all community rules.

Report Issues:

    If you encounter rule-breaking behavior, report it so the moderation team can address it.

Respect the Mods/Admins:

    Our moderation team is here to maintain a safe and welcoming environment. Please cooperate with them and respect their decisions.
    If you disagree with a moderation action, approach the situation calmly and constructively.

Follow the Platform's TOS:

    Adhere to the broader terms of service and community guidelines of the Mastodon platform.

Mind the Algorithms:

    Do not manipulate algorithms for trending topics or engage in behavior to falsely amplify messages.

Respect Boundaries:

    If someone asks you to stop interacting with them, respect their wishes.
    No sealioning (asking questions in bad faith to drain an individual's energy).

No Spam or Malicious Activity:

    Avoid excessive self-promotion or advertising.
    Do not engage in phishing, spreading malware, or other harmful activities.

Safe and Appropriate Content:

    Graphic violence, explicit adult content, and other potentially distressing material should be content warned. Misuse will lead to warnings or bans.
    No illegal content, including but not limited to copyrighted material, is allowed.

No Harassment:

    Do not intimidate, threaten, or stalk other users.
    Do not share another user's personal information without their explicit consent.

Respect Everyone:

    Do not engage in discrimination, hate speech, or harassment based on race, gender, sexuality, religion, disability, or any other personal characteristic.
    Avoid using slurs or derogatory terms.
Data Privacy & AI: No data from this instance, including user content and metadata, may be used for AI training or related modeling. Violations will lead to actions, including potential bans.

socel.net.text: Pornography or Rule 34 content of any kind is not permitted. NSFW content (i.e. artistic nudity) must be hidden behind a content warning, the NSFW filter, or marked as unlisted/private.

Incessant posting, soapboxing, campaigning, or harassment for any cause/belief/opinion violates rule no. 1 and is not tolerated. Accounts that engage in such behaviour publicly or direct it towards other users will be terminated.

Please do not spam or advertise for third parties/sponsors. This includes and is not limited to: selling items that are not your own creation, selling toots or offering toots for sale, and acting as a dealer engaged in trade.
Please report violations of these rules to the admin.
This instance is hosted by Masto.host and abides by its terms of service. The server is located in the EU in France and obeys all applicable laws.
Using Socel to circumvent restrictions or suspensions on other fediverse servers will result in your account being immediately terminated without warning.

NFT and other blockchain-based works in any form are prohibited; even if they are your own creation. Please do not post, share, promote, offer for sale, or otherwise engage in trade, any work based on these technologies.

social.64i.de.text: No content condoning or advocating for the oppression of members of marginalised groups, or general discrimination of groups based on characteristics like gender, race, disabilities, nationality, education, religion etc.
No harassment, stalking, mobbing, contacting users who have made it clear they do not wish to be contacted.
Obviously: no content that is illegal in Germany, no actions intended to damage this instance (performance, reputation, security).
No right or alt-right bullshit, Nazi content, conspiracy narratives.
No automated accounts (unless approved by the moderators). This includes bots, crossposters, feedposters etc.

When posting to the local timeline, provide Content Warnings for violence, sexually explicit content, death/disease, and politics, particularly when negative or controversial (those are the larger categories, a CW might be something like â€œuspol, electionsâ€).
When posting to the local timeline, provide image descriptions.
NSFW is allowed as long, as you CW-Tag it and it's not illegal in Germany (so no CSAM, or Gore or other very brutal stuff or stuff, thats generated/filmed without all participants permission).
Provide credit for creative works that are not your own.
Donâ€™t be a reply guy â€“ uninvited comments about another userâ€™s personal choices, lifestyle or family are strongly discouraged and may sometimes be considered harassment.
In discussions, please remain civil, do not insult the people youâ€™re talking to. Donâ€™t escalate.

social.bau-ha.us..text:
We believe in cyberanarchism; and like any good old-fashioned anarchist collective, we look out for each other. Therefore we will not tolerate behaviors resembling...
sexism
nationalism
racism
homophobia
transphobia
ableism
harassment
doxxing
...
...you probably get the picture.

Content Warnings are nice. Please use them when appropriate. As an example: Posts about food, violence or mental health issues should be tagged. If in doubt, use them. People that do not want to see CW's can toggle them off in their settings.

If you use automated posts (bots, twitter crossposts, etc.) please post them unlisted (not appearing in the local timeline, still visible to everyone). Social media is about interaction, so we like to have some of that in our local timeline, too.
We do not like twitter. Please avoid links to birdside. If we wanted to see it, we had an account over there.
Oh, and because we're not really huge fans of this whole capitalism thing: no ads for stupid stuff. Thanks. :)

Please use the "why do you want to join" box to let us know why do you want to join our instance and to convince us that you're human (or a nice non-human). To make it easier for us to filter spam registrations please also tell us about your favorite forest creature.
Be excellent to each other! (J.W.v.Goethe, 1932) [[Citation needed]]

Be respectful and inclusive. 

Do not discriminate against anyone based on their race, sex, sexual orientation, or gender identity.

Keep your content appropriate. 

Do not share explicit content without proper warnings or markings. Explicit content is not allowed in user avatars or header images.

Treat others with respect. 

Do not harass or bully other users on this or other instances.

Promote peaceful discourse. 

Do not incite violence or promote violent ideologies.

Share accurate information. 

Do not spread misinformation about public health, politics, or military matters.

Avoid unsolicited promotional messages. 

Do not spam the server with commercial advertising, service promotions, or SEO-related content.

Respect others' identities. 

Do not impersonate other individuals, public figures, or organizations without clearly stating that you are doing so for parody purposes.

Identify automated accounts. 

Automated (bot) accounts must enable the bot flag in their account preferences. Respect #nobot markers and post as unlisted unless posting less than once an hour.

Adhere to local laws. 

Do not post content that is illegal in Finland and Germany.

social.chiefgyk3d.com.text: No Hate Speech: We're committed to maintaining a respectful, inclusive environment. Hate speech or any other form of communication that demeans, belittles, or attacks someone will not be tolerated.
No Bigotry: Any form of bigotry, including but not limited to racism, sexism, homophobia, and xenophobia, is strictly prohibited. This server values diversity and respect for all its members.

Cryptocurrency and NFTs: Shilling of joke coins is allowed, but they must be clearly noted as such. Shilling of NFTs with no utility or purpose is not permitted, with exceptions for charitable causes that have been vetted and approved. Our focus is on education, not profit-chasing.
NSFW Content: NSFW content is permitted but must be given a clear content warning and tagged appropriately. This allows members to opt-in or avoid such content based on their comfort level.
Financial Advice: Professional financial advice is permissible if you're legally certified (e.g., CPA). All others should focus on sharing knowledge, not advice.

Civil Discourse: We encourage open, robust debate and intellectual exchange. However, we expect these discussions to be carried out in a respectful and civil manner. Aggressive or offensive language is not allowed.
Content Creator Support: We respect and support the rights of content creators. Unauthorized sharing or copying of another's creative work is not allowed.
Respect for Privacy: Respect for personal privacy is paramount. Do not share another member's private information without their explicit consent.
No Spam: Avoid spamming the chat with repetitive messages, ads, or off-topic content.
Profile Conduct: Inappropriate usernames, avatars, or profile bios will not be tolerated.
Safe Environment: Threats, harassment, or any form of intimidation towards other members is strictly prohibited.
No Illegal Activity: Promotion or encouragement of illegal activities is not allowed.
Constructive Feedback: Offer feedback to other members constructively and politely, maintaining a supportive and positive community environment.
No Fascism: Fascism is in no way compatible with the openness and civility of this server. If you're wondering why, just open a history book.

Always use content warnings (CWs) when sharing content that: is likely to be distressing or hurtful to others; should require consent to view; includes discussions or depictions of violence, sexually explicit material, and/or common PT triggers; includes flashing or rapidly changing images.
No posting of Personally Identifiable Information about others (â€œdoxingâ€).
No posting of sexual material that is without consent.
No posting of sexual material that depicts individuals appearing to be under age 18, including Loli.
No excessive, frequent promotions of a product or service (i.e., spam).
No material that promotes bigotry, including fascist, racist, misogynistic, homophobic, or transphobic content.
Respect norms as described in Social.Coop's Code of Conduct here: https://wiki.social.coop/wiki/Code_of_conduct

social.crabs.life.text: Bigotry or harassment is not tolerated here. This includes, but is not limited to: racism, sexism, xenophobia, transphobia, homophobia, pluralphobia (including endophobia: discrimination towards non-traumagenic systems), misogyny, ableism, or hate symbols.

Always assume good faith from other users. Remember there are humans with their own share of pain, stress, and joy on the other side of the screen, and take the most respectful interpretation from their messages and actions that you can.
Sensitive topics (e.g. death, drug use) should be marked with a content warning.
Avoid discussing or organizing in-person meetups on the instance in any form.
Use reasonable judgement, and avoid topics likely to result in unreasonable moderation burden.

social.cpress.org.text: Do unto others as you think they would want done to them.
Mark sensitive content with a content warning.
Gratuitous obscenity that serves no practical benefit to a discussion is not permitted.
Illegal content, unsurprisingly, is not permitted
Spam is not permitted, this includes creating spam accounts that only serve to provide profile links or advertise products and services.

Hate speech and abusive or threatening behavior is not permitted, specifically that which directed at any gender, nationality, religion, race, age, pizza topping preference, or sexual identity. One can hate on bad economic analysis all day long here.
Lack of a specific rule against a certain behavior does not indicate acceptance of that behavior. Each of us has a limited amount of time in this world. Don't be a jerk.
Violating one or more of these rules may result in an immediate, permanent ban without notice or warning.
You may not impersonate a person or brand without a clear indication the account is unofficial and/or a parody. Parody accounts are permitted, as are legitimate organisational accounts.
No attacks against (or from) the instance. You may not do anything which may impact confidentiality, integrity or availability of social.cpress.org.Exchange, the users of the service or their data.

social.fanbards.net.text: Everyone gets a say here. If you find something someone says offensive that is not by itself a reason for them to be banned. You should always make use of mute or block before pushing to Administrator.

NSFW  18+ content is allowed here, but you are expected to properly utilize the sensitive content settings on your posts. If you are looking for nothing but NSFW then may we suggest the instance at https://mstdn.lemontastica.net and Lemontastica.net main for such content.

As this is a fansite, and archiving of Fanart, Fiction, and other creations is welcome we also welcome AI generated images as well. Please tag them appropriately and share what you've managed to generate or create. Also feel free to share your process as well.

social.fetedelamusique.de.text: FÃªte de la Musique Berlin is committed to creating a welcoming and inclusive online community that encourages open dialogue, mutual respect, and constructive engagement. As a member of this Mastodon channel, we ask that you abide by the following guidelines:

Respect Others: Treat all members of this community with respect and kindness, regardless of their race, ethnicity, nationality, religion, gender identity, sexual orientation, age, or any other personal characteristics.
Any form of discrimination or harassment, including but not limited to trolling, flaming, or bullying, will not be tolerated.
Keep it Civil: Engage in constructive and respectful conversations, even if you disagree with someone else's opinion. Avoid personal attacks, name-calling, or insults.
Stay on Topic: Keep your posts and comments relevant to the purpose of the Fete de la Musique Mastodon channel. Do not engage in spamming, advertising, or any other form of self-promotion.
Protect Your Privacy: Do not share personal information, such as your address, phone number, or email address, with anyone in the community. Be mindful of your own privacy and the privacy of others.

Report Any Issues: If you witness any behavior that violates this Code of Conduct, or if you experience any form of harassment or discrimination, please report it to the moderators immediately: hallo@fetedelamusique.de
By participating in the Mastodon channel of FÃªte de la Musique Berlin, you agree to abide by this Code of Conduct.
We reserve the right to remove any content or member that violates these guidelines, and to take appropriate action against any form of harassment, discrimination, or other unacceptable behavior.

social.furryrefuge.com.text: Donâ€™t spam or advertise in a chat. We have channels for advertising art AND other personal stuff, please use them. They will be listed in the chat list. DMing random people for advertising is NOT ok and will result in us removing you. Use the chats designed for advertising.

Donâ€™t be mean. Common sense is your friend, just be nice. In general, if someone asks you not to do something because it bothers them, just dont do it. If we think you are a troll, spammer, or inviting bots, we are going to remove you.
Non-directed jokes in poor taste are acceptable unless someone takes offence. Read your audience.
Glorification or promotion of illegal activities is not permitted. Talking about CP will get you instabanned.
Unless the chat is for a specific language, please expect to use the English language. We have German and Russian chats. If you think we should have another language chat, just ask!
Invalidating someoneâ€™s personal identity is not okay. Likewise, donâ€™t make a big deal out of someoneâ€™s identity including your own.
This is not the setting to preach your views on a particular subject when others have moved on.
Donâ€™t post politics or religion. It never ends well and youâ€™re only setting yourself up to get into an argument. Everyone is different. Everyone is welcome. Keep this in mind.
Statements which are meant to cause harm or are generally offensive are not allowed. Think before you speak. Your thoughts are your own, however some should stay private.

Casual discussion of self-harm, physically or mentally, is not acceptable. For example, talking about how you frequently drink until you pass out, or having constant mental breakdowns in chat. If you need help, reach out and one of our staff can give you a list of hotlines to call.
When posting images to a chat or channel, keep them on topic. If youâ€™re talking about cars in the musician chat, you should probably join the Auto Furs chat.
If your account looks like a bot (No username, No bio, No profile picture) we might remove it. Take the 5 minutes to edit your profile and appear like a real person.
Obey the per-room rules listed in the description of chats/channels.
AI images should somehow be made known they are AI generated through conversation or use of a tag, title, or spoiler.

social.hergorn.com.text: Discrimination, especially against minorities, is strongly discouraged. This includes, but is not limited to: Racism, xenophobia. Homophobia, transphobia, and other queerphobia. Classism. Gatekeeping the "queer" status (acephobia, etc.)
"Punching up" does not fall under the guideline above, and is allowed.

Usage of right-wing figures of speech are strongly discouraged. Please keep yourselves up-to-date on the dog whistles that are going around. Of course, this point will be evaluated on a case-by-case basis, as right-wing dog whistles are created to intentionally hijack everyday jokes and signs.

Advertising is strongly discouraged. Fund raisers, users of the site selling their own products or advertising their services are fine - we absolutely do not want corporations to advertise on here, however.

Posting media without media descriptions, also known as alt text, is strongly discouraged. We encourage you to enable the popups that warn you if you are about to toot or boost content that does not follow this guideline.
Don't spam. Of course, some jokes are mostly repetitive (common "fedi bits"), but use common sense on where to draw the line. If the local timeline contains just your toots, you're taking it too far.

Do not interpret these guidelines in bad faith, not even for "playing the devil's advocate". We are trying to foster a progressive community - if you have an issue with the guidelines, feel free to discuss it.

You must use content warnings for content. This includes obvious topics such as sexual content, assault, mental health issues, but also less obvious ones like food, selfies, pictures with eye contact to the viewer, etc. Even if you may not find topics triggering at all, this helps.
Any content illegal in Germany will be removed. We want this site to stay online, and as such, we have to follow laws in addition to our own morals.

social.lavanderblue.art.text: Harassment, threats, and intimidation are not permitted. Neither is inciting violence against others, including by encouraging people to hurt themselves, or by sharing private information to encourage or facilitate crimes against them (doxxing).

No toleration for promotion of fascist, white supremacist, violent or hateful ideology or symbolism. This includes but is not limited to Holocaust denial, Nazi symbolism, and anti-trans, misogynistic, and/or racist harassment; including in usernames, avatars, and profiles.

No permission for the willful or persistent promotion of misinformation, disinformation, or conspiracy theories. This includes, but is not limited to, bigoted conspiracy theories and misinformation about elections and vaccines.

No permission for the sustained disruption of conversation, including on the local timeline, in hashtags, or in replies. Only use tags that are relevant to your posts, and do not disrupt conversation with excessive tags or replies. If you are asked to leave someone alone, leave them alone.

social.mapolist.com.text: Respect Others: Treat all members with kindness and respect. Avoid offensive language, personal attacks, and discrimination based on race, gender, religion, or other factors.
No Hate Speech or Harassment: Do not engage in or tolerate hate speech, bullying, or harassment of any kind. Report such behavior promptly.
Stay On Topic: Keep discussions relevant to the group's purpose or topic. Avoid posting unrelated content or spam.
Use Clear and Courteous Language: Communicate clearly and politely. Use proper grammar and avoid excessive use of slang or abbreviations that might confuse others.
No Self-Promotion: Refrain from excessive self-promotion or spamming the group with advertisements. Self-promotion should be relevant and not disrupt the community.
Respect Privacy: Do not share personal information about others without their consent. Respect members' privacy and boundaries.
Fact-Check Information: Before sharing news or information, verify its accuracy to prevent the spread of false or misleading content.
Be Constructive: Provide constructive feedback and contribute positively to discussions. Critique ideas, not individuals.
No Trolling: Do not engage in trolling or disruptive behavior that aims to provoke others or derail conversations.
Report Issues: If you encounter inappropriate behavior or content, report it to the group administrators or moderators rather than taking matters into your own hands.

social.markofall.com.text: Focus on what is best for the community.

Do not publish others' private information, such as a physical or electronic address, without explicit permission.
Do not engage in conduct which could reasonably be considered inappropriate in a professional setting.
Do not post image, video, or audio with Public visibility without providing a media description.

social.oddly-influenced.dev.text: This server follows the ethic of the podcast: we ask "*if* this idea is true, what might it mean for developing software?
Consequently, the tone of the community should be "yes, and..." rather than "no, because...".
We can all post things not strictly aligned with the purpose of the site, but: if that's all (or almost all) you do, I'll ask you to go elsewhere.

Do not post things intended to make other people feel bad (racism, sexism - all the things a polite person knows not to do). You're a grown-up, so don't insult me with an "I'm just asking questions" dodge.

Do not post material under someone else's copyright. If you believe your copyright has been violated, please send notices to marick@exampler.com (preferred) or in writing to 913 W White, Champaign, IL, 61821, USA.
The preceding two rules are described in more detail in the Terms of Service, which you can find via the  "About" link on most pages or the "Learn More" link on the home page.

social.politicaconciencia.org.text: Todo miembro de la instancia social.politicaconciencia.org acepta de manera voluntaria los TÃ©rminos del servicio.

Todo miembro de esta instancia se obliga voluntariamente a respetar cada uno de los puntos del cÃ³digo de conducta. De no hacerlo, recibirÃ¡ hasta un mÃ¡ximo de tres llamadas de atenciÃ³n, dependiendo de la severidad de la falta. En caso de reincidencia, su cuenta serÃ¡ cancelada.

Todo miembro de la instancia social.politicaconciencia.org se compromete a respetar las indicaciones, sugerencias o peticiones directas que le realice el equipo de administraciÃ³n. No hacerlo es causa de suspensiÃ³n de la cuenta.
El equipo de administraciÃ³n de social.politicaconciencia.org estÃ¡ obligado a resolver los problemas que surjan de la interacciÃ³n entre los miembros de la instancia.

Se permite la expresiÃ³n libre de las ideas sin importar las creencias, las convicciones polÃ­ticas o religiosas de los miembros de la instancia, siempre y cuando no contradigan algÃºn punto del cÃ³digo de conducta.

No estÃ¡ permitido el uso de palabras altisonantes, frases, albures, composiciones lingÃ¼Ã­sticas, etc., empleadas con el propÃ³sito claro de ofender, denigrar, humillar o difamar a cualquier miembro de la instancia o del fediverso.
EstÃ¡ prohibido el uso de imÃ¡genes o material multimedia (audio, video, gifs animados, etc.,) destinados a ofender, denigrar, humillar o difamar a cualquier miembro de la instancia o del fediverso.

Se prohÃ­be cualquier forma de discriminaciÃ³n, ya sea por gÃ©nero, condiciÃ³n econÃ³mica, nacionalidad, condiciÃ³n de salud o similares, en contra de cualquier miembro de la instancia o del fediverso.

Cuando un miembro de la instancia desconozca un tema, queda prohibido responder en tÃ©rminos que lo disuadan de manifestar sus dudas. Siempre que le sea posible,  cada usuario debe ayudar a disipar los vacÃ­os de conocimiento. Nadie puede ser discriminado por su nivel de conocimiento.

Durante el proceso para dirimir una controversia, no se considerarÃ¡ como razÃ³n vÃ¡lida en su defensa el que un usuario alegue que desconoce los tÃ©rminos del servicio o el cÃ³digo de conducta para justificar la realizaciÃ³n de acciones que vayan en su contra. Es deber de todos los usuarios conocerlos.

Para la buena convivencia, los debates  deben favorecer la exposiciÃ³n de los argumentos y no centrarse en ataques contra el objeto o tema del que se hable, ni en contra de la persona que lo expone. Con ello se busca procurar conversaciones constructivas con contenido informativo enriquecedor.
Se prohÃ­be subir, compartir o divulgar material pornogrÃ¡fico de cualquier Ã­ndole, incluida la pedofilia. Infringir este punto es causa de revocaciÃ³n inmediata de la cuenta de usuario.
El material artÃ­stico con contenido sexual explÃ­cito estÃ¡ permitido; no obstante, debe ser marcado como material sensible (CW). De lo contrario, podrÃ­a ser eliminado.

El material audiovisual (imÃ¡genes, audio, video, gifs, etc.,) cuyo contenido sea definible como violento, necesariamente debe ser marcado como material sensible (CW). De otra forma, podrÃ¡ ser eliminado.
Esta instancia no puede ser usada para la realizaciÃ³n de actividades consideradas como delictivas por la legislaciÃ³n vigente en MÃ©xico.
Casos no previstos aquÃ­ serÃ¡n resueltos por los administradores de la instancia social.politicaconciencia.org

social.transsafety.network.text: This server is for Trans Safety Network volunteers and staff only.
This server shall not be used to send abuse or harassment either within the instance or elsewhere in the fediverse.

Trans Safety Network is an organisation committed to intersectional trans safety within an intersectional trans liberation framework:

As such users of this server commit to avoid perpetuating racism, ablism, sexism, colonialism, transphobia or other forms of bigotry.

Violating one or more of these rules may result in an immediate, permanent ban without notice or warning.
You may not impersonate a person or brand without a clear indication the account is unofficial and/or a parody. Parody accounts are permitted, as are legitimate brand accounts.
No attacks against (or from) the instance. You may not do anything which may impact confidentiality, integrity or availability of this system.
No doxing (aka doxxing) or disclosing personal information without consent and as a means of harassing or causing others to harass another person.
No harassment in the form of continued engagement after a person has requested contact to stop.

Automated posting: - accounts that post over 30% using automation - must be labeled as a â€œbotâ€ in the user profile to help provide a visual indicator to visitors. Automated posts must be limited to one post per hour/24 per day.

Het beheer heeft de vrijheid om naar eigen inzicht te modereren en heeft het laatste woord bij eventuele disputen.

sonomu.club.text: No discriminatory behaviour and content promoting or advocating the oppression of members of marginalised groups

No conspiracy narratives, nationalist propaganda, reactionary myths, Nazi symbolism or promoting the ideology of National Socialism.  No promotion of so-called "conversion therapy".
Do not publish private conversations, except to the moderation team if you need to report them.
No corporate accounts, no excessive advertising, no bots, or automated crossposters from other networks.
Use content warnings (CW) for sexually explicit or violent media and other content that might be common triggers.
Write descriptions to all media if possible (else ask for help: #Alt4Me, @imagecaptionpls...).
Do not clog the local timeline with frequent short posts. Use threads and unlisted visibility.
No illegal content. Abide by laws.

soundbyte.social.text: All official languages of the European Union are welcome here, as well as Icelandic and Norwegian. All computer languages are also welcome.
Respect the boundaries of other people. They may not share their world-view with you.
Humour is allowed and encouraged. But be aware of the potential to cause offence, and always take remedial action should this occur.

Parody is allowed. But if the parody is not obvious, then it should be explicitly labelled as such. Misinformation, disinformation, and other content shared with the intention to mislead is prohibited.

Use Content Warnings (CW) liberally. Especially for posts that a reader might find offensive, controversial, or difficult. CWs can also be used as a short summary of a long post, like a tl;dr. If in doubt, put your content behind a Content Warning.
Harassment, trolling, microaggressions, bullying, stalking, dogpiling, doxxing and ad hominem attacks are all prohibited, along with the incitement of others to perform such actions.

Do not discriminate on any ground such as sex, gender, race, colour, language, religion, political or other opinion, national or social origin, association with a national minority, property, birth or other status.
Fascism, Nazi symbolism, holocaust denial, incitement of violence and the promotion of violent ideologies are all prohibited.

Do not flood, spam, shitpost, carry out any action intended to impede users from using the service, degrade the performance of the service, or incite others to perform any of the aforementioned actions.
Include attribution to third party content whenever possible.
Illegal content and links to illegal content are prohibited.
Do not share NFT or crypto content. This is nonsense. Take it elsewhere.
Leave moderation to the moderators. Do not tone police, and avoid debating moderation activity in public. Report content if necessary.

spaceballs.masto.host.text:
No Nazis, Racists, TERFs, Abelism, or Creeps of Any Kind.

Let's be honest, you shouldn't be welcome ANYWHERE. That's what got us into *waves around*.

Respect people's boundaries and privacy. 

No means no. Someone blocked you? Let them be. Is their post not public? Don't scrape it.

Be nice, welcoming, and empathetic.

Other social platforms are intentionally designed to stoke divisiveness, rage, and dischord. The only Dischord you should be paying attention to is the one with Fugazi on it, anyway.

Having a sense of humor doesn't hurt. 

Humor is all around. It's OK to be funnyâ€”as long as you're punching up, not down. If you don't know the difference, you shouldn't be on this instance.

No Crypto, Memestocks, DeFi, NFT, or Web3 Chatter.

The communities around these topics frequently slide into conspiracy and fascist horseshit, not to mention just being outright scams.

speedlines.stctp.zone.text: Be excellent to one another! No harassment, trolling, abuse, etc. If you have to ask if something is harassment the answer is probably yes.
Credit your art! We love artists here in Speedlines and recognize the extreme importance of making sure original creators of art are duly credited.

Keep it clean! 18+ content should be behind a content warning. Anything that you think might be on the line should be behind a content warning. Accounts for primarily posting adult content may be silenced from public timelines.
No transphobia or queerphobia! Speedlines is operated by a queer person and the STCTP community is full of wonderful trans and queer folks.
No racism! Don't be like that one STC summer special. You know the one.

Learn how to use content warnings! If you want to talk about spoilers or heavy content and allow others to opt into it please use a content warning. Do not demand others use content warnings; harmful content will most likely break another rule.
No TERF or GC nonsense! Trans rights are human rights and it's not up for debate or discussion. If you believe differently, you're not welcome here and should go to the sewers where shit belongs.
No fascism! Not even going to bother explaining this one. Fascism is to be destroyed, not debated.
No "zombie account" auto-posting! If you're going to be here: be here. Automatically dumping your posts here from some other site without participating in the community is not welcome.

spoilertv.social.text:
Respect Others
Every user is expected to interact with others respectfully. Harassment, bullying, or any form of intimidation will not be tolerated.

No Hate Speech

Expressing hatred or promoting violence against individuals or groups based on attributes such as race, religion, gender, age, nationality, or sexual orientation is strictly prohibited.

No Illegal Content
Sharing or promoting illegal content, including but not limited to, copyright infringement and promoting illegal activities, is strictly forbidden.

No Spamming
Please refrain from spamming in any form, including unsolicited advertisements or excessive off-topic content.

NSFW Content
If you're sharing sensitive or adult content, please use the Content Warning (CW) or Not Safe For Work (NSFW) features appropriately to hide such content.

Privacy
Respect the privacy of others. Do not share other people's personal information without their explicit consent.

Bots
Bots are allowed, but they must be clearly identified as such in their profile and must not engage in spamming or disruptive behavior.

Blocking and Reporting
If you encounter someone who is breaking these rules, you have the right to block them. Please also report the violation so our moderators can take appropriate action.

spookykitties.com.text: Discrimination & Bigotry Wonâ€™t Be Tolerated. We're not a free speech absolutist. We're not interested in Nazis, TERFS, or hate speech.
Respect Other Users. This instance is meant to be a friendly, welcoming space to all who are willing to reciprocate in helping to create that environment.
Consent is Important in all contexts. If youâ€™re ever unsure, ask first. Use content warnings (CWs) where required.
Listen; Donâ€™t Make Excuses. If youâ€™re accused of causing harm, either take some responsibility or ask moderators for help.
No Pedophilia or Zoophilia. This includes artistic depictions of characters that cannot give consent.

Members under the age of 18 are not permitted to post lewd, explicit, nsfw, or otherwise sexual content. This includes as original posts or in reply to other members, as well as boosting content of this type from their accounts.
No direct threats and incitement to violence. Expressing dissatisfaction is fine, but directly stating interest or intent to commit violent harm are not welcome on this server.
Use the Report Feature. Our moderators are here to listen and respond to reports.

spore.social.text: We support justice and action, specifically on climate, with the intention of bringing a better world into being.
We apply content warnings to traumatic conversations but content warnings are never used to silence conversations about justice.
We do not tolerate hate-speech. We allow swearing but we do not allow bigoted language of any kind.
We do not allow misogyny of any kind, particularly trans misogyny.
We do not perpetuate ableism in our actions or language, including refraining from use of ableist language.
We are safe for work (no nudity or pornographic images of any kind). At the same time, we support sex workers and recognize sex work is work.
We are trauma-informed and abolitionist. We believe in bringing people in and giving them space to be better instead of blocking or bans.
We do not allow unfounded conspiracy theories, misinformation, disinformation, and state-sponsored propaganda.

syzito.xyz.text: Syzito allows free expression of opinion, within fair boundaries, that means no bigotry, crime, harassment, trolling or malicious misinformation.

systerserver.town.text: This is a space for feminists that have been somehow connected to the systerserver network.

No discrimination: No content condoning or advocating for the oppression of members of marginalised groups, or general discrimination of groups based on characteristics such as gender, race, disabilities, ethnicity, class, nationality, education, religion.
No harassment: stalking, mobbing, deadnaming, misgendering, contacting users who have made it clear they do not wish to be contacted.
Content warnings: We do not require a content warning (CW). However, we ask that you be kind and considerate: include CWs if you believe your post may be distressing to others.
Bots: Bots are allowed. Try to make them fun.

Cross-posting: Cross-posting from Twitter, RSS, etc. is fine (and even encouraged if it helps you become more active here). If you do cross-post please do it in a way that adds to the conversation in our community.

Self-promotion: Please use your account to promote your work. - we want to see it or hear about it because we are convinced that the world needs more feminist contributions, be they political, artistic, pointing to history or imagning a better world, or anything else.
Just one thing: Please do so in a respectful tasteful and not spammy manner.
Language: There are no language rules on this server. English is by default de facto the main language, but feel free (even encouraged!) to post in other languages.
Accessibility: Help make this space more accessible. Use the available accessibility tools. For instance to provide a summary/description for images. Yes, even for your obscure memes.
Licenses: We support free art licenses, Creative Commons licenses, copyleft, public domain and we don't want to deal with copyright infringements.
The main moderators for this instance right now are @ana, @anne and @gaba. Please report any post or account through the mastodon interface (https://docs.joinmastodon.org/user/moderating/).

This code of conduct is based on the following server rules:

    https://blog.chaos.social/rules
    https://post.lurk.org/about/more

teal.social.text: Bigotry, including but not limited to discrimination or hate speech based on race, gender, sexuality, religion, disability, or any other attacks on oneâ€™s personhood, will not be tolerated.

Threatening behaviour or harassment of any kind will not be tolerated. Our community and its platforms are not to be used to launch attacks on anyone. Do not post screenshots of DMs or posts marked as private without the consent of all involved.
When replying, consider whether your perspective is needed or whether youâ€™d gain more by listening.

Use content warnings when posting depictions of sex and sexuality, substance abuse, violence, disease, body horror, and death. Mark images as sensitive if they contain nudity, gore, food, or any of the above subject matter.

When posting someone elseâ€™s work (art, cosplay, and so on), please do your best to source it and provide links to the creator's social media or portfolio. If you don't have the source, do a reverse image search to look for it.
The following content is strictly prohibited and will result in an immediate ban: sexual depictions of children, Nazi symbolism, and promotion of cryptocurrency or NFTs.

tech.lgbt.text:
Discrimination & Bigotry Wonâ€™t Be Tolerated.

We're not a free speech absolutist. We're not interested in Nazis, TERFS, or hate speech. Targeted misgendering, deadnaming, or promotion of so-called "conversion therapy" is prohibited.

Respect Other Users.

This instance is meant to be a friendly, welcoming space to all who are willing to reciprocate in helping to create that environment.

Consent is Important in all contexts.

If youâ€™re ever unsure, ask first. Use content warnings (CWs) where required.

Listen; Donâ€™t Make Excuses.

If youâ€™re accused of causing harm, either take some responsibility or ask moderators for help.

No Pedophilia or Zoophilia.

This includes artistic depictions of characters that cannot give consent.

Members under the age of 18 are not permitted to post lewd, explicit, nsfw, or otherwise sexual content. This includes as original posts or in reply to other members, as well as boosting content of this type from their accounts.
No direct threats and incitement to violence. Expressing dissatisfaction is fine, but directly stating interest or intent to commit violent harm are not welcome on this server.

Use the Report Feature.
Our moderators are here to listen and respond to reports.

texasobserver.social.text: Content Warnings/Wrappers: The Texas Observer is a news outlet, sharing information about politics from protests to policy-making. We endeavor to be friendly participants in the fediverse and we welcome polite feedback about our use of CW tags on our posts.
Users: This server is for staff of the Texas Observer, and is closed to registration from others.
Moving Accounts: Our staff are free to move their accounts to other Mastodon instances when they leave the Texas Observer, or at any other time.

DM's are Not Encrypted: Direct messages on Mastodon are not encrypted, and can be read by administrators on the instances of anyone mentioned. Do not use them for secure or truly private communications.
Alt Text: Users are expected to always add some form of descriptive alt text to pictures and other attached media.
We do not tolerate bigoted speech on this server (though we like to think our employees know better!). Targeted misgendering, deadnaming, or promotion of so-called "conversion therapy" is prohibited.

tfq.social.text: No illegal content, copyrighted material, etc.

No advertising or spam (unless its Spam... tasty tasty Spam).
All NSFW posts need to be tagged/have content warning.

ALL are expected to be polite and respectful to each other on this server.

1. NO DISCRIMINATION of any kind WILL BE TOLERATED!

In other words, don't be a DICK!

theexpan.se.text: No bigotry of any sort. Disrespectful comments related to gender, gender identity and expression, sexual orientation, disability, mental health, neuro(a)typicality, age, physical appearance, body size, race, and religion are absolutely unacceptable here.

Engage others in good faith. Ask questions because you want to learn, and share your own thoughts and expertise without condescension. We're lucky to have myriad fields to learn about, and everyone is a complete beginner somewhere.
Harassment, threats, and doxxing are grounds for an immediate ban.
No bots or automatic crossposting without moderator approval.
No graphic sexual, violent, or otherwise disturbing images in public posts without a content/media warning.
Make this server welcoming by using relevant hashtags, including image descriptions, and avoiding excessive formatting that interferes with screen readers.

thefolklore.cafe.text: No racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, xenophobia, or bigotry in general

Please create a profile when your account is approved, regularly sign in and become an active member of the community. Accounts that register and do nothing are generally removed after 1 month.

thegoblin.market.text: No posting other artist's work without credit AND analysis/opinion .
Posting the same content on multiple instances in order to spam local and/or federated timelines is not permitted.

Hide sensitive content such as violence and other potentially triggering topics under a CW, & tag #NSFW. In the CW provide a short indication of why you are using the CW to help people make an informed decision. Non-erotic artistic nudity should be tagged #nudity and behind a CW.
No unapproved bots, advertising, or spam (you *can* post your own shop links and commission pages! Please share those often!).

No racism, sexism, discrimination against gender and sexual minorities, transphobia, anti-Semitism, ableism, xenophobia and/or violent nationalism, or the advocation of any of the above. Talking about your personal experience of suffering any of the above is allowed.

No content that includes sexual depictions of minors (this includes loli), content illegal in Germany and/or France, such as holocaust denial or Nazi symbolism, conduct promoting the ideology of National Socialism.
The Goblin Market has a zero-tolerance mandate for harassment or bullying â€” your account will be immediately suspended.
Conduct intended to stalk or harass users, impede users from using the service, degrade the performance of the service, or incite others to perform any of the aforementioned actions, is disallowed.
No NFT content. None at all. There are crypto-related instances on the fediverse that would be more suitable.
No flooding the public timelines (making lots of public posts in quick succession).
If you're posting an image then PLEASE add alt-text to it

theha.us.text: 1) Don't be a dick, which isn't really as sufficient a rule as everyone who says it thinks it is, until you add that I (Mike) am the arbiter of who is a dick, and if you don't like that you shouldn't have an account here, which works out because only my friends have accounts here.

thehappyfamily.stream.text: This Machine Kills Fascists! We here at the Happy Family DO NOT support fascism, Nazism, imperialism or any kind of far-right ideology in any form! Anyone promoting them or using their imagery in a proselytizing manner will be banned!

Be kind to others! Anti-BIPOC (Black, Indigenous, and People of Color), sexist, ableist, racist, homophobic, and transphobic views will not be tolerated. Use of racial or offensive slurs will get you banned.
Be kind to yourself! Please avoid using self-deprecating language regarding yourself or your works. Language and how we use it is important, please be mindful of how you speak about yourself.

NSFW is OK within reason! We allow R18/NSFW images, but all such content must be tagged as sensitive, and you should add CWs as necessary. If you repeatedly fail to mark said post as sensitive, we will make your account enforced-sensitive.

Creators are welcome! Artists, musicians, writers & artisans are welcome to engage with the community regarding their craft, just donâ€™t make advertising posts for the sake of purely promoting a commercial product or service.

Well ran & corpo free Fedi! This server abides by the Mastodon Server Covenant (joinmastodon.org/covenant). We are also a proud signer of the Anti-Meta Fedi Pact (fedipact.online) as well as actively block Meta Threads and connections there of.
This server is volunteer run! If you would like to help defray hosting/server costs, you can send funds to Admin Mini: (ko-fi.com/ministryofennuicontrol) Just say itâ€™s for the Mastodon server!

theinternet.social.text: We are all friends here, and we expect you to act like it.

theomega.zone.text: Respect the laws of Iceland (server host) and the United States of America.

Threatening, abusive, intolerant or illegal behavior may lead to moderation and/or further measures. We have a zero tolerance approach to racism, sexism, homophobia and transphobia. Moderation decisions are final.
The Content Warning flag must be used for NSFW content, and NSFW media must be marked as sensitive.
Accounts engaging in behaviors such as impersonation, spam, political propaganda, and improper commercial advertising may be removed at the discretion of the Moderation team.
Do not harass or bully other users.

Keep discussions civil and respectful, and refrain from using derogatory language or engaging in personal attacks.
Do not reveal personal information about other people without their consent.
Use appropriate tags and content warnings when posting potentially sensitive or triggering content.
If you see a violation of these rules, report it to the Moderation team.

thesystem.masto.host.text:
# Be the best of humanity  you can be.
These are our values, respect is earned, not given, not bought,, so strive to be of those who are trying to be the best of humanity.

thetavern.social.text: This is a private server for At the Tavern. Regardless, our users are expected to follow these guidelines

thewiring.com.text:
First and only rule.
Be respectful. And remember that your freedom ends when it affects the freedom of others.

thewizardingworld.com.text: Respect your fellow wizards and witches. Treat them with kindness, consideration, and empathy.
Discrimination will not be tolerated. Any form of discrimination based on race, gender, sexual orientation, or other personal characteristics is strictly prohibited.
Be mindful of your language. Offensive or vulgar language will not be tolerated.
Harassment and bullying are strictly prohibited. This includes online and offline behavior.
Respect other users' opinions and beliefs. Everyone has the right to express their views and beliefs without fear of judgment or ridicule.
Spamming is not allowed. Do not flood the server with repetitive or irrelevant content.
Be mindful of spoilers. If discussing Harry Potter-related content that could spoil the experience for others, please use appropriate spoiler tags.
Respect the privacy of others. Do not share personal information without the user's consent.
Do not engage in any illegal activities on the server.
Follow the instructions of the moderators. If a moderator asks you to stop a particular behavior, please comply promptly.

theweird.space.text: No racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, xenophobia, etc.  Particularly marginalized people have to put up with too much of this as it is.
Be generous with content warnings. Generally R-rated stuff is cool if behind a CW, but also CW not safe for lunch stuff as well. Nothing graphic or explicit please.
No harassment, dogpiling, doxxing, etc. Be nice; don't threaten people.
No deliberate misinformation: election denial, anti-vax, etc. If we want that we can watch Fox News.
Unless it's obviously satire, don't incite violence or try to get people to break laws.

If it's not obvious by now, this is not a "free speech absolutist" instance. We will moderate, including going as far as closing accounts, and blocking people on other instances (and entire instances) if necessary.

thicc.horse.text: Treat others as they would like to be treated.
Sexual, adult, and graphic content must be CW'ed. No posting art or sexual content without credit. No AI generated art allowed.
No Minors. No accounts impersonating minors. No sexualized content of minors.
No cops, law enforcement, or ICE on Thicc.Horse

No Racism, Bigotry, transphobia, body shaming, kink shaming.
This includes "chasers" and other forms of unwanted fetishization.
No explicit profile photos or profile backgrounds.
No accounts created directly to impersonate real people.

No distribution/posting illegal content that breaks US Law.

This includes but is not limited to revenge porn, stolen content, CSAM, or any content that depicts real non-consensual sex.

No timeline flooding.

This includes but is not limited to: Bulk advertisement, automated posting, any intentional method to make the timeline unreadable to others.

No intentional actions to gain unauthorized access or harm Thicc.Horse.

Inappropriately Accessing, Destroying, Copying, or Damaging resources.
Any hypothetical posting about death, physically maiming, or harming others should be CW'ed.
No Doxxing, for legal and safety reasons. Even publicly available information can count if it targets an individual and/or is potentially threatening.

thinkydoers.social.text: This is an anti-racist, trans-inclusive feminist, and LGBTQ+ friendly and welcome server.
We use CWs (content warnings) liberally and not only as â€œtrigger warnings.â€ CWs enable consent: using them lets folks who see your posts decide what they do and donâ€™t wish to click to expand.

That said: Black community members, members of underrepresented or historically oppressed communities and cultures may choose as they wish about CWs especially when posting about racism. White fragility will be moderated / educated about on this server.

Harassment and/or abusive behavior will not be tolerated. Racism, sexism, homophobia, and/or transphobia â€” whether overt, casual, or ignorance-based â€” will be called in by moderators, and will not be tolerated.

Please DO report hurtful or harmful behavior (which does not include interactions that trigger white fragility). In response to abuse reports, I will block outside users and problematic servers to help ensure that the Thinkydoers community is a safe and welcoming place without harassment or abuse.

Account registrations are monitored and accounts considered spam (including commercial advertising, political campaigning / propaganda, duplicate accounts or accounts impersonating others) will be moderated or removed.
No law-breaking. Iâ€™m still a lawyer, so please. Our laws matter. This server is moderated under U.S. law on a host located in Estonia. Donâ€™t make me read a statute, please.

thoughtbot.social.text: This is a company instance so keep it safe for work.
No attacking gender, orientation, disability, physical appearance, body size, race, or religion.

thoughtful.social.text: Please introduce yourself when you join us.

thx.gg.text: Don't be a bellend. Absolutely no hate speech whatsoever. If you can't debate someone on the quality of their ideas without resorting to abusing them then perhaps you need to find another conversation on your own level.
Discussions of generally sensitive topics; criminal/sexual acts etc should be posted under a CW. If you make a particularly long post, perhaps it is worth summarising it behind a CW.

ti22.pro.text: Respect and Kindness: Treat all users with respect. No harassment, bullying, or hate speech is tolerated. Be kind and courteous in your interactions.

No Discrimination: Discriminate against no one. Comments or posts that target individuals or groups based on race, gender, sexuality, religion, nationality, disability, or any other identity are strictly prohibited.
Content Warnings and NSFW: Use content warnings for sensitive topics like politics, violence, or explicit content. Mark any Not Safe For Work (NSFW) content appropriately.
Privacy and Consent: Do not share others' personal information without their explicit consent. This includes photos, contact information, and other private details.
No Illegal Content: Do not post or share illegal content. This includes pirated media, illegal activities, or content that violates any applicable laws.
Spam and Advertising: No advertising or spam. Promotional content should be limited and clearly marked.
Source Crediting: Credit artists, writers, and creators for their work. Do not claim others' work as your own.
Moderation and Reporting: Respect the decisions of moderators. Report any content or behavior that violates these rules.
Be Mindful of Bandwidth: Large files and excessive image posting can strain server resources. Be considerate about the size and frequency of your uploads.
Enjoy and Contribute Positively: Engage with the community positively. Help create a welcoming space for everyone.

tmi.community.text: We are a community of Educational Professionals.  All are welcome!  However, our focus is #education, #teaching, #assessment and all manner of #learning based in the educational system of the United States.  This is important context for discussion, debate, and interaction.
Be considerate of others. You don't have to agree, but you do need to treat one another with fairness and kindness.
There will be more rules. Make a suggestion.

toad.social.text: Be decent: no harassment, bullying, or threats.

todon.eu.text: We do not accept racism (in all its forms, incl. hate against Muslims, antisemitism, apartheid and casteism - see our Terms of Service for our complete definition).
We do not accept hate against lesbians, gays, bisexuals, pansexuals,  transgenders, non-binary people, intersexual people, queer people in general, etc.
Sexism, misogyny and hate against black women (misogynoir).
We do not accept ableism (incl. COVID-19 denial/downplaying and anti-vax) and body-shaming.
We do not accept harassment and trolling.
We also do not accept other forms of hate speech.
We do not accept (sexual) abuse of minors, adults and animals (also not virtual).
We do not accept glorification of violence, calls for murder, death threats, terrorism and militarism.

We do not accept (neo)colonialism (incl. Zionism), imperialism in all forms and nationalism (above all nationalism of nation states,  incl. flags/symbols of those on Todon.*, see our Terms of Service).
We do not accept fascism, right-wing populism, and right-wing and religious extremism.
We do not accept evangelisation and other forms of religious propaganda [local only], and extreme sects and cults.
We do not accept Marxist-Leninists (Stalinists, Maoists, etc) or other followers of extreme authoritarian (so called) communist/socialist ideologies/regimes (aka tankies).
We do not accept capitalists, including so called 'anarcho-capitalists' (aka ancaps) and neoliberals.
We do not accept anthropogenic climate change denial, downplaying the climate crisis, greenwashing and deceptive climate solutions (like nuclear energy).
We do not accept (right-wing) conspiracy 'theories', hoaxes, fake news and other forms of disinformation.
Another rule in our terms of service at wiki.todon.eu/todon/terms_en. Explain in the final step (reports only).

tonybark.com.text: Avoid posting prejudiced or discriminatory content, including hateful jokes or language. You can use foul language as long as it isn't directed at anyone or any group.
Engaging in stalking, harassment, or antagonizing behavior towards others is not allowed.
Adult, graphic, or sensitive content must be accompanied by a content warning (CW). Similarly, controversial subjects or political discussions should also be placed under a CW.
Posting misleading or deceptive content, such as disinformation or impersonation, is against the rules.
Bot accounts must be clearly labeled and unlisted.
Avatar and header images must comply with all of these rules.
It is prohibited to post anything that violates this site's Code of Conduct, as well as US or France law.

These rules apply to both the local instance and any federated instances. Individuals from other instances who violate these rules will be reported to their instance. Proxy instances or those with lenient or no rules will be suspended and reported.

toot.beer.text: No hate speech or discrimination of any kind will be tolerated.
Do not post content that is illegal or promotes illegal activities.
Do not post content that is pornographic or sexually explicit.
Do not post content that is violent or graphic.
Do not post personal information of others without their consent.
Do not engage in harassment or bullying of any kind.

Do not spam or post irrelevant content.

toot.bike.text: Be kind and respect each other.
Contact no one that explicitly stated they do not want to be contacted. Don't stalk, don't doxx.
We do not tolerate Nazi propaganda. We've read Karl Popper.
No porn. Occasional nudity (breastfeeding or naked butts at cold lakes for example) is OK though.
No spam. If you are unsure whether the real life impressions from your bike shop are OK or are considered spam, contact the admin team.
This instance has no room for racist, sexist, antisemitic, homophobic, transphobic, ableist, saneist content.
Obey the law. When you post content here, always mind: German law applies, EU law applies and the law from the country you are posting.
Please use CN, CW and NSFW where it applies (injuries, death, violence, things that might trigger people), but do not overuse it.
Do not stay on topic. Have a good time!

toot.berlin.text: Participate in an authentic and active way. In doing so, you contribute to the health and longevity of this community.
Exercise consideration and respect in your speech and actions.
Refrain from demeaning, discriminatory, or harassing behavior and speech.

Be mindful of your surroundings and of your fellow participants. Alert community leaders if you notice a dangerous situation, someone in distress, or violations of this Code of Conduct, even if they seem inconsequential.

toot.dummy.cafe.text: We reserve the right to take moderation actions on you for any reason including those not stated in these rules.
Treat everyone with respect. Absolutely no harassment, witch hunting, sexism, racism, homophobia, transphobia, ableism, or hate speech will be tolerated.
No incitement of violence or promotion of violent ideologies.
No explicit (NSFW) content without content warnings and/or sensitive media markers. Explicit content must not be used in user avatars or header images.
No misinformation regarding public health issues or political/military campaigns.
Anything illegal in Germany, Spain, Belgium, and/or the European Union is prohibited.
If you see something against the rules or something that makes you feel unsafe, don't hesitate to let staff know! We want this server to be a welcoming place.
No bots. Following bots from other instances is fine, but please don't host bots on this instance.
English should be your primary language. You can speak other languages, but please primarily speak in English.
NSFW bots [from other instances] will be suspended. (NSFW from real users is allowed)

toot.earth.text: Content must not contain violence, exclusionary language or insults.

You are beautiful, and everyone else here is beautiful, too.

toot.io.text: First think then post - preferred in English.

toot.kotocoop.org.text: Respect other peopleâ€™s physical and mental space.
Treat others the way you would like to be treated.
Do not make assumptions based on appearance or action. Be respectful towards all.
Donâ€™t make assumptions about anyoneâ€™s sexuality, gender, nationality, ethnicity, religion, values, socio-economic background, health, or able-bodiedness
Donâ€™t humiliate or embarrass others. Refrain from gossiping and judging othersâ€™ appearance.
Do not repeat in your speech, actions or behavior any stereotypes based on another personâ€™s qualities or characteristics.
Give room - make sure everyone has the opportunity to participate in the conversation. Also respect the privacy of others and treat sensitive topics with respect.

You can give appropriate and constructive feedback on inappropriate behavior. Listen to any feedback given to you. Try to be open about the feedback you receive and take it into account in the future. Apologize if you have hurt someone.
If you notice anyone else acting inappropriately or in any other way acting against Koto Co-op principles, intervene in the situation.

This is a private instance.

We are not open to users. This is a private instance and the only moderation is my own self-moderation.

toot.lugbz.social.text: Respect others. Your opinion matters, but please express it respectfully without insulting anyone.
Discrimination is unacceptable. We prohibit racist, sexist, misogynistic, homophobic, antisemitic, and other inhumane posts.
Follow the laws, even on the internet. Avoid any illegal activities.
Protect your privacy. Think carefully about what information you share online if you don't want it to become public.
If you wish to share NSFW content, consider using a dedicated account on another platform.
Harassment is not acceptable. Respect others' wishes not to be contacted and avoid harassing behaviors like brigading or dogpiling.
Hate propaganda, Nazi symbolism, and the promotion of National Socialism are strictly prohibited.
Content that is illegal in Europe will be removed and may result in the suspension of your account.
Be kind and respectful. Irony and sarcasm can be difficult to discern in text, potentially leading to misunderstandings.
Automated posts should be marked as "Unlisted" to avoid overwhelming the local timeline. Non-interactive cross-posting accounts may be removed.
Conspiracy theories that support or promote the above-mentioned behaviors are not allowed.
Respect intellectual property. Do not share copyrighted materials without permission or proper attribution.
Avoid spam. Repeatedly posting the same message or sending unsolicited messages can be considered disruptive.
Stay on topic. In some communities, it's important that discussions align with the main theme or the interests of the group.
Mind netiquette. Politeness and good manners are also crucial online.
Respect platform rules. In addition to community-specific guidelines, adhere to the general usage policies and rules of the platform in use.
Treat others as you would like to be treated â€“ with respect and kindness.

toot.poedelwitz.de.text: During registration you have to pick a username. This username can't be changed later, so make sure it is the right one. If you are in doubt if your username is suitable, read our rules below first.
After you sign up, you have to verify your email address. Check your spam folder if you didn't receive a verification email.
We have to adhere to German and European law. Leading for us however is the Universal Declaration of Human Rights.
You are personally fully responsible and accountable for what you publish on toot.poedelwitz.de. Without any exception, whether you use a pseudonym/alias or not.
In other words: we from toot.poedelwitz.de, and the Mastodon Project in general are completely not responsible and accountable for what you publish, in any form whatsoever.

We do not accept (among other things): racism (in all its forms, incl. e.g. islamophobia, antisemitism, apartheid and casteism], homophobia, biphobia and such, transphobia, nbphobia and such, sexism and misogyny, fat-shaming, ableism and other forms of discrimination not mentioned here.
We do not accept trolling, hate speech, (sexual) abuse of minors, adults and animals (also not virtual).

We do not accept glorification of violence, calls for murder, death threats and terrorism, militarism, nationalism (We don't accept any form of nationalism of nation states. Regional nationalism is allowed, only without feeling superior than, or discriminating against others.).

We do not accept colonialism and imperialism in all its forms (incl. zionism), right-wing populism, and right-wing and religious extremism, evangelisation and other forms of religious propaganda [local only],
extreme sects and cults.

We do not accept marxist-leninists, stalinists, maoists or other followers of extreme authoritarian (so called) communist/socialist ideologies/regimes (aka tankies), capitalists, including so called 'anarcho-capitalists' (ancaps).
We do not accept anthropogenic climate change denial, COVID-19 denial, anti-vaccination, (right-wing) conspiracy 'theories' and hoaxes.

We do not accept spam and other forms of advertisement. If you publish continuously a very high number of public toots (excl. replies) in a short time (e. g. more than 1 toot every minute over a longer period of time), we might consider that as spamming.
We always keep the right to limit or delete your account. We are fortunately very tolerant and therefore we will always think twice before we take these actions.
Please use the report tool if you think someone on this server or another server did not comply with our guidelines. Note that sometimes rules are only valid for local users.

We do not tolerate threatening behaviour, stalking, and doxxing.
We do not tolerate harassment, including brigading, dogpiling, or any other form of contact with a user who has stated that they do not wish to be contacted.
We do not tolerate mobbing, including name-calling, intentional misgendering or deadnaming.
We do not tolerate violent nationalist propaganda, Nazi symbolism or promoting the ideology of National Socialism.
We do not tolerate conspiracy narratives or other reactionary myths supporting or leading to the above mentioned (and/or similar) behavior.
Actions intended to damage this instance or its performance may lead to immediate account suspension.
Content that is illegal in Germany will be deleted and may lead to immediate account suspension.

toot.rhetro.de.text: Keine Nazis, Querdenker, Putinversteher oder sonstiges Gesindel

Keine Inhaltswarnungen.
Hier ist das Internet und kein weltweiter Safespace

toot.sh.text: No bots, unless they're cute, funny, or useful. Bots should avoid posting to the public timeline. If you're unsure, speak to a moderator.
Content that is borderline NSFW or could be construed as NSFW at a glance should be put behind a Content Warning (CW).
No sexism, racism, xenophobia, homophobia, transphobia, or other forms of hate speech.
No content that would otherwise be illegal in the UK or the EU.
No posting of other people's personally identifying information, otherwise known as "doxing".
No promoting of conspiracy theories (e.g. anti-vax, anti-mask, anti-COVID).
No scraping content from the web interface or API.
AI/ML generated content must be clearly labelled as such

Do not share intentionally false or misleading information
