toot.shoes.text: DO NOT post any kind of illegal content.
DO NOT post content of depictions of children or anything related to them.
DO NOT post content of necrophilia or death.
DO NOT use racism or hate speech.
DO NOT perpetuate sexism, homophobia, or transphobia.
DO NOT abuse unknown bugs or glitches.
DO NOT abuse other community members.
DO NOT post gore, injuries of ANY sort, fatalities, suicide, animal abuse or torture.

toot.snipesearch.co.uk.text: Illegal content may be reported to the police, so don't upload it.
No more than 10 Promotional Posts a day from an account, we want you to have a voice, but we also need to respectfully not flood the mastodon community with promos.
Be Respectful of the LGBTQ+ community.
Stereotypical Abuse towards minorities counts as hate speech.

toot.site.text: Hate speech and discrimination, such as, but not limited to, racism, xenophobia, homophobia, transphobia and abelism and content illegal in Europe is not allowed in any form.

Content warnings (CWs) are often either required or highly encouraged to keep our server safe and friendly for as many people as possible. CW-ing nudity, lewdness, politics, gore and spam-like posts are all mandatory. Failure to comply will result in account limiting.
Bios (account biographies) should be kept "safe for work". Highly distracting, lewd or otherwise obscene avatar or header images are not allowed.

Malicious or misleading information (such as, but not limited to, anti-science, fake news and hate brigading) are bannable offences. This also includes the encouragement and normalising of said information. Such content can, for example, include anti-vaccine and alternative medicine.
Extreme political content, such as Nazism, authoritarianism, "tankieism", and extreme nationalism is a bannable offence. An exception to this are news stories and meta around these topics.

Incitement of violence, regardless of the situation, is generally not allowed and appropriate content warnings is required as a minimum! We also realise that there is a difference between punching up vs. down, and that violence is sometimes unavoidable, such as protests.

Advertising is discouraged and is allowed at the discretion of moderators. Commissions related to the arts, charitable causes (that are demonstrably not for-profit) and personal donation requests are exempt. A general rule is that if you think that it would be annoying, put it behind a CW.
We do not allow any bots or automated services including crossposters from other social media sites. You can have a look at sites like "botsin.space" for that kind of stuff.
Doxing and non-consensual breaches of privacy is not allowed and breaking this rule will most likely result in a ban.

Posting uncaptioned media with public visibility is not allowed and will get your account limited, usually if repeated behaviour is observed. Tootsite is supposed to be an inclusive and accessible place. Only local posts are affected by this rule, not remote posts or boosts.

toot.si.text: No discriminatory behaviour and content promoting or advocating the oppression of members of marginalised groups.
No threatening behaviour, stalking, doxxing, mobbing, including name-calling, intentional misgendering or deadnaming.
No harassment, including brigading, dogpiling, or any other form of contact with a user who has stated that they do not wish to be contacted.
No conspiracy narratives, nationalist propaganda, reactionary myths, Nazi symbolism or promoting the ideology of National Socialism.
Do not publish private conversations, except to the moderation team if you need to report them.
No corporate accounts, no excessive advertising, no bots, or automated crossposters from other networks.
Use content warnings (CW) for sexually explicit or violent media and other content that might be common triggers.
No illegal content. Abide by laws.
You agree to our complete Code of Conduct (toot.si/about)

toot.the-cloud.io.text: Illegal content such as child pornography, unsurprisingly, is not permitted.
Mark sensitive content with a content warning.
Spam is not permitted, this includes creating spam accounts that only serve to provide profile links or advertise products and services.

Hate speech and abusive or threatening behavior is not permitted, specifically that which directed at any gender, nationality, religion, race, age, pizza topping preference, or sexual identity. One can hate on systemd all day long here.
Lack of a specific rule against a certain behavior does not indicate acceptance of that behavior. Each of us has a limited amount of time in this world. Don't be a jerk.
Violating one or more of these rules may result in an immediate, permanent ban without notice or warning.
You may not impersonate a person or brand without a clear indication the account is unofficial and/or a parody. Parody accounts are permitted, as are legitimate brand accounts.
No doxing (aka doxxing) or disclosing personal information without consent and as a means of harassing or causing others to harass another person.
No harassment in the form of continued engagement after a person has requested contact to stop.

tooter.sftn.eu.text: You may not threaten violence against an individual or a group of people. The glorification of violence is also prohibited.

You may not threaten or promote terrorism or violent extremism. 
We define as violent extremism the act of targeting civilians with violence and/or the promotion of violence as a means to further a cause.

We have zero tolerance towards any material that features or promotes child sexual exploitation.
This may include media, text, illustrated, or computer-generated images. You may also not contribute to victimization of children through the promotion or glorification of child sexual exploitation.

You may not engage in the targeted harassment of someone, or incite other people to do so.
We prohibit behavior that harasses or intimidates, or is otherwise intended to shame or degrade others.

You may not promote violence against or directly attack or threaten other people on the basis of race, ethnicity, national origin, caste, sexual orientation, gender, gender identity, religious affiliation, age, disability, or serious disease.

You may not promote or encourage suicide or self-harm.
However, sharing personal experiences, coping mechanisms, resources, research and education for suicide prevention will be allowed.

Media that depicts graphic violence or consensually produced adult content may be shared within your posts, provided that you mark this media with an adequate [CW] Content Warning. However, depictions of sexual violence, gratuitous gore, and hateful imagery will always be forbidden.

You may not use this service for any unlawful purpose or to promote illegal activities. This includes selling, buying, or facilitating transactions in illegal goods or services, as well as certain types of regulated goods or services.

You may not publish or post other people's private information without their express authorization and permission, nor threaten to do so. The same rule applies for images and videos, but with exceptions for those that are intended to further public discourse on issues or events of public interest.

You may not post or share explicit images or videos that were taken, appear to have been taken or that were shared without the consent of the people involved. To reitarate, intimate photos or videos of someone that were produced or distributed without their consent are forbidden.

You may not attempt to make content appear more popular or active than it is, coordinate activities to artificially influence conversations, post commercially-motivated spam, artificially amplify or suppress information, or, in general, manipulate or disrupt people's experience.

You may not post or share content that may supress participation in, or disrupt civic processes, including through the distribution of false or misleading information about the procedures or circumstances around participation in a civic process.

You may not use false profile information to represent yourself as a person or entity that is not associated with you to mislead, confuse, or deceive others, nor use a fake identity in a manner that disrupts the experience of other users.

You may not share synthetic, manipulated, or out-of-context media that is significantly and deceptively altered, manipulated, fabricated, shared in a deceptive manner or with false context if it is likely to result in widespread confusion or harm public safety. Non-confusing satire is allowed.

You may not use anotherâ€™s trademark in a way that may mislead or confuse people about your affiliation with it. You may however use a trademark in a way that is outside the scope of the trademark registration or in a nominative or other fair use manner.

tooting.cc.text: Posting of violent, or promotion of violence, is prohibited
Vet your sources before posting potential misinformation

tooters.org.text: No racism or ethnic hatred.
No sexism.
No xenophobia.
No transphobia / transmisia.
No homophobia / queermisia.
No intentional misgendering.
No antisemitism, Nazism, et Al.
No harassment, which includes but is not limited to: hate speech, trolling, doxxing, sealioning, stalking, dogpiling, gaslighting, and block evading.
No incitement of violence, linking to sources that do, or promoting any such related ideology.
No distribution of disinformation, campaigns designed to do so, or otherwise intentionally misleading information.

No paraphilia content; text, media, or links to any related material. This category includes but is not limited to CSAM/CSEM, incest, lolicon/shotacon, zoophilia, AI generated images, grooming, and pro-shipping/pro-pedophilic stances.
No uploading, or linking to media sources which violate the DMCA.

No impersonation of other individuals, public figures, or organizations unless clearly labeled in the bio. Parody accounts of other people on the fediverse are not allowed because it has the potential to lead to harassment.
Profile avatars, and header images may not be sexually explicit, depict violence, or contain any such imagery. This applies to images where your chest is exposed regardless of your gender identity.
Sexually explicit material must have a content warning applied to mark it as sensitive, and the hashtag #NSFW so that others can mute it.

No spam, marketing, advertising, or company landing pages. This does not apply to individuals who are seeking to share their own creations, but your account shouldnâ€™t simply serve as a marketing channel.
No nationalist or religious extremism.
No sending of non-consensual/unsolicited nude/sexually suggestive images, videos, or text. Otherwise known as NCSEI.
No unsolicited @ mentions or DMs promoting cryptocurrencies, NFTs, altcoins, or similar blockchain related projects.
Fundraising campaigns, and financial support related posts must have a related hashtag appended so that people can mute the topic.

tooter.wishy.co.uk.text: This is a single user server. Therefore the admin asserts that they will not do anything that they disagree with

toots.258990001.xyz.text:
Keeping it simple, please follow the "Contributor Covenant" as may be updated from time to time at:
https://github.com/mastodon/mastodon/blob/main/CODE_OF_CONDUCT.md
If members have a concern about these basic rules of respect they may propose a new set of rules or additional rules... However,  we do not want 'more' rules if it can be avoided.

tootr.co.text: No homophobia, transphobia, racism, sexism or other uncool behaviour.  Treat others as you would want to be treated.
Nothing obviously illegal, or which isn't being shared with the consent of all those included or involved.
No spam, including regularly posting to paid or unpaid external sites that are not related to the conversations you may be part of.

toots.cc.text: This is not a public server, you can't have an account here.

tokonatsu.social.text: Be nice and respectful to everyone. Remember, this server is by extension part of Tokonatsu, so remember how you like to be treated and treat those in the same way!
Don't post anything illegal, it will likely get you into trouble as well.
No racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, ableism or other hateful conduct. Please report anything as soon as you can.
Use Content Warnings for anything that would be bad for young people to see. We are an all-ages event, so we need to make sure we are a safe space too.

toots.deds.nl.text: De server staat in Nederland en dus is de Nederlandse wetgeving van toepassing.
Deze dienstverlening dient de doelen van de vereniging Open Domein, zoals geformuleerd in de statuten.
Als gebruiker heeft u een @DeDS.nl-adres, daarmee krijgt u een account en communiceert u met de server en de beheerder.
Als gebruiker schendt u de privacy van anderen niet.
Als gebruiker begint u geen ad hominems en reageert u niet op ad hominems (persoonlijke aanvallen).
Als gebruiker bedrijft u geen commercie, zoals iets verkopen of daartoe oproepen.
Deze dienst wordt aangeboden door Portagio, sponsor van de vereniging Open Domein. Open Domein heeft projecten zoals DeDS en Petities.nl.

toots.cordelya.net.text: This is a single-user instance. These rules are posted simply to aid the admins of other federated instances in choosing whether or not to block this instance.

No hate. 

Users may not post content with the following attributes: hate, racism, sexism, xenophobia, homophobia, transphobia, fascism, nationalist socialism, or content illegal in the United States.
Minimal Advertising. Advertising is kept to a minimum and is generally restricted to self-promotion and occasional promotion of activities sponsored by US 501(3)(c) non-profit organizations.
Nudity or gore in images must be tagged with a CW to allow other users across the Fediverse to choose whether to view them.
Users must comply with the TOS posted at https://masto.host/tos/. This instance is hosted by masto.host.

toots.im.text: No racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, xenophobia, or casteism
No incitement of violence or promotion of violent ideologies
Do not share intentionally false or misleading information

toots.hd0.eu.text: Whatever goes upon two legs is an enemy.
Whatever goes upon four legs, or has wings, is a friend.
No animal shall sleep in a bed.
No animal shall kill any other animal.

toots.nu.text: No "hate speech", speech that expresses a form of prejudice or threatens people of protected characteristics (such as age, disability, ethnicity, gender, pregnancy, religion, sex or sexuality).
No Calls to violence. Any individual promoting violence towards any person or group.
No harassment. If a user explicitly asks you to disengage, you should.
Nudity involving the genitals, sexual acts, or pornography is not allowed.
No content illegal in Sweden. The server is here, we will abide by Swedish law.
All bots must respect the #nobot tag and must post unlisted.
Posts intended for commercial advertisement purposes must be posted with the #ad tag or unlisted.
Spam is not permitted, this includes creating spam accounts that only serve to provide profile links or advertise products and services.

You may not impersonate a person or brand without a clear indication the account is unofficial and/or a parody. Parody accounts are permitted, as are legitimate brand accounts. Especially if youâ€™re funny.
No attacks against (or from) the instance. You may not do anything which may impact confidentiality, integrity or availability of this server, the users of the service or their data

User accounts whose only activity consisted of registration, but did not post anything or follow anybody or interact with the fediverse in any other way might be deleted after a short period of time. This is in order to prevent bot activity.

toots.tylerdavis.xyz.text:
The owner is VERY Christian and VERY opinionated
Just warning you
If you can't take the heat, get out of the kitchen

toots.tangoit.net.text: No privacy violations against other people; doxing, revealing or sexual images of someone else, information about someone's health, or crimes done against them.
No xenophobia, hate speech or incitement to such things.
NSFW content must be marked as sensitive.
No incitements to break any of the server rules, and/or incite to break HKSAR law.
No spread of violent images, sexual violence, torture, or forced actions.

topofthe.city.text: No racism, sexism, transphobia, ableism, body-shaming, nazis or nazi-adjacent shit.
CW images of food, eye contact, bugs and insects, and NSFW content.
Describe posted images as a default.
Be gracious and open to other perspectives.
This is a single-user instance, so this is mostly a list of reminders to myself and what to tell other admins to expect.

topspicy.social.text: Discrimination & Bigotry Wonâ€™t Be Tolerated. We're not interested in Nazis, TERFS, or hate speech.
Respect Other Users. This instance is meant to be a friendly, welcoming space to all who are willing to reciprocate in helping to create that environment.
Consent is Important in all contexts. If youâ€™re ever unsure, ask first. Use content warnings (CWs) where required.
Use the Report Feature. Our moderators are here to listen and respond to reports.
No untagged nudity, pornography or sexually explicit content, including artistic depictions. Content warn that.
No gore or extremely graphic violence.

torguard.social.text: Mark any sexually explicit or violent media as sensitive when posting.
No tolerance for racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, xenophobia, or casteism.
Incitement of violence or promotion of violent ideologies is strictly prohibited.
Harassment, dogpiling, or doxxing of other users is not acceptable.
Sharing intentionally false or misleading information is forbidden.
Respect all users and engage in constructive discourse.
Violations of these rules may result in account suspension or removal.

tosk.in.text: Be nice, don't do stupid shit.

totallynormalis.land.text: Donâ€™t post anything illegal in the UK or wherever you live
No discrimination or hate speech. Be nice or at least not totally offensive.
No TERFs, GCs, racists, homophobes, transphobes, xenophobes, nazis or fascists

No racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, xenophobia, or casteism
No incitement of violence or promotion of violent ideologies

trans.house.text:
No intolerance of any kind.
Meaning to transphobia (obviously), homophobia, aphobia, sexism, racism, ableism, or any other form of bigotry. This includes transmedicalism. This does not include discussion of intolerance.

Do not share illegal content.
I don't want to have to pay legal fees :)
Spoiler any NSFW content. People should feel comfortable browsing this instance in public.
No gatekeeping or otherwise policing other's identity.
Sexual harassment and non-consensual sexualization is strictly forbidden. This instance does not welcome chasers. Consensual sexualization is perfectly fine, but do not sexually harass our members.
Impersonation is not allowed. Any parody accounts must be clearly marked as such in display name to prevent misinformation.

transforthe.win.text: All forms of bigotry, including racism, sexism, homophobia and transphobia are strictly prohibited and actively moderated.
No explicit (NSFW) content without content warnings and/or sensitive media markers. Explicit content must not be used in user avatars or header images.
No harassment of other users on this or other servers.
No content illegal in the following countries: United States
No incitement of violence or promotion of violent ideologies.
No disinformation regarding public health issues or political/military campaigns.
No spam. This includes commercial advertising, promotional campaigns, and SEO.

transfur.social.text: Be an example, not an exception.
Be aware of the audience. Tag your posts appropriately.
This is not a court. You are not a lawyer.
This is not a Nazi Bar.

transmom.love.text:
No liberalism.

No libertarians, no neolibs, no apologia of capitalism or free markets.

No racism.

No white fragility or tone policing either.
CWs go for text too, not just images.

Caption all images and media.

If it's exhausting a very brief caption (ex: "photo of me smiling") is ok.

CW content not for screenreaders.

Things like emoji spam, custom emoji fonts, Unicode fake typography. Screenreaders get unpleasant reading those aloud.

CW non-vegan stuff.

All forms of animal abuse including food and end products (leather etc.) have to be behind a CW.

Defederation is good.

No free speech discourse / fash enabling allowed.

transportation.social.text: Please don't post anything that's illegal in the US.
No racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, xenophobia, or any other form of discrimination. Doing this will get you banned immediately and without recourse.

No NSFW content is allowed. Your profile (avatar, header, display name, etc.) must be SFW. Off-topic and random discussion is allowed, but please keep discourse professional and courteous at all times.
Don't abuse the instance. Transportation.social is a "pro bono" service hosted and maintained by a very small consulting firm. Don't use it to abuse federated instances, don't try to break things.

Be considerate. Keep in mind that any public post you make will appear in our public timeline and the public timelines of other instances federated with transportation.social. Use content warnings where appropriate.

Organizational/corporate accounts are allowed, and individuals are free to share news about studies, projects, or new products you feel might be of interest to the transportation community, but spam will not be tolerated.

tranvender.site.text: Posting, boosting or linking to any content that is illegal in the United States (the server host country) is prohibited.
Discrimination of any kind is prohibited â€“ this includes but is not limited to racism, xenophobia, sexism, homophobia, transphobia/enbyphobia, etc.
Stalking and harassment is forbidden. If someone doesnâ€™t want to have anything to do with you, leave them alone.
Do not impersonate someone, unless for parody purposes and is clearly marked as such.
Content that you do not have permission to post is prohibited. Do not steal other's artwork.
Spam and / or bots are prohibited on this instance. If you wish to setup a bot, please use a bot-based instance such as botsin.space.

traumatised.monster.text: You must be 18+ to join this server.
Do not engage with minors. At all. Not on this account. Make a SFW account elsewhere for that.
No actual MAPs (pedophiles) or zoophiles, obviously.

All sexual content must have an appropriate CW. ('hard kinks' is more useful than merely 'sexual', where applicable, and a list of actual kinks involved can be even better, although there are times when even that is too much - I trust you to use your own discretion based on your followers)
No racism, transphobia, ableism, sexism, fatphobia, etc that's directed at anyone who has not explicitly consented to this. If engaging in any of this for kink reasons please put under a CW.
Please do not flirt with and/or sexually compliment people who have not explicitly consented to this. (If you welcome this from everyone it's good practice to say so in your profile)

Alt text is appreciated when you can manage it, however if you don't feel up to it you may use the #Alt4Me hashtag to request others to write it for you. There's no shame in outsourcing accessibility, it is in fact sometimes necessary when dealing with conflicting access needs.
Please don't harass people to add alt text. Either write it for them or move on.
Do not post stolen content, especially porn. Credit creators!

trg.social.text: No explicit (NSFW) content without content warnings and/or sensitive media markers. Explicit content must not be used in user avatars or header images.
No incitement of violence or promotion of violent ideologies
No harassment, dogpiling or doxxing of other users on this or other servers
No content illegal in The US
No spam. This includes commercial advertising, promotional campaigns, and SEO.
Do not share intentionally false or misleading information including (but not limited to) public health issues or political/military campaigns
No impersonation of other individuals, public figures or organisations, unless clearly marked as a parody.

Currently limited to TRG Content Creators -- We will not be accepting viewers at this time. See https://joinmastodon.org/servers for a list of servers you might want to join instead. (you can follow those on this server from another server)

trekkies.social.text: Donâ€™t be a dick! I think this is self explanatory - even if you disagree with someone still treat them with respect!
All Trek is valid! You might not like a certain Trek show or movie - which is fine... just don't hassle someone else because they like it.

1. This server is about inclus...
This server is about inclusivity! Everyone should feel welcome, if you don't or feel like someone isn't abiding by this rule contact an admin.

tribe.net.text:
Be kind. 
By that, I mean don't upload a ton of stuff here because disk space is limited and costs $$. If you want to use Mastodon as an archive of your big photos and videos, then you should run your own server. It's easy and I can walk you through it.
If you want to show off your products or services, you may post an ad once per month. If you are reported for posting more than that, you will get a warning, and then suspension.
If you send unsolicited direct messages to users, and you are reported by anyone, you will get a warning and set to limited visibility. The second report will result in your suspension.
Accounts that display ads in their profile photo and description will be set to limited visibility, meaning only your followers will see your posts.

Also, just be nice in general. I'm doing my best but I don't know everything about Mastodon. The community is a better resource for answering questions, especially if things don't seem to work for you the way you'd like. Remember, this is a free service.

triangletoot.party.text: Put NSFW content behind a content warning.
Do not spam the server with advertisements or blog spam.
No prohibited content. See: https://triangletoot.party/about/more for a complete list.

tripleeyegames.social.text: No discriminatory behavior (racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, etc)
Err on the side of collaboration; do not disparage others in our industry
Uphold the law (of your country and the EU)

troublemaker.social.text: Treat others as you would want them to treat you.
Do not post pornography, illegal, illicit, or unlicensed content.
Do not use slurs or discriminatory or hateful jokes and language, including (but not limited to) racism, sexism, homophobia, and transphobia; including tone policing or critiquing lived experience.
Do not post spam. For example, a post with only a link or an image.
Do not harass anyone, post other peopleâ€™s personally identifying information (â€œdoxingâ€), or incite violence against anyone.
Do not post in bad faith, engage in name-calling, or ad hominem attacks. Criticize ideas, not people.
Do not promote crypto-related content such as cryptocurrencies or NFTs.
Use content warnings (CW) and #hashtags liberally. Be nice and have fun!

turath.tn.text: 1. Use real names; we need to identify each other in the real world.

tulpa.social.text: Trying to exploit a loophole will be treated as actually breaking the rules. We don't want legalese cluttering up the rules, and that means we can't cover every possible loophole.
It is your responsibility to know the rules. Not knowing the rules is no excuse for breaking them.

All rules are judged on a case-by-case basis. If the rule infraction is minor, it will be punished less severely than a major infraction. This ALSO includes judging based on what the person being complained about says.
No illegal content as defined in the USA. Discussion of illegal drugs in relation to tulpas is allowed, but advertising or advising the use of drugs is not allowed.
No posting of sexually explicit or gory material.  Mark any adult conversations as NSFW.
No discriminatory comments (racism, homophobia, transphobia, sexism, religious discrimination, etc.).
No harassment of other members. Harassment is continuing potentially harmful behavior toward a member after the member has asked you to stop.
No spamming. Spamming is posting repeated unnecessary, unconstructive, meaningless messages. Trolling falls under spam.
Do not intentionally give out bad advice. If the advice is controversial, give solid reasoning for your advice.
If you want to complain about what a moderator is doing, email me at admin@tulpa.info
Please try to talk in English as this is an English community. Random non-English comments might be okay depending on the context, but we can't moderate in other languages easily.
Do not use inappropriate avatars or usernames. This includes anything sexual, offensive, or containing hate speech.

tulipgardenshow.masto.host.text: 1. Be respectful of everyone's opinion, even if you disagree.
2. Do not harass, insult, discriminate against, or otherwise intentionally harm others.
3. Do not deliberately spread misinformation or fake news.
4. Please provide descriptions of images you post.
5. Please avoid excessive swearwords or strong language. A swearword here or there is not a problem, but don't make it a regular occurance.
6. Do not post any sexual content publicly. Even privately, make sure the recipiant is ok with it and mark it with content warnings.
7. It is recommended to use content warnings when Politics, Religion, and other controversial topics are being discussed.
8. Please describe your media content, such as images, videos and so on,  to the best of your ability.
9. Do not post any copyright material unless you are the copyright holder or have written permition to do so.

tum.social.text: We do not tolerate discriminatory behavior and content promoting or advocating the oppression of members of marginalized groups.
We do not tolerate threatening behavior, stalking, and doxxing.
We do not tolerate harassment, including brigadier, dogpiling, or any other form of contact with a user who has stated that they do not wish to be contacted.
We do not tolerate mobbing, including name-calling, intentional misgendering or deadnaming.
We do not tolerate violent nationalist propaganda, Nazi symbolism or promoting the ideology of National Socialism.
We do not tolerate conspiracy narratives or other reactionary myths supporting or leading to the above-mentioned (and/or similar) behavior.
Actions intended to damage this instance or its performance may lead to immediate account suspension.
Content that is illegal in Germany will be deleted and may lead to immediate account suspension.
We (@adrian, @dorian and @tom) are maintaining this instance on our spare time, hardware and nerves. Don't push either of those.

turingfesten.dk.text: No racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, xenophobia, or casteism.

turtleisland.social.text: It is critical for new accounts to read the entire 'About' page (https://turtleisland.social/about) including the Rules sub-section BEFORE applying for an account at TurtleIsland.social.

We can't stress this enough - Absolutely no racism, anti-semitism, islamophobia, pro-genocide, pro-ethnic cleansing, pro-terrorism, sexism, homophobia, and transphobia. 95%+ of our issues fall in this category; we take this seriously.

If you are Native/Indigenous, when the 'Create Account' screen asks 'Why do you want to join?' please list your Native/Indigenous Nation/Tribe. That is all we need. Anything else or less specific may not get approved.
If you are non-Native/Indigenous, please join Allies.social instead.
Be sure to check your spam folder for confirming emails. Thanks for giving TurtleIsland.social a spin!

tusky.town.text: No discrimination, including (but not limited to) racism, sexism, homophobia or transphobia. This includes the usage of slurs of any kind.

tweesecake.social.text:
Be Decent

Do not harass, insult, discriminate against, or otherwise intentionally harm other users of any kind, local or federated. Do not deliberately spread misinformation, including pseudoscience and conspiracy theories.

Be Sentient
Avoid creating advertising or bot accounts on this instance without permission. There may be exceptions, but it is best to consult with either of the administrators before going ahead.

Cross posting (using software to post the same content on multiple social media services) is only allowed if you regularly check your account here and interact with notifications. IMPORTANT: Please do not cross post twitter retweets or quoted tweets!

Be Lawful

Do not post or link to content that could get us hit with a violation of copyright. Only post personally identifiable information if you have explicit permission to do so.

Sexual Content

Please post any sexual content as Unlisted or stricter, and make sure to add an appropriate content warning. If you regularly find yourself wanting to post content of sexual nature, this may not be the best instance for you.

Be Mindful

Politics, Religion, and other controversial topics should be posted behind a content warning. Be mindful of people you interact with, as they may have had experiences drastically different from yours, including severe psychological or physical trauma.

Describe your content

Please try to describe your media posts to the best of your ability to accommodate disabilities such as blindness and deafness. If you cannot do so, there is nothing wrong with asking for help. Currently, tagging @ImageCaptionsPls@a.gup.pe is the best way to do so.

The password

When signing up, please include the following password in the why you'd like to join text. CakeOven. This ensures to us that you have indeed read and will agree to abide by the rules set forth in this instance!

twipped.social.text: Discrimination or advocation of racism, sexism, casteism, homophobia, transphobia, facism, xenophobia, or nationalism will not be tolerated. This includes propagation of bigot based lies.

twit.social.text: We are inclusive and welcoming to everyone of all ages, nations, races, genders, faiths, and creeds.
Please keep our space safe for all and family friendly. No spamming. No personal attacks. Your opinions are welcome, but we encourage thoughtful conversation over provocation.

I actively moderate and will immediately suspend without appeal and in my sole judgement any account that violates the rules. I also, from time to time, de-federate any servers whose users act as a group to harass or attack this server or our users.

Full rules at https://www.mozilla.org/en-US/about/governance/policies/social-content-policies/ Mozilla has done an excellent job of describing how a well run social network should be governed. I encourage you to read it.
By joining TWiT.social you agree to adhere to these rules. Thank you! --Leo

twoot.site.text: Hate speech and discrimination, such as, but not limited to, racism, xenophobia, homophobia, transphobia and abelism and content illegal in Europe is not allowed in any form.

Content warnings (CWs) are often either required or highly encouraged to keep our server safe and friendly for as many people as possible. CW-ing nudity, lewdness, politics, gore and spam-like posts are all mandatory. Failure to comply will result in account limiting.
Bios (account biographies) should be kept "safe for work". Highly distracting, lewd or otherwise obscene avatar or header images are not allowed.

Malicious or misleading information (such as, but not limited to, anti-science, fake news and hate brigading) are bannable offences. This also includes the encouragement and normalising of said information. Such content can, for example, include anti-vaccine and alternative medicine.
Extreme political content, such as Nazism, authoritarianism, "tankieism", and extreme nationalism is a bannable offence. An exception to this are news stories and meta around these topics.

Incitement of violence, regardless of the situation, is generally not allowed and appropriate content warnings is required as a minimum! We also realise that there is a difference between punching up vs. down, and that violence is sometimes unavoidable, such as protests.

Advertising is discouraged and is allowed at the discretion of moderators. Commissions related to the arts, charitable causes (that are demonstrably not for-profit) and personal donation requests are exempt. A general rule is that if you think that it would be annoying, put it behind a CW.
We do not allow any bots or automated services including crossposters from other social media sites. You can have a look at sites like "botsin.space" for that kind of stuff.
Doxing and non-consensual breaches of privacy is not allowed and breaking this rule will most likely result in a ban.

Posting uncaptioned media with public visibility is not allowed and will get your account limited, usually if repeated behaviour is observed. Twootsite is supposed to be an inclusive and accessible place. Only local posts are affected by this rule, not remote posts or boosts.

twoot.space.text: No racism, transmisia, sexism, ableism, ageism or homophobia.
Nudity is fine, but put it behind a CW please.
No apologia for bigotry or fascism, including incessant bad-faith questions and persistent patterns of micro-aggressive "helpful suggestions".

twothree.space.text: My server, my rules, I guess ğŸ¤“

types.pl.text: Racism, homophobia, antisemitism, transphobia, classism against the working class, ableism, exclusionary behavior, misogyny, genocide denial, harassment, Islamophobia, and other similar hate is not permitted. I will personally blast you into the sun.
Use content warnings for various topics, such as sexual content, mental health, food, and other touchy topics at your own discretion. If a content warning is required, the admins will let you know.
Don't advertise or spam. Asking for money is alright, but this is not a space to solely sell a product without somehow being tied to a user.
As a general rule of thumb, images should be captioned. If you are for whatever reason unable to caption an image, please add the content warning "uncaptioned image" or something akin.

Illegal content is not allowed. Despite the knowledge that some laws are unjust, types.pl does not endorse illegal action. This specifically lies under the jurisdiction of the United States, as that is where the servers are located.
If you are using a Twitter crossposter, you should be posting content on Mastodon as well. If the large majority of your posts are Twitter crossposts, you will be banned.

No cops, no feds. Members of law enforcement, federal security and intelligence, the military, etc. are not welcome. This is particularly relevant for such organizations in the United States, where the servers are located.
Administrators reserve the right to defederate with instances or boot users off the instance at their will for any reason.

u.miaomiao.li.text: I donâ€™t like hard-ads. Donâ€™t sell drugs, weapons, betting products and any other similar things.
NSFW is okay. I donâ€™t read them anyways but do mark them as sensitive.
This server is hosted in Hong Kong so try not to violate the local laws (but everyone knows it's bull shit anyways).
This server is available for registration and we shall generally accept them without any consideration. However, we reserve the rights to terminate your account based on the previous four rules.

typo3.social.text: Treat all community members in this server with respect.
Do not start, continue, or encourage personal attacks, flame wars, and trolling.Â
We do not tolerate members who intentionally share misleading or false information.
Do not use or share sexual imagery or language.
We do not tolerate harassment, personal attacks, or demeaning behavior.

typo.social.text: Please read and understand our terms of service: this includes a code of conduct.
This can be a home for type designers, typographers, letterers, fontworkers, calligraphers, tool builders, foundries, historians, scholars, students and enthusiasts.

Copyrights have deep and complex issues that do not all fit in this box. However, in general, please make sure you have permission to post the media you want include in your message. When practically possible, within reason, due diligence etc. Make sure all materials are properly credited.
Be kind. These are times of uncertainty and this instance is growing at unprecedented rates. So, please, be kind, and welcoming. Help others, when they ask questions.
Typo.social claims no copyright over media and text posted here.

Advertising: Typo.social is a discussion space, but we recognise that social media also functions as a commercial medium. We want our users to be able to advertise their products and services. Adds must be tagged using #advertisement. To further help users, discounts should also use #discount.

Advertorials: If you write posts or articles on behalf of a foundry or a distributor and only link to your customerâ€™s products, this is clearly an advertorial. Therefor we kindly ask you to use the hashtag #advertorial. If your toot links directly into the shop, please use #advertising.

ublog.tech.text: Behavioral Tenets: Use welcoming and inclusive language, be respectful of differing viewpoints and experiences, gracefully accept constructive criticism, focus on what is best for the community, show empathy towards other community members. Be kind to each other, and yourself.

Unacceptable behavior: Use of sexualized language or imagery, unsolicited romantic attention, trolling, derogatory comments, personal or political attacks, doxxing are strictly prohibited. Use conduct considered appropriate for a professional setting.
Postel's Law: be conservative in what you transmit, be liberal in what you receive from others.

uncontrollablegas.com.text: An account on this server is at the discretion of its owner and maintainer, Paul Lockaby. Your account may be suspended or deleted at any time for any reason. I mean, you probably won't be suspended or whatever unless you do something egregious, so try not to worry.

universeodon.com.text: You will not engage in any form of harassing, discriminatory, threatening, or offensive speech or behavior including but not limited to race, gender identity and expression, national origin, disability, marital status, age, sexual orientation, or other protected categories.

We strictly prohibit transphobic behavior, hateful speech, and any form of violence targeted towards transgender individuals. Our commitment is to create a platform where everyone feels welcome and respected.

urhub.co.text:
Respect and Inclusivity
All members of UrHub must show respect and kindness to others. Discrimination, harassment, or abuse of any kind is not tolerated. Our community thrives on its members' diverse backgrounds, experiences, and perspectives.

Constructive Dialogue
We encourage open-minded discussions and respectful disagreements. Personal attacks, name-calling, or any form of disrespect towards another user is unacceptable.

No Hate Speech or Harassment
Hate speech, threats, or harassment directed towards individuals or groups, based on factors such as race, religion, gender, age, nationality, or sexual orientation, is strictly prohibited.

Privacy Respect
Respect the privacy of others. Do not disclose someone's private information without their explicit permission.

Safe Content
Graphic, disturbing, or adult content must be correctly labeled and not used in a manner intended to harm or shock other users.

Respect Intellectual Property
Always give credit where it's due and refrain from sharing copyrighted content without permission.

Reporting Violations
If you witness or experience any violation of these rules, please report it immediately. We depend on our community members to help us maintain a safe and respectful environment.

Hate speech and abusive or threatening behavior is not permitted, none.

You may not impersonate a person or brand without a clear indication the account is unofficial and/or a parody. Parody accounts are permitted, as are legitimate brand accounts.
No incitements to break any of the server rules, and/or incite to break Swedish law.

vasra.masto.host.text: No abusive behavior towards Administrators, Race Officials, Coaches or other participants. Any behavior determined abusive by administrators will result in expulsion
In addition to race results information on the regatta or rowing information will be broadcast.

vis.social.text: NO RACISM, SEXISM, HOMOPHOBIA, TRANSPHOBIA OR XENOPHOBIA.

TOPIC: vis.social is a topical server focused particularly on SciArt, SciComm, Data, Visualization, Creative Coding and related topics. There is no reporting of â€œoff-topicâ€ posts, but the central idea of the server is to gather a community around these shared interests.
LANGUAGE: English is the common language of the instance. Other languages are welcome, but please be kind and post English translations so that we can all read your posts.

INCLUSION: We want everyone to feel welcome, safe, and respected. This is a free service. Please be welcoming and kind to everyone, especially when you have a difference of opinion. Then, be *extra* kind. :-)

HARASSMENT: If you experience or notice any harassment or other aggressive behaviors, report itâ€”by clicking on the three dots next to the message or profile and selecting â€œReport @personnameâ€) and help keeping this platform a safe space for everyone.

AI Images: Please do not use vis.social to share your creations from text-to-image tools such as MidJourney or Stable Diffusion. We welcome critical discussion of these tools, particularly about the legal and ethical issues surrounding these tools and the implications for artists and society

No NFTs: We know many people involved in computational art sell NFTs. However, on vis.social weâ€™ve made the decision that we donâ€™t want to be involved in NFTs. So weâ€™d love to see your art, but we ask that you donâ€™t post your NFTs here.
No bots. If youâ€™d like to experiment with bots, creating a dedicated instance could be an option for you.

CWs: the moderation team may ask you to add CW's to off-topic posts that contain photos or text about food, alcohol, and other topics, in an attempt to be a more inclusive and welcoming instance.  On our ToDo-list: writing about why we ask this.
CW on AI topics. Please add CW for posts about AI, especially tools like ChatGPT.

Joining Vis.Social: please tell us about your interest in this instance and it's topics. Tell us a little about you, your interests. Be sure to mention Green Apple candy in your application. Yes, it's a test to see if you've read the instance rules.

vtuber.house.text: Low drama: Don't fill our timelines with dunks, callouts, or mockery.
Embrace diversity: No slurs or attacks on people's identities. Respect names and pronouns.
Adults only: Register only if you are 18 or older.
Considerate content: No Pepe the Frog. Mark lewd/R18 images as sensitive. Use CW for spoilers and common triggers.
Adult topics, adult characters: No sexualized depictions of minors or child-like bodies.
Respect privacy: Don't reveal personal information about other people without their consent.
Grow calmly: No posts bragging about follower counts, begging for followers, or offering rewards in exchange for follows or boosts.
Ethical art: No promoting blockchains, NFTs, or cryptocurrencies. Give credit when sharing images, including clear mention if a picture is AI generated.
Ought to go without saying: Don't harass other users, attempt to disrupt service on this or other Fediverse servers, or use the server to engage in or coordinate illegal activity.

w3c.social.text: I agree to abide by the terms and spirit of the W3C Code of Ethics and Professional Conduct - https://www.w3.org/Consortium/cepc/

I agree to describe media that I post, because alt text helps everyone, *especially* but not only the visually impaired, by clarifying intended meaning, saying a bit about the poster's personality, or even providing metadata if the media does not load.
I agree to fill out my bio as soon as possible after joining this instance.
I agree to stay mainly on topic for this server which is around activities of the World Wide Web Consortium
I agree to tread lightly and dive only sparingly in sensitive content and potentially upsetting or triggering topics such as violence, graphic or adult content, politics, religion, food, etc.

If I can't uphold rule #5, I agree to hide behind a Content Wrapper (CW) sensitive content and potentially upsetting or triggering topics such as violence, graphic or adult content, politics, religion, food, eye contact, critters, or whether you use emacs or vi.
Please be kind :) Your interactions go to real people who deeply care and do their best. Please be curious, not critical.

wandering.shop.text: Code of Conduct. All members of the Wandering Shop agree to read and abide by our Code of Conduct. These rules summarize the Code of Conduct (CoC) for reporting purposes. If reporting something that violates the CoC in a way not listed in these rules, select this option.

Harassment, threats, or aggressive behaviour are not permitted. Inciting actions against others, including in retaliation, is not permitted. This includes but is not limited to encouraging self-harm or sharing personal information that could result in an individual being targeted.

Wandering Shop does not tolerate promotion of fascist, white supremacist, violent or hateful ideology or symbolism. This includes but is not limited to Holocaust denial, Nazi symbolism, and anti-trans, misogynistic, antisemitic and/or racist harassment; including in usernames, avatars, and profiles.

Wandering Shop does not permit the willful or persistent promotion of misinformation, disinformation, or conspiracy theories. This includes, but is not limited to, bigoted conspiracy theories and misinformation about elections and vaccines.

On public timelines, Wandering Shop does not permit graphic sexual, violent, or otherwise disturbing images without a content/media warning. Also not permitted: gratuitous advertising, spam, and cross-posting/automated posting of content that is irrelevant or disruptive.

Wandering Shop does not permit sustained disruption of conversation, including on the local timeline, in hashtags, or in replies. Only use tags that are relevant to your posts, and do not disrupt conversation with excessive tags or replies. If you are asked to leave someone alone, leave them alone.

washcan.social.text: Be Respectful: Treat others with kindness and respect. Refrain from engaging in any form of harassment, discrimination, or hate speech based on race, gender, religion, sexual orientation, disability, or any other characteristic.
No Spam: Do not engage in spammy behavior, including excessive posting of repetitive content, unsolicited promotions, or the use of automated bots for mass interactions.

Content Guidelines: Ensure that your posts comply with applicable laws. Do not share illegal or harmful content, including but not limited to explicit/illegal sexual material, violence, or anything that could be considered threatening or harmful.
Privacy and Consent: Respect the privacy of others. Do not share personal information without explicit consent. Be cautious about sharing private conversations without permission.
No Impersonation: Do not impersonate others, including public figures, or create fake accounts. Authenticity is crucial for fostering a trustworthy community.
Report Inappropriate Content: If you come across any content that violates these rules, report it to the moderators. Help us maintain a safe and positive environment.
Tolerance and Inclusivity: Embrace diversity and foster inclusivity whenever possible. Everyone is welcome, regardless of their background or beliefs. Avoid discriminatory language and behavior.
Use Content Warnings (CW): When posting potentially sensitive content, use appropriate content warnings (CW) to allow users to choose whether they want to view the content.

Community Cooperation: Work together to build a positive community. Share your thoughts and opinions respectfully, and engage in constructive conversations. Avoid personal attacks. We don't have to agree with everything, we should always try to respect the person behind the comments.

Compliance with Mastodon's Terms of Service: Adhere to Mastodon's overall terms of service. Violation of these rules may result in consequences, including warnings, temporary suspension, or permanent bans.

Moderator Decisions: Respect the decisions of the moderators. If a moderator takes action or provides guidance, follow it accordingly. If you disagree, reach out to them privately to discuss the matter.
Stay Informed: Familiarize yourself with these rules and any updates or changes. Ignorance of the rules is not an excuse for violating them.
Have Fun: Lastly, enjoy your time on washcan.social! Have fun, make friends, and contribute positively to the community.

warhammer.social.text: This is a community of hobbyists. Whilst this server is named for Warhammer, other content (hobby or non-hobby) is also welcome!
Treat everyone with respect. Absolutely no abuse, harassment, witch hunting, sexism, racism, or any other kind hate speech will be tolerated.
No age-restricted or obscene content. This includes text, images, or links featuring nudity, sex, hard violence, or other graphically disturbing content.
Controversial topics are allowed (e.g. politics or religion), but please be respectful of other peoples' views and remember to abide by rule 1.
No Impersonation. Catfishing, fake identities, personally-targeted parody accounts, etc, are not welcome on this server.
Please do not share copyrighted, pirated, or otherwise illegal material.

No Hate Speech. Hate speech is defined as derogatory posts or links targeting any individual or group based on race, mental or physical disability, religion, gender identity, sex, nationality, age, class or sexual orientation.

Bot accounts which mass-add users will be domain-blocked on this server. If you run a server, shut down these accounts to maintain the integrity and non-banned status of your server. These accounts can allow people to view private content via proxy through a network of the bot's followers.

wehavecookies.social.text: Live and let live: do not discriminate against anyone. Racist, sexist, misogynist, homophobic, anti-Semitic and other misanthropic posts are forbidden here!
Don't be an asshole. You have an opinion? That's fine, but please don't insult anyone with your comments.
Freedom of speech does not mean freedom from criticism. Just because you are allowed to express your opinion doesn't mean you can't get any opposition for it.
Adhere to laws. It's simple. The Internet is not a legal vacuum.
We do not tolerate harassment, including brigading, dogpiling or any other form of contact with a user who has indicated that they do not wish to be contacted.

Don't make fun of others and don't be condescending. You too want to be treated with respect. Note that irony, sarcasm, or similar expressions do not translate well into written language and tend to escalate discussions or misunderstandings.
We do not tolerate conspiracy theories
Content that is illegal in Germany will be deleted and may result in immediate account suspension. For example online casinos without a proper license will immediately be suspended.
NSFW content must be labeled as such using a content warning

Automated posts should be posted as "Unlisted" (i.e. they are visible but not in the local timeline). This also applies to bots, feed posters, Twitter "retweets" and Twitter crossposts. Crossposter accounts that do not actively participate may be removed by us.
You are not allowed to plainly advertise your company without providing a benefit for the viewer

welcometo.squelfland.com.text: The majority of the art posted by any accounts hosted on this server has been drawn by me, Marina Neira. If I feature artwork done by any other artist, it will always be with that artists' explicit permission and appropriate credits given.

This server does not post any NFT related content.
This server does not post, share or support AI-generated images.
This server will never host an account that harasses, trolls or bullies people.

wellduck.me.text:
Be kind. (Rewind?)

Be nice to people, and when you can't be nice, be firm but polite. Then move on. Block/mute if you gotta. 
Past that, use best judgement and/or pester your friendly neighborhood admin.

Not Up For Debate

Insofar as politics may come up, they should be CW'd appropriate and such posts are not to be taken as invitations to start a "debate." Period.

weyr.social.text: Be kind and treat others with respect

No discriminatory hate towards others allowed. Users on this instance found to be posting/involved in such hate speech or activities (included but not limited to neo-fascism, pro-nazi, sexism, racism, trans/homo/xeno-phobic) may be immediately banned from the instance.

whereismysupersuit.com.text: Be respectful. You do not need to agree with others but give them room to express themselves.
Open your mind. This is discourse and you need to listen to understand where someone is coming from.
Have fun (this is the most important rule)

No data may be collected for profit by a 3rd party without a contract .  If a company does so without consent they are agreeing to paying a fee of $1,000,000,000 US for the data collected and this will act as the contract.

whisper.tf.text: Since whisper.tf is more or less a one person instance without public registration there are no written server rules as of yet.

whitespashe.uk.text: No commercial accounts, advertising, or excessive promotion.

Don't fall into the Propaganda Trap: Most people are good! Instead of focusing on differences, focus on what you have in common. We may be different, but we ALL love food!
Breaking Bread: Try to connect and unity with others via our mutual love of food.

Help Your Community: We hope everyone who uses this platform will support each other and they will support their local communities. Strong communities, support strong families, that raise strong kids.

witchlounge.ca.text: No discriminatory behaviour and content promoting or advocating the oppression of members of marginalised groups.
No harassment, trolling, threatening behaviour, threats of violences, and violent language directed against another person.
No stalking, intimidation, and no posting or threatening to post other peopleâ€™s personally identifying information ("doxxing")
No unwelcome sexual attention; including but not limited to any sexualised comments or jokes, and unwelcomed sexual advances.
No sexual depictions and content involving anyone under 18 years of age.  Additionally, membership will not be granted to anyone under 18 years old.
No behaviour or actions intended to damage or disrupt this Mastodon instance or its performance.
No violent nationalist propaganda, Nazi symbolism or promoting the ideology of National Socialism.

wjlafrance.net.text: This is a private blog, so there are no public rules. I'll try not to say anything too objectionable.

wmd.social.text: Be affiliated with Wave Motion Digital/family

wkly.ws.text: No racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, xenophobia. Don't be an asshole.
No harassment, dogpiling or doxxing of other users.

wobbl.xyz.text: [General] Stay legal. Respect international laws, including the laws of the United States (where this server is hosted) and the laws of your own country.
[General] You have 48 hours to comply with or respond to a request from Wobbl.xyz staff before you run the risk of moderation action (post deletion, account strike, etc.).
[Behavior] Be respectful. Personal attacks, dogpiling, harassment, hate speech, racism, transphobia, etc. are prohibited. Do not post misinformation.
[Behavior] No screenshot dunking or unsubstantiated callouts. Do not post screenshots of other posts just to add negative commentary. Callout posts must include proof of their claims.
[Account] You must be 18 years of age or older to create an account on this server.
[Account] Ban evasion is prohibited. You may not create another account on this instance if your previous account was suspended.
[Account] Bot accounts are permitted within sane reason. They must be clearly marked as bots in the profile description.
[Account] Neither avatars nor headers may contain anything that would require a strong content warning (i.e. NSFW).

[Content] Regarding Content Warnings, we require CWs on public (non-follower only/mentioned only) posts that are clearly adult content. For other content, please use CWs as per the Content Warnings section of the About page.
[Content] No posting fully/primarily AI generated art. Using AI as a tool for your own art creation is allowed, however your own work should be transformative.
[Content] Adult content depicting characters who are or blatantly appear to be under 18 is strictly prohibited.
[Content] Adult content depicting non-sapient animals is strictly prohibited. Quadrupedal characters are allowed but they must be sentient.
[Content] When posting art that you did not create, credit the artist in the body of your post.

wolfbunny.lgbt.text: Will add content warnings for heavy topics (politics, tragedies, etc.)
Will not post or boost bigotry (transphobia, racism, ableism, etc.) or harass anyone for their orientation, religious views, identity, or any other similar vulnerable trait
If posting or boosting NSFW content, will only do so under a content warning
Instances or users posting nazi ideologies, cryptocurrencies, content scrapers, AI art farms, NFTs, or anything that violates this contract will be suspended

wolfhaus.me.text: Use common sense and don't ruin other people's shit.
No racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia or xenophobia
Nothing illegal and no incitement of violence or promotion of violent ideologies. That includes warez.
No harassment, dogpiling or doxxing of other users
Do not post racist, super edgy or other content that is meant to "trigger" people. Use common sense.
No Zoophile or NSFW Feral stuff
PLEASE put any NSFW content as sensitive content or put it behind a Content Warning to avoid defederation

wolvesare.sexy.text: Tag NSFW content as such with the Content Warning feature

wonderful.social.text: We are inclusive and welcoming to everyone of all ages, nations, races, genders, faiths, and creeds.
No spamming. No personal attacks. Opinions are encouraged, provocation and antagonism are not.
We actively moderate and will suspend without appeal accounts that violate our simple rules. We may also de-federate any servers whose users harass or attack our users.

woodworking.group.text: Sexually explicit or violent media must be marked as sensitive when posting
No racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, xenophobia, or casteism
No incitement of violence or promotion of violent ideologies
No harassment, dogpiling or doxxing of other users
Do not share intentionally false or misleading information

woofy.social.text: Open conversation is welcome (even if its dissenting); but see rule 1
This server is NSFW friendly, but please use content warnings for anything naked or sexual.

woof.tech.text: Don't break the law, respect international laws and the Dutch and Finnish law (where this instance is located).
Be respectful. Don't insult, don't harass. Behave.
Don't be transphobic, homophobic or just a dick to someone because of their identity or who they are. We will act strongly on violations.

Content Warnings are required for NSFW content, kink and fetish content, and otherwise questionable topics (drugs etc.). Locked accounts are excluded from this rule as long as they specify this in their bio.
Do not impersonate someone else. If this is for parody purposes this MUST be clearly stated in your profile description.
Do not use an avatar that would warrant a content warning, do not use NSFW or otherwise "more than mildly questionable" banners.
When posting art, make sure to tag the original artist. Please do not post art you don't own / doesn't contain your characters or work.
NSFW art and pictures of underage characters or real animals are not allowed!

woof.group.text: If it'd be fine in a bar or public leather event space, it doesn't need a content warning here. Use content warnings for things you'd take to the back bar or a private room.
We're trans-inclusive, body-positive, and anti-racist here.
You must be over 18 years of age.
You must have the legal rights to any content you post.
When you apply, tell us a bit about your connection to queer leather/kink/BDSM.

worldnl.com.text: Keep this instance safe, respectful, and fun by not violating the rules.
Consider how your post might impact others - if it might be received as offensive, painful, or otherwise unwanted, please use a content warning (CW.)

worldkey.io.text: Posting personal information without consent ("doxxing") is strictly prohibited

Do not share intentionally false or misleading information
We will abide by the Mastodon Server Covenant available here: https://joinmastodon.org/covenant
When signing up, please include your Twitter handle, website, or other link in the â€œreasons for joiningâ€ field.

wpbuilds.social.text: Just promise to be polite, always, even when you're feeling really annoyed.

Do not use slurs or racist, sexist, homophobic, transphobic, ableist or otherwise discriminatory or hateful jokes or language or promote white supremacy, anti-Semitism, transphobia or other hateful ideologies.

Do not harass anyone, participate in group harassment of anyone, or otherwise engage in personal attacks. Posting or threatening to post other peopleâ€™s personally identifying information (â€œdoxingâ€) constitutes harassment.
Do not be intentionally antagonistic. A post or reply designed to provoke a confrontation is not acceptable.
Do not post adult content, including pictures containing nudity, or unwelcome sexual attention (including sexualized comments or jokes).

Do not use automated tools to toot without participating in the community. It is fine to post with an automated tool so long as you are an active member of the WP Builds community and respond to replies you receive here. Unmonitored accounts that post automatically are not acceptable.
Do not debate moderation actions in public toots. If you disagree with how a moderator enforced this CoC you may direct-message the moderation team or email admin [at] wpbuilds [dot] com
Do not toot in languages other than English (which makes moderation prohibitively difficult). I know that this is contentious.

Do not post spam. Toots that are nothing other than a link and/or contain an inordinate number of hashtags are spam, as does any overly commercial self-promotion. (It is fine to toot about your own projects and share what you are excited to be working on â€” just keep the toot itself interesting).
Do not post about inflammatory, controversial subjects without a Content Warning.
Do not â€œshitpostâ€ - while humorous posts are allowed, and actually encouraged, there is no place for â€œshitpostingâ€ on WP Builds.
Do not engage in name calling, ad hominem attacks, or any other uncivil behaviour; criticize ideas, never people.

Do not tone police. Toots may violate the standards of civility we set on WP Builds, but you should not criticize users for their tone. Report them or feel free to block them. In neither case should you criticize their tone.
Please understand - you have no privacy on this server or anywhere on Mastodon. It's not designed to be private. Assume that anything you post here, including DMs, are publicly visible.

wptoots.social.text: No advertising. You may advertise your own work to a reasonable extent, reports from users and moderators discretion decide what is reasonable.

Restrictive on bots. Bots are not generally disallowed, but they have to specifically post WordPress content in a reasonable way. Reports from users and moderators discretion decide what is reasonable.

writ.live.text: Be Kind. Trolling and hateful comments have no place on this server. We reserve the right to moderate or ban any account that is consistently spiteful. You will be held accountable for the words you use.
No racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, xenophobia, or casteism.
Incitement of violence or promotion of violent ideologies is prohibited.

wrestling.social.text: Be excellent to each other. This server does not tolerate racism, sexism, anti-LGBT bigotry.

write.echoless.space.text: One should strive to act with compassion and empathy toward all creatures in accordance with reason.
The struggle for justice is an ongoing and necessary pursuit that should prevail over laws and institutions.
Oneâ€™s body is inviolable, subject to oneâ€™s own will alone.

The freedoms of others should be respected, including the freedom to offend. To willfully and unjustly encroach upon the freedoms of another is to forgo one's own.

Note that this does not mean freedom from consequences for one's actions including speech both written and spoken. Words matter.
Beliefs should conform to one's best scientific understanding of the world. One should take care never to distort scientific facts to fit one's beliefs.
People are fallible. If one makes a mistake, one should do one's best to rectify it and resolve any harm that might have been caused.
Every tenet is a guiding principle designed to inspire nobility in action and thought. The spirit of compassion, wisdom, and justice should always prevail over the written or spoken word.

www.1nd33d.social.text: No: Hate speech, harassment, bullying, porn, fascism, Nazism, white power, illegal things (according to the laws of the US), doxxing, impersonating

wulf.social.text: Sexually explicit or violent media must be marked as sensitive when posting to prevent issues with federation.
No racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, xenophobia, or casteism.
No incitement of violence or promotion of violent ideologies.
No harassment, dogpiling or doxxing of other users.
No content illegal in Canada, United States, Germany, or Estonia.
Do not knowingly share false or misleading information, misinformation, or disinformation.

No spamming, repetitive / redundant, or aggressive promotion. 
For personal project / self promotion, please include text with content, and use unique content.  
For third party promotion, please limit promotion to 12 times a day with supporting facts and never only links.
Bots must be marked as Bot in their profile.
Agree to the Code of Conduct and Terms of Services.
Please set automated post deletion to 2 years to reduce server overhead and cost.

www.blabbergoats.com.text: Sexually explicit or violent media must be marked as sensitive when posting.
No racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, xenophobia, or casteism.
No incitement of violence or promotion of violent ideologies.
No harassment, dogpiling or doxxing of other users.

www.blimps.xyz.text: You must be 18 years of age or older. No exceptions will be granted for "age of consent" or similar for your region. If discovered a minor, your account will be suspended.
No bigotry is permitted. We do not tolerate hate speech of any kind, including transphobia, homophobia, Islamophobia, or any other facet of one's being.
Be respectful: Treat others with respect. Assume good faith with everything. Text has limited ability to convey intent; be kind with yours.
NSFW or kink-driven content must be behind a CW giving a short summary of the content (e.g. "NSFW Art, inflation"), while ensuring media is marked as 'sensitive'
Zero tolerance for attacks. Harassing other users, whether on this instance or another, is cause for immediate suspension of your account.
Copyrighted content may only be shared in fair use contexts. Basically, if it would earn a DMCA takedown request filed against us, don't post it directly.

Take care in sharing sensitive information. While the admins here simply don't have the time nor interest to pry in the database, law enforcement could still have access as your messages are not encrypted at rest, same as nearly all other platforms. When in doubt, use a private messaging platform.

www.gayonly.ch.text: no illegal content, NSFW allowed, no rassism or other bullshits
No begging for money (giving people the option to donate is totally fine)
No Business Accounts for the sole purpose of selling things
Accounts without a picture and no profile information AND no posts will be deleted after 30 days
no pictures where the age is unclear

www.librepunk.club.text: Chud behavior is never allowed. Racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, ableism and etc will catch you a ban.
CW all nsfw. If you're unsure about something, CW it.

www.mastodon.scot.text: No discrimination, including (but not limited to) racism, sexism, homophobia or transphobia.
No explicit (NSFW) content without content warnings and/or sensitive media markers. Explicit content must not be used in user avatars or header images.
No harassment of other users on this or other servers.
No content illegal in the following countries: United Kingdom, Germany
No incitement of violence or promotion of violent ideologies.
No disinformation regarding public health issues or political/military campaigns.
No spam. This includes commercial advertising, promotion of services, and SEO.
No impersonation of other individuals, public figures or organisations, unless clearly marked as a parody.
All automated (bot) accounts must enable the bot flag in their account preferences, respect #nobot markers, and post as unlisted unless making less than one post per hour.

wxcloud.social.text: This is not a general purpose server. This is intended for use by weather enthusiasts and meteorologists.
This said, you can talk about anything you want (but talking about the weather, climate, and the environment often makes our local timeline useful).
Absolutely no racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, bigotry, or prejudice of any kind. Engaging in any of the above is contrary to the spirit of Mastodon, and grounds for immediate suspension.
Please disagree in a respectful manner, not only on wxcloud.social -- but across Mastodon.

wx.social.text: This federated instance is open to weather & meteorology enthusiasts, professionals, and students. You must maintain a valid and non-disposable email address on your account.
Do not share intentionally false or misleading information
No incitement of violence or promotion of violent ideologies
No harassment, dogpiling or doxxing of other users
No sexually explicit or violent media
No content illegal in the United States of America (where Wx Weather Fediverse is hosted)

wybt.net.text: Using this service is a privilege, not a right.
User data is just packet overhead.
In case of doubt the RIPE NCC (https://www.ripe.net/publications/docs/ripe-766) CoC applies, with the addition that reporting should be to abuse@wybt.net

wzrds.fun.text: Respect Others: Treat fellow users with kindness and respect. Avoid any form of harassment, discrimination, or offensive behavior.
No Hate Speech: Do not engage in or promote hate speech, racism, sexism, or any form of discrimination.
Content Guidelines: Follow guidelines regarding acceptable content. This may include restrictions on explicit material, violence, or other sensitive topics.
Privacy: Respect the privacy of others. Do not share personal information without consent.
No Spam: Avoid spamming or excessive self-promotion. Keep posts relevant and of interest to the community.
Legal Compliance: Users should adhere to applicable laws and regulations. Illegal activities are not allowed.
Use of Resources: Do not engage in activities that may negatively impact server performance or hinder the experience of other users.
Reporting Issues: Report any violations or issues promptly to the administrators.
Multiple Accounts: Users may be limited to one account unless otherwise specified by the server rules.
Be Mindful of Local Rules: Familiarize yourself with and adhere to any specific rules set by the instance or server administrators.

wyvern.blue.text: Racism, hate speech, homophobia, extremism, etc will not be tolerated
NSFW and content like it should be marked with a content warning.
Illegal activity will be blocked and deleted from this server without warning.

x.goonj.xyz.text: Be civil. No trolling, microaggressions, or harassment.
No NSFW content without Content Warning
Illegal content including pornography is not permitted.
Hate speech is not permitted at all.
Share content only that you have permission for.

x0r.be.text: Any kind of hate speech, racism or phobia against LGBTQ+ people is grounds for immediate account suspension.
These are not welcome on this instance: corporate accounts (non-profits are fine), advertising, one-directional crossposters from Twitter.

User accounts whose only activity consisted of registration, but did not post anything or follow anybody or interact with the fediverse in any other way might be deleted after a short period of time. This is in order to prevent bot activity.
When signing up, only about one out of ten requests are accepted. You can increase your chances by writing a more detailed description and including the word "Mellon" in your request.
