xn--ratatskr-r4a.de.text: Stay legal. Don't post anything that violates German law.
Spam, racist, sexist, hateful, or discriminating posts in any form are forbidden.
Content Warning policy. Drugs, lewd posts and pictures, kinks must be listed with a content warning.
Do not impersonate someone, unless for parody purposes. This includes using other peoples' artworks without permission.
Parody accounts must be tagged as such clearly in their profile description.
Bots must be tagged as such, and bot owners must ensure they will have a minimal impact on the instance's performances.
You may not use a header image or avatar if it shows content that is listed to be content warned.
Don't repost artworks without crediting the artist. If you have a link to their gallery, perfect, if only their name, better than nothing. Claiming other's Artwork as your own may lead to suspension.
You must be 18 years of age or older

xn--xxa.computer.text: Sexually explicit or violent media must be marked as sensitive when posting
No racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, xenophobia, or casteism
No incitement of violence or promotion of violent ideologies
No harassment, dogpiling or doxxing of other users
Do not share false or misleading information that may lead to physical harm

xreality.social.text: No insults, threats, and slurs of any kind
No radical ideas, racism, and hate propaganda
No publication of forum/blog posts, private correspondence, and private data (addresses, e-mail addresses, or telephone numbers)
No misuse of the comment function for advertising purposes

xoxo.zone.text: No harassment. For a detailed definition, refer to the XOXO Code of Conduct at xoxofest.com/conduct.
No hate speech, including but not limited to sexist, racist, homophobic, and transphobic posts.
Use content warnings for adult content, or posts that may be disturbing or triggering.
No sharing personal information about others without their consent.
No intentional sharing of false or misleading information.
No spam. Self-promotion is welcome, sending mass unsolicited replies is not.

xvlt.net.text: Treat others as you want to be treated.

xtaldave.net.text:
This is a single-user server for XtalDave, a research scientist from London, UK. 
All content from this server will by from me, and really should conform to these rules.
Be kind. Liberally apply content warning, use alt text for images and use CamelCase for hashtags.
No hate speech. No racism, sexism, misogeny, homophobia, transphobia or bigotry/discrimination will be tolerated.
Don't punch down. A person's colour, sexuality, and gender identity are not a topic for comedy.
Politics should be inclusive and progressive, and help those in need.
Be a good house guest. This is everyone's house. Be considerate.
It's ok to tell bigots to GTFO.

xx0r.eu.text: Be nice, dont harass, dont post bullshit or illegal stuff

yabtm.us.text: No racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, xenophobia, or casteism
No incitement of violence or promotion of violent ideologies
No harassment, dogpiling, or doxxing of other users
No content illegal in the United States or the EU.
No promotion of Cryptocurrencies or NFTs (mockery of them is fine and encouraged)
Definitions of the above rules are entirely in the eyes of the moderation staff, we reserve the right to delete, suspend, or ban at our discretion.

Direct messages on Mastodon are not protected with encryption. The administration of the server you are on and the recipient are on can read them, and could be compelled to turn them over by law enforcement.

yakker.app.text: Posts containing explicit material such as nudity, horrible injury etc, add NSFW (Not Safe For Work) and tag.
Do not engage in illegal activity.
Do not post someone's personal information.
Do not ask people to troll or engage in a hate campaign on the site, real life, or anywhere else.
Do not conduct personal attacks on other users.
Do not post any harmful links or content to the site.

yamabi.co.text: Do not harass other individuals or groups. Racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, xenophobia, and other forms of hate speech are not tolerated.
Tag sexually suggestive, violent, or otherwise graphic content with a content warning. Loli, shota, and cub are not permitted.
The server is based in California, and content posted here is subject to California state and United States law. Among other things, piracy is strictly prohibited.

yeen.social.text: This is a first version of the rules. Being apart of this instance means that you agree to and follow them during your interactions on it and through it, the wider Mastodon federation.

yeen.social is an instance designed to be a safe space for furries. As such, people should be respectful of one another. Please be argumentative in your debates. Fuck nazis & all sorts of bigotry. Discrimination of any kind does not have a place in this server :)

This instance harbors, among many other things, NSFW content. It is also a sex-positive space for those who want to discuss this topic in a respectful manner. Do not sign up to this instance if you are under 18 years of age.
If you have encountered a problem with this instance or an interaction on it, don't hesitate to contact @deeryeen. I'll try my best to administer or moderate any issues that might appear.
This instance is hosted in Germany, we will use their baseline for lawful content online. There are to be no discourse about illegal activities and or illegal content.

yatil.social.text: All public posts from this instance are indexed by tootfinder.ch.

yeen.exposed.text: all creatures are welcome, hate and bigotry are not
we are a small solo instance and want to federate. if we do something that bothers u just let us know.
no racism, no homophobia, no transphobia, no antisemitism or anything that's hateful or discriminatory
nsfw topics will be marked as sensitive

yeg.bike.text: No harassment, bullying, dogpiling, doxxing, or unwanted advances.
Zero-tolerance for hate speech, hate symbols, slurs, epithets, etc.
Content that is sexually explicit, depicts violence, or is similarly sensitive must be put behind a Content Warning (CW) and any such media must marked as Sensitive.
No content that is illegal in Canada, content for which you do not own the copyright, or any content or behaviour that could otherwise cause the proprietors of the site legal issues.
Zero-tolerance for homophobia, transphobia, sexism, racism, ableism, ageism, etc.
Respect and use preferred names and pronouns.
No incitement of violence or promotion of violent ideologies.
No disinformation, deepfakes, or content otherwise intended to mislead or misinform (unless clearly labeled as such for discussion purposes).

yiff.life.text: All "not safe for work content"/"NSFW"/nudity/explicit content must use the term â€œNSFWâ€ in the CW field and be hidden in public toots. Avoid setting your banner and icon to sexually explicit content since those cannot be CW'd.
Posting illegal content will result in an immediate ban. The definition of "illegal content" is based on US laws.
No posting of suggestive/NSFW content depicting minors or "cub" art on this instance.
No hate material, transphobia, or discrimination of any kind will be tolerated on this instance.
Any instances primarily hosting or refusing to moderate section 6 content will be blocked from federating.
These rules are subject to being amended and updated at any time, without notice.
Please review our Extended Code of Conduct andTerms of Service for more information at https://yiff.life/terms

yip.vulpine.engineer.text: Kindness and respect: On this private, single-user instance, I aim to treat others with kindness and respect.  If you encounter issues with any behavior, please let me know via direct message or reporting.

yharnam.singles.text: No fascists, racists, transphobia, or bigots of any kind will be tolerated.  I dont care about your free speech - go tell it to your momma.

ynotnetwork.com.text: You may not use this server in any way that violates any federal, state, local, or international law or regulation.
You may not use this server to exploit, harm, or attempt to exploit or harm minors in any way.
You may not use this server to impersonate or attempt to impersonate YNOT, a YNOT employee, another user, or any other person or entity.
You may not use this server to dox others. Sharing personally identifiable information (PIF) about another individual is grounds for the immediate suspension of your account.
Do not post content that contains any material that is defamatory, obscene, abusive, harassing, violent, hateful, inflammatory, or otherwise objectionable.
Do not post content that promotes child sexual abuse or obscene material, violence, or discrimination based on race, sex, religion, nationality, disability, sexual orientation, or age.
Do not post content that infringes any patent, trademark, trade secret, copyright, or other intellectual property or other rights of any other person.
Do not post content that promotes any illegal activity, or that advocates, promotes, or assists any unlawful act.
You must be at least 18 years old to use this server. Use of this server indicates that you meet this qualification.

No promotion of alt-right, Nazi or other far-right ideology.
No promotion of disinformation, "alternative facts", conspiracy theories, etc.
Ableism and any form of harassment and discrimination on the basis of physical/mental disabilities will not be tolerated.

zomglol.wtf.text: We all want to have a good time here, so donâ€™t get edgy and disrespectful. Bigoted shit gets you banned.

zombofant.net.text: No content condoning or advocating for the oppression of members of marginalised groups, or general discrimination of groups based on characteristics like gender, race, disabilities, nationality, education, religion etc.
No harassment, stalking, mobbing, deadnaming, misgendering, contacting users who have made it clear they do not wish to be contacted.
Obviously: no content that is illegal in Germany, no actions intended to damage this instance (performance, reputation, security).
No right or alt-right bullshit, Nazi content, conspiracy narratives. There is a zero-tolerance policy for Nazis. Why? https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Paradox_of_tolerance

When posting to the local timeline, provide Content Warnings for violence, sexually explicit content, death/disease, and politics, particularly when negative or controversial (those are the larger categories, a CW might be something like â€œuspol, electionsâ€).

NSFW content / Nudity: NSFW is discouraged, but allowed unless it can be considered harassment or the sole point of depiction is the fact that it falls into this category. NSFW tags are required. Porn is never allowed. NSFW content depicting minors is never allowed.
When posting to the local timeline, provide image descriptions.

Promoting harmful items: It is not allowed to promote potentially harmful items such as weapons, drugs, narcotics, items that can be considered harassment, combustion cars, gambling or high-risk investments, including cryptocurrencies or NFTs.
No SLA: At this time, we are not in a position to commit to any SLA. It's a hobby. I cannot make a uptime guarantee.

Safety Recommendation: Use a private relay email and a uniquely generated password. I may not always be able to apply the security patches as soon as they're released. Treat any data you submit to this server as potentially public data.
Consequences: Failure to comply with this code of conduct may result in immediate suspension at the discretion of the moderator.
Unannounced Changes: This code of conduct can be updated at any time without prior notice.

zoomlife.me.text: Act in ways that are welcoming, accepting, and inclusive to all members.
